original: rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi //
analyzed: rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi //
translated: One should take up the secret ritual of one's own,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi gsang ba'i cho gas blangs pa'i glu la sogs pa dang / ji srid 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi gsang ba'i cho gas blangs pa'i glu la sogs pa dang / ji srid 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and so on. One should worship with the songs and so forth of one's own secret ritual, and with enjoyments as much as one desires, because one will be well-perfected.

original: da ni rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu bstan pa yin te /
translated: Now, the songs of one's own secret ritual are taught.

original: h'um zhes @47a * //
analyzed: h'um zhes @47a * //
translated: Hum

original: bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: is for the yogins of the Vajrasattva lineage.

original: aa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: A is for the yogins of the Tathagata lineage.

original: hi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: hi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Hi is for the yogins of the Vajra lineage.

original: aom zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Om is for the yogins of the Padma lineage.

original: ha zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ste de dag gis de lta bu'i glu bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ha zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ste de dag gis de lta bu'i glu bya ba yin no //
translated: Ha is for the yogins of the Jewel lineage. They should sing such songs.

original: rnal 'byor gang la la bar ta dang / we sha khi la la mkhas pa'i slob ma'i tshogs sam /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang la la bar ta dang / we sha khi la la mkhas pa'i slob ma'i tshogs sam /
translated: If any yogī has a group of disciples skilled in the lute and the vīṇā,

original: bud med kyi tshogs yod na /
analyzed: bud med kyi tshogs yod na /
translated: or a group of women,

original: de g-yas pa'i rol mos 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de g-yas pa'i rol mos 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will accomplish the right side through music.

original: ci byas nas 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci byas nas 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it accomplished?

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs zhes bya ba la mnyam pa ni dus gcig ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs zhes bya ba la mnyam pa ni dus gcig ste /
translated: “Holding the vajra and the bell, etc.” means that at the same time,

original: rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pas rnam par dben pa'i khang bu sum brtsegs su bhar ti'i mtshan nyid dag pas rnam par dben par dag pa'i pi wang la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rol mo brdung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pas rnam par dben pa'i khang bu sum brtsegs su bhar ti'i mtshan nyid dag pas rnam par dben par dag pa'i pi wang la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rol mo brdung bar bya ste /
translated: together with the vajra and the bell, etc., in a three-storied isolated house, with pure bharati characteristics, in a pure place, one should play music that is of the nature of the lute, etc.

original: byed par gyur pa de rnams kyis yi ge h'um gi glu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rol mo brdung bar bya ste /
analyzed: byed par gyur pa de rnams kyis yi ge h'um gi glu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rol mo brdung bar bya ste /
translated: Those who are engaged should play music that is of the nature of the song of the syllable hūṃ, etc.

original: byed par gyur pa de rnams kyis yi ge h'um gi glu la sogs pa'i rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu len par byed cing g-yas pa'i rol mos rnal 'byor pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed par gyur pa de rnams kyis yi ge h'um gi glu la sogs pa'i rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu len par byed cing g-yas pa'i rol mos rnal 'byor pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have become performers sing the song of the secret ritual of the syllable hūṃ, and so on, with the right-side music, the yogin will be successful.

original: de yang rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu rang gi dam tshig grub pas so //
analyzed: de yang rang gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu rang gi dam tshig grub pas so //
translated: And that is the song of the secret ritual of one’s own commitment, which is successful.

original: de ltar glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rjes su grub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rjes su grub pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the accomplishment that is the nature of the offering of song and music,

original: da ni rdo rje gar gyi rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i ngo bo so sor rjes su sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje gar gyi rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i ngo bo so sor rjes su sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the accomplishment of each of the offerings that are the nature of the various mudras of vajra dance,

original: rdo rje gar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bha ra ta dang / we sha khi la la mkhas pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje gar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bha ra ta dang / we sha khi la la mkhas pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa gsungs te /
translated: the yogin says “vajra dance” and so on, together with a group of students skilled in the Bharata and Veśakhī.

original: ba dan gsum mchog tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: ba dan gsum mchog tshul gyis ni //
translated: With the method of the three banners,

original: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs dkrol //
analyzed: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs dkrol //
translated: the end of the dance and so on is unraveled,

original: glog 'gyu rtse mo bskor ba yis //
analyzed: glog 'gyu rtse mo bskor ba yis //
translated: with the lightning-speed rotation of the peak.

original: rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
analyzed: rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
translated: The vajra dance is explained.

original: zhes bya ba 'di rdo rje gar gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di rdo rje gar gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: This is the definition of the vajra dance.

original: rdo rje gar gyi mtshan nyid 'dir rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje gar rab tu bya zhing rab tu mchod par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi mtshan nyid 'dir rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje gar rab tu bya zhing rab tu mchod par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Here, one should understand the vajra dance to be the dance of one's deity, and the worship to be the worship of one's deity.

original: 'dzin pa @47b dang bcas gzung ba che //
analyzed: 'dzin pa @47b dang bcas gzung ba che //
translated: With retention, great retention.

original: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis gar byas shing bsam pa dang / gar gyi nyams dang / lta ba dang / smin ma dang / so dang / dgod pa dang / mchu dang lag pa'i rim pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis gar byas shing bsam pa dang / gar gyi nyams dang / lta ba dang / smin ma dang / so dang / dgod pa dang / mchu dang lag pa'i rim pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Here, one should understand the dance to be the dance of one's deity, and the retention to be the retention of one's deity.

original: 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gzung ba chen po gang la yod pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gzung ba chen po ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gzung ba chen po gang la yod pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gzung ba chen po ste /
translated: The great retention is the retention of the great mandala.

original: des yongs su bskor nas rab tu mchod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des yongs su bskor nas rab tu mchod par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should worship with that, surrounded by it.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas //
translated: Having danced like the mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'i gar ni man ngag las shes par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'i gar ni man ngag las shes par bya ste /
translated: The dance that is like the maṇḍala should be known from the esoteric instructions.

original: de byas nas yongs su bskor la /
analyzed: de byas nas yongs su bskor la /
translated: Having done that, one should completely encircle

original: dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bar byas nas lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bar byas nas lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: and face the maṇḍala, and bind all the deities’ mudras.

original: de ltar na rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, the maṇḍala is worshipped with the worship of the vajra dance.

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa gtam rgyud dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya dag gis bya zhing /
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa gtam rgyud dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya dag gis bya zhing /
translated: The worship with various mudras should be done with the practice of the gaṇacakra maṇḍala, with the stories, the hand emblems, and the mudras.

original: mtshan thog thag bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should practice throughout the night.

original: lugs ma'am / brdungs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos po dang bcas pa'i rang rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: lugs ma'am / brdungs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos po dang bcas pa'i rang rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach this rite, which is to draw the maṇḍala of one’s own deity together with the nature of the cast or beaten image, and so on,

original: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Then, the “offering of various mudras, supremely secret” is stated.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po nas brtsams nas /🔽ji srid lha mo rin chen dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi rigs thams cad kyi lha mo rnams kyi sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa ni phyag rgya sna
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po nas brtsams nas / ji srid lha mo rin chen dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi rigs thams cad kyi lha mo rnams kyi sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa ni phyag rgya sna
translated: Beginning with the great mudra of Vajrasattva,🔽up to the end of the goddess Ratnaghanta, the offering of mudras is divided into various types, such as the great mudra, of the goddesses of all the families.

original: tshogs kyi mchod pa'o //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha //
analyzed: tshogs kyi mchod pa'o // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha //
translated: The offering of various mudras is the offering of mudras.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa yin te /
translated: The “deities beginning with Vajrasattva” and so on explain this.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rigs lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi lha rnams kyi thog ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rigs lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi lha rnams kyi thog ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha rnams te /
translated: The deities beginning with Vajrasattva are those who have Vajrasattva as their first deity, who have the nature of the five families.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po nas brtsams te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po nas brtsams te /
translated: Beginning with the great mudra of Vajrasattva,

original: ji srid lha mo rin chen dril bu ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i bar ro //🔽de rnams kyi rtogs @48a * //
analyzed: ji srid lha mo rin chen dril bu ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i bar ro // de rnams kyi rtogs @48a * //
translated: up to the great seal of the goddess Ratnāghanta.🔽Their realizations are all of them,

original: pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na rtogs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na rtogs pa thams cad de /
translated: so it is the totality of realizations.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: They are the great seal, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal.

original: de dag gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni gzugs thams cad ston pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni gzugs thams cad ston pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
translated: Their emanations are the performance of the aims of sentient beings by the display of all forms.

original: rtogs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa de rnams kyis gar byas pa gang yin pa de rol mo zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa de rnams kyis gar byas pa gang yin pa de rol mo zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The dance of those emanations of the totality of realizations is what is meant by “play.”

original: byed par gyur pa gang gis de bya zhe na /
analyzed: byed par gyur pa gang gis de bya zhe na /
translated: By what agency is that dance performed?🔽The text says:

original: gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis //
translated: By the story, the insignia, and the seal.

original: zhes bya ba la de la gtam rgyud ni sngon gyi lo rgyus bstan pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de la gtam rgyud ni sngon gyi lo rgyus bstan pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: Therein, the story is the nature of the teaching of past events.

original: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi lha'i mtshon cha ni phyag mtshan no //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi lha'i mtshon cha ni phyag mtshan no //
translated: The insignia are the weapons of one’s own deity, such as the original vajra.

original: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i mthar thug pa'i sngon gyi lo rgyus kyi tshul bstan pa ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i mthar thug pa'i sngon gyi lo rgyus kyi tshul bstan pa ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra is the teaching of the manner of the previous history of the ultimate binding of the great seal of one's deity.

original: gtam rgyud de dang phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya dag gis rang gi lha'i gar gyi nyams dang / bsam pa dang / lta ba dang / dgod pa dang / mchu dang / so dang / smin ma dang / gdong dang / dga' ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i yan lag rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dir rol mo zhes bya bar 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gtam rgyud de dang phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya dag gis rang gi lha'i gar gyi nyams dang / bsam pa dang / lta ba dang / dgod pa dang / mchu dang / so dang / smin ma dang / gdong dang / dga' ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i yan lag rnam par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dir rol mo zhes bya bar 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The dance of one's deity, with the mood, thought, gaze, laughter, lips, teeth, eyebrows, face, joy, etc., along with the mudra of that story and the hand-symbol, is what is here asserted to be the music.

original: de yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: And that is what accomplishes the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: so sor rjes su sgrub pa 'dis rang gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: so sor rjes su sgrub pa 'dis rang gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish one's own power by this practice of the individual.

original: dbyibs gang gis phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya zhen /
analyzed: dbyibs gang gis phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya zhen /
translated: By what shape should one worship with the various seals?

original: gser zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gser zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The gold etc. is stated.

original: gang dag gi lha gser gyi kha dog can yin la /🔽de dag gis rang gi lha'i gser gyi gdong brnyan du byas la rang gi gdong g-yogs la phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang dag gi lha gser gyi kha dog can yin la / de dag gis rang gi lha'i gser gyi gdong brnyan du byas la rang gi gdong g-yogs la phyag rgya sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Those whose deity is golden in color🔽should make a golden mask of their deity, cover their own face with it, and worship with various gestures.

original: gang dag gis kha dog dkar po can yin na de dag gis dngul gyi bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang dag gis kha dog dkar po can yin na de dag gis dngul gyi bya ba yin te /
translated: Those whose deity is white in color should make a silver mask of their deity, cover their own face with it, and worship with various gestures.

original: de ltar gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan dag la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand this way in other cases as well.

original: yang na rang gi lha'i gdong brnyan shing gi dngos po la dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur la rang gi gdong la bgos la rang gi lha'i zhal gyi rnam pa can de dag gi dngos grub kyi don du phyag rgya'i gar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rang gi lha'i gdong brnyan shing gi dngos po la dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur la rang gi gdong la bgos la rang gi lha'i zhal gyi rnam pa can de dag gi dngos grub kyi don du phyag rgya'i gar bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should make a mask of one's deity, a wooden object, colored with white and so on, cover one's own face with it, and for the sake of the powers of those who have the form of one's deity's face, one should perform the dance of gestures.

original: dkyil 'khor gang la zhe na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gang la zhe na /
translated: In which maṇḍala?

original: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang zhes bya ba la rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi dkyil @48b 'khor gang dang gang la brten pa ni bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang zhes bya ba la rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi dkyil @48b 'khor gang dang gang la brten pa ni bsgom pa ste /
translated: In which and which maṇḍala means that one should meditate in dependence upon which and which maṇḍala of the deities of the five families.

original: phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor de dang der gtam rgyud dang / phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya dag gi mthar rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas shing slob ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor de dang der gtam rgyud dang / phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya dag gi mthar rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas shing slob ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin no //
translated: By the worship with various seals, in that and that mandala, with the histories, the emblems, and the seals, at the end, one should recite the essence-mantra of one's deity, and all the hosts of disciples should worship.

original: de yang dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i gar gyi dngos po so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa 'dis mchod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i gar gyi dngos po so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa 'dis mchod par bya ba yin no //
translated: And that is worship by the worship of discrimination, the entity of the dance of the seal of power.

original: dngos grub ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: dngos grub ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: Power is the nature of the discrimination of the best of all.

original: phun sum tshogs pa ni dngos grub thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa ni dngos grub thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Perfection is the nature of the essence of great bliss of all powers.

original: dga' ba ni kun mchog rnam par rgyal ba bsgreng ba'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: dga' ba ni kun mchog rnam par rgyal ba bsgreng ba'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: Joy is the nature of the erection of the best of all.

original: bdag po ni phun sum tshogs pa chen po thams cad kyi dngos po 'dis thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag po ni phun sum tshogs pa chen po thams cad kyi dngos po 'dis thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The lord is the one who attains the entity of all great perfections by this.

original: de ltar na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog ste /
analyzed: de ltar na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog ste /
translated: Thus, the best of all the glorious Vajrasattvas and all the Buddhas,

original: kun mchog so sor rtog pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor mchog sgrub pa pos thob pas te mngon du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: kun mchog so sor rtog pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i rang bzhin can gyi rnal 'byor mchog sgrub pa pos thob pas te mngon du bya ba yin no //
translated: The yogī/nī, the supreme practitioner, attains, i.e., realizes, the supreme yoga that has the nature of the collection of the supreme of all, the discriminations of the individual goddesses, and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
translated: The word “then” is in the sense of “at this point.”

original: phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa rdzogs par bya ba 'di la'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa rdzogs par bya ba 'di la'o //
translated: This is the completion of the worship of the various seals.

original: rigs thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i lha rnams ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i lha rnams ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
translated: The deities of the desire of all families are Śrī Vajrasattva and so on.

original: so so rang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i de dag gi glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon du brjod pa ni mngon par phyogs par blangs nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'am /
analyzed: so so rang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i de dag gi glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon du brjod pa ni mngon par phyogs par blangs nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'am /
translated: The extensive rite of the worship of the song of those who have entered their individual maṇḍalas is expressed in the direct declaration, “having taken up the facing,” and then the vajra master performs the worship of the song of the goddesses.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i glu dang / rol mo'i cho ga bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa ni sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa ste mchog tu grub pa🔽yin no// rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i glu'i mchod pa ji lta bu yin phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dus su gang mngon par rdzogs nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsams pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i glu dang / rol mo'i cho ga bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa rgyur gyur pa rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa ni sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa ste mchog tu grub pa yin no// rtog pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i glu'i mchod pa ji lta bu yin phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dus su gang mngon par rdzogs nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsams pa'am /
translated: The song and music ritual from the Tantra of the Union with All Buddhas and so forth, which is the cause of whatever one desires, is the great variety of pledges of all the concepts of glorious Vajrasattva and so forth, which is the worship of the variety of seals, which is the supreme accomplishment.🔽What is the song worship of entering the mandala of all concepts?🔽What is the worship of the variety of seals?🔽What is the recitation of the mantra of the vajra master?

original: rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa mngon par brjod par bya zhe na /🔽de la @49a * //
analyzed: rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa mngon par brjod par bya zhe na / de la @49a * //
translated: What is the song of the vajra master?

original: re zhig thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: re zhig thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: What is the song of the vajra master?🔽What is the song of the vajra master?

original: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas mchog tu gsang ba ste dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas mchog tu gsang ba ste dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: It is supreme and secret, and thus supremely secret, which is the mandala.

original: de nyid dam tshig ste der 'jug pa ni phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dam tshig ste der 'jug pa ni phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa'o //
translated: That itself is the commitment, and to enter there is the outer and secret entry.

original: de'i don du rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: de'i don du rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa 'di yin no //
translated: For that purpose, this is the vajra song offering.

original: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la glu de nyid len cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la glu de nyid len cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should sing the song of entry into one's own mandala, form the mudra of entry, and enter the mandala while singing that very song.

original: yang glu de nyid brjod nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: yang glu de nyid brjod nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsams pa'o //
translated: Again, having sung that very song, the vajra master should commence.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i glu brjod nas gtam rgyud dang phyag mtshan dang phyag dag gis phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyi bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i glu brjod nas gtam rgyud dang phyag mtshan dang phyag dag gis phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyi bya ba yin no //
translated: Having sung the songs taught in the Tantra of Union with All Buddhas and so forth, the master together with the assembly of disciples should perform the various mudra offerings of the story, hand implements, and prostrations.

original: thams cad rjes su chags pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sgom pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chags pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sgom pa ste /
translated: The affection is the meditation on glorious Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni rnal 'byor gyi bde pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni rnal 'byor gyi bde pa'o //
translated: The bliss that arises from that is the bliss of yoga.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: dam pa'i thugs te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i thugs te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The mind of the holy ones is that of the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' las gzhan pa yin nam zhe na //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ces bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' las gzhan pa yin nam zhe na // rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ces bya ste /
translated: Is it other than Vajrasattva?

original: gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad rjes su chags pa'i bde ba nyid rdo rje sems dpa' khyod yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //

original: rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin can gyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bo'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //🔽'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin can gyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bo'o // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
translated: The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.🔽The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid dam tshig yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid dam tshig yin no //
translated: The pledge is the commitment to attain that supreme joy.

original: bdag gyur cig ces bya ba ni thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / brtan zhing mtho ba dag la gyur cig ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdag gyur cig ces bya ba ni thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / brtan zhing mtho ba dag la gyur cig ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: May I become is connected with may I become one who is passionately loving, very joyful, and firm and lofty.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: Great bliss is the request.

original: brtan zhing mtho ba ni mi dmigs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: brtan zhing mtho ba ni mi dmigs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: Firm and lofty is non-apprehending nirvana.

original: de gsol bas na brtan zhing mtho ba gsol ba'o //
analyzed: de gsol bas na brtan zhing mtho ba gsol ba'o //
translated: By requesting that, it is the request for firm and lofty.

original: so sor rtog pa ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la'o //
translated: Discernment is the worship of the Buddha who acts for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: sgrub shig ces bya ba ni 'das @49b ma thag tu bshad pa'i dngos grub kyis myur du sgrubs shig pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub shig ces bya ba ni 'das @49b ma thag tu bshad pa'i dngos grub kyis myur du sgrubs shig pa'o //
translated: Accomplish! means quickly accomplish with the previously explained accomplishment.

original: phyag 'tshal ba ni mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba ni mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: Homage is the manifest.

original: de la thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
analyzed: de la thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das bstan to //
translated: There, passionately loving all indicates the Bhagavān who has the nature of Rāgavajrā.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: By great bliss, etc.

original: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can bstan to //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can bstan to //
translated: the nature of the Kali Kali.🔽🔽

original: brtan zhing mtho ba zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can bstan to //
analyzed: brtan zhing mtho ba zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can bstan to //
translated: The line stable and lofty indicates the nature of Vajra Smrti.

original: so sor rtog pas myur du sgrubs shig ces bya ba dang phyag 'tshal bas rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
analyzed: so sor rtog pas myur du sgrubs shig ces bya ba dang phyag 'tshal bas rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
translated: The line quickly accomplish through discrimination and the line homage indicate the nature of Vajra Kamadhatvi.

original: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the offering of song for entering the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva,

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
translated: then, the Tathāgata family and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The line the Tathāgata family and so forth teaches the offering of song for entering the Tathāgata family.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i bsdus pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i bsdus pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa ste /
translated: The line the gathering of Vajrasattva means the gathering of Vajrasattva,

original: byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: which is the generation of the mind of great enlightenment.

original: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
translated: The line the unsurpassed Vajra Jewel

original: ces bya ba ni de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: means that the perfection of generosity will be generated there. This is the remainder.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba ni rdo rje chos te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba ni rdo rje chos te /
translated: The mind and mental factors that have the nature of the perfection of wisdom are Vajradharma.

original: de dag gi glu blangs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bya ba so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de dag gi glu blangs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bya ba so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The song of these is the essence of discernment, “All phenomena are pure by nature.”

original: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa //
translated: The song of Vajradharma🔽is the song of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag gis /
analyzed: de dag gis /
translated: By these,🔽Vajrakarma

original: rdo rje las ni byed pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni byed pa yin //
translated: is the one who performs the deeds.

original: zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi las rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba sgrub pa po rang gi la bod pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi las rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba sgrub pa po rang gi la bod pa yin no //
translated: This is the request to the practitioner himself, “Please complete the deeds that have the nature of the perfection of effort.”

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams la de'i rigs kyang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag med dang / don yod grub pa rnams la de'i rigs kyang bstan pa yin no //
translated: The words “Vajrasattva is gathered” and so on also indicate the families of the tathagatas Akshobya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi glu bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi glu bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the song of the tathagata family,

original: rdo rje rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the song of entry into the Vajra family,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rdo rje'i gzhu ni gzhu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te rdo rje'i gzhu ni gzhu'o //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” etc. The vajra bow is the bow.

original: mnga' ni go sla'o //🔽de dag gis nye bar mtshon pa'i rdo rje gzhu dang mnga' dang ldan pa'i @50a * //
analyzed: mnga' ni go sla'o // de dag gis nye bar mtshon pa'i rdo rje gzhu dang mnga' dang ldan pa'i @50a * //
translated: To wield it is easy to understand.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
translated: The Bhagavān, Vajra-Sun-Blazing-Like-Fire,🔽who is endowed with the vajra bow and wields it,

original: rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'i gzugs can no //
translated: is the form of Vajra Passion-Blazing-Like-Fire.

original: dngos po thams cad thal bar rlog par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad thal bar rlog par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
translated: Homage to him, who reduces all things to ashes.

original: h'um badzra karma ka sh'a ra ya na ma:/
analyzed: h'um badzra karma ka sh'a ra ya na ma:/
translated: Homage to Vajra Karma Kṣa-rayana!

original: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar bas yul du byas pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ral gri'i phyag gnyis kyis sku
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar bas yul du byas pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ral gri'i phyag gnyis kyis sku
translated: The nature of the path of cultivation is the object of Vajra Passion-Blazing-Like-Fire. The nature of Vajra Sun-Blazing-Like-Fire is the great vajra passion-blazing-like-fire. The pledge seal of the sword in the two hands of the body

original: dbus nas gzung ste bstod pa ni dpal rdo rje chags pa ste /
analyzed: dbus nas gzung ste bstod pa ni dpal rdo rje chags pa ste /
translated: The praise from the center is the glorious Vajra Passion.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dam tshig ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dam tshig ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
translated: The pledge illustrated by that is the Vajra Sun Blazing Like Fire.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yin te de la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yin te de la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: It is the pledge of glorious Vajrasattva, and homage is to that.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen pos kha tv'am ga bzung ba des gdug ba can dang drag po rnams sangs rgyas nyid thob par byed pa la
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen pos kha tv'am ga bzung ba des gdug ba can dang drag po rnams sangs rgyas nyid thob par byed pa la
translated: The great goddess who has the name of the great vajra passion blazing like fire, who burns to ashes, with the great vajra of the Lord, the Khatvanga staff, those who are fierce and violent,

original: gegs su gyur pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po thams cad thal bar mdzad pa ni kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje glog pa ste /
analyzed: gegs su gyur pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po thams cad thal bar mdzad pa ni kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje glog pa ste /
translated: who are obstacles to attaining buddhahood, and who burns all things to ashes with the Khatvanga staff and the vajra lightning,

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i bcom ldan 'das kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje 'jigs pas te de la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i bcom ldan 'das kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje 'jigs pas te de la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: the Lord with the Khatvanga staff and the vajra terror, homage to that.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba'i thal bar rlog pa'i 'chi ba gso bar mdzad pa'i ming dang lha mo g-yon bsnyems nas phyag g-yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba la brtson pa ni dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pas
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa chen po me ltar 'bar ba'i thal bar rlog pa'i 'chi ba gso bar mdzad pa'i ming dang lha mo g-yon bsnyems nas phyag g-yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba la brtson pa ni dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pas
translated: The one who is named as the healer of death, the one who burns to ashes the great desire of the vajra, the one who, with the goddess, is haughty on the left, and with the right hand is intent on shaking the vajra bell above his head, is the glorious Vajraghantāsaṃcāriṇī.

original: te / des nye bar mtshon pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pas te /
analyzed: te / des nye bar mtshon pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pas te /
translated: The one who is indicated by that, the vajra sun blazing like fire, is the glorious Vajraghantāsaṃcāriṇī.

original: dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa de la phyag 'tshal ba'o //🔽de ltar rdo rje'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas da ni padma'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa de la phyag 'tshal ba'o // de ltar rdo rje'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas da ni padma'i rigs la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: One should pay homage to that glorious Vajraghantāsaṃcāriṇī.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having thus taught the song of entry into the vajra family, now, in order to teach the song of entry into the lotus family, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: shin tu drag po'i sku zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i don yod zhags pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu drag po'i sku zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i don yod zhags pa'o //
translated: The one with a very wrathful body is Amoghasiddhi, who assumes the form of a peaceful deity.

original: skye bo ma rungs pa'i srog 'phrog pa zhes bya ba la gzhan la gnod pa byed pa la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo ma rungs pa'i srog 'phrog pa zhes bya ba la gzhan la gnod pa byed pa la brtson pa'o //
translated: The taking of the lives of evil beings means that he is intent on harming others.

original: de dag gi srog 'phrog pa'i shin tu drag po'i sku kha cig tu @50b mdzad pa de dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bdag nyid kyi sku mdzad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag gi srog 'phrog pa'i shin tu drag po'i sku kha cig tu @50b mdzad pa de dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bdag nyid kyi sku mdzad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The taking of their lives means that he sometimes assumes the form of a very fierce being. The meaning is that he assumes a body in the form of Maheśvara.

original: 'dis ni zhi ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i don yod zhags pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni zhi ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i don yod zhags pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows that he is the Lord of the World, the nature of which is the Amogha-pāśa, who assumes the form of a peaceful being.

original: kha cig tu ni 'gro ba mtha' yas pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni 'gro ba mtha' yas pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In some places, he is the one who tames the infinite world, because he tames the infinite world.

original: shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku zhes bya ba la /
translated: The body that holds the very sharp discus means that he holds the body that holds the very sharp discus.

original: khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku ste kha cig tu sku de 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku ste kha cig tu sku de 'dzin par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The Lord of the World, who holds the form of Viṣṇu, holds the body that holds the very sharp discus. In some places, he holds that body.

original: de yang khyab 'jug gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang khyab 'jug gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he tames the infinite realms of sentient beings to be tamed by means of the form of Vishnu.

original: 'dis ni khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the Lord of the World in the form of Vishnu.

original: kha cig tu ni padma'i gdan gyi ni shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ster zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni padma'i gdan gyi ni shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ster zhes bya ba la /
translated: In some places, he is the peaceful body on the lotus seat, granting the unchanging.

original: tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa'i thar pa gsol ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa'i thar pa gsol ba'o //
translated: The Lord of the World in the form of Brahma has a peaceful body, granting the unchanging liberation.

original: padma'i gdan ni tshangs pa ste /
analyzed: padma'i gdan ni tshangs pa ste /
translated: The lotus seat is Brahma.

original: de'i gzugs 'gyur ba med pa ster ba kha cig tu mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i gzugs 'gyur ba med pa ster ba kha cig tu mdzad pa yin no //
translated: In some places, he grants the unchanging form of that.

original: 'dis ni tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug bstan to //
translated: This shows the Lord of the World in the form of Brahma.

original: kha cig tu ni shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug shin tu 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi gzugs te /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug shin tu 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi gzugs te /
translated: In some places, the form of the Lord of the Desire Realm, holding the form of the Queen of the Desire Realm, is the form of the pledge of the blazing of the Lord of the World.

original: kha cig tu ste sems can gyi khams mtha' yas ba 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir mdzad ba yin no //
analyzed: kha cig tu ste sems can gyi khams mtha' yas ba 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir mdzad ba yin no //
translated: In some places, in order to tame the infinite realm of sentient beings, he acts.

original: padma'i rgyal po bdag sgrubs shig //
analyzed: padma'i rgyal po bdag sgrubs shig //
translated: O King of Lotuses, please accomplish me!

original: ces bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slob dpon gyis bos nas gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slob dpon gyis bos nas gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: With this, the master invokes and supplicates the Blessed Noble Avalokiteśvara.

original: de ltar padma'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas da ni nor bu'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar padma'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas da ni nor bu'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the song of engagement of the Lotus Family, now, in order to teach the song of engagement of the Jewel Family, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nas nor bu'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, the Jewel Family, and so on.

original: dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las //
analyzed: dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las //
translated: All consecrations are from the excellent Lord.

original: zhes bya ba las dbang bskur ba yang de nyid yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dbang @51a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba las dbang bskur ba yang de nyid yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dbang @51a * //
translated: Since it is the consecration of all, and since it is all, it is the consecration of all.🔽It is the consecration of all, of both the mundane and supramundane.

original: bskur ba thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bskur ba'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: bskur ba thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bskur ba'i lha mo'o //
translated: It is the consecration of all, of both the mundane and supramundane.

original: de yis dbang phyug kyang yin la dam pa yang de nyid yin pas na dbang phyug dam pa ste /
analyzed: de yis dbang phyug kyang yin la dam pa yang de nyid yin pas na dbang phyug dam pa ste /
translated: Since it is the consecration of all, and since it is the best, it is the best consecration.

original: dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'o//
analyzed: dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'o//
translated: The best consecration of all is Ākāśagarbha.

original: khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas khams gsum pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas khams gsum pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since he has obtained the consecration of the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms, he is called the lord of the three realms.

original: rgyu de'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir /
translated: For this reason,

original: yang dbang sgrubs shig mi zad gter gyi mchog ces bya ba ni gter gyi lha mo'i gzugs kyis so //
analyzed: yang dbang sgrubs shig mi zad gter gyi mchog ces bya ba ni gter gyi lha mo'i gzugs kyis so //
translated: Again, the best inexhaustible treasure is the form of the treasure goddess.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: The best is the most excellent.

original: nor gyi phung po thams cad mtha' yas pa ni mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: nor gyi phung po thams cad mtha' yas pa ni mi zad pa'o //
translated: All the heaps of wealth are inexhaustible.

original: kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal mtho ba las //
analyzed: kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal mtho ba las //
translated: The one who is the supreme victory banner, the one who is the high victory banner,

original: zhes bya ba las kun mchog rgyal mtshan ni yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba las kun mchog rgyal mtshan ni yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no //
translated: The supreme victory banner is the wish-fulfilling victory banner.

original: des rnam par rgyal ba'i dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spang ba'o//
analyzed: des rnam par rgyal ba'i dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spang ba'o//
translated: By that, all the suffering of poverty is completely abandoned.

original: des nye bar mtshan pa'i sku mtho ba'i sku gang la yod pa de ni kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal mtho ba ste rgyal mtshan mchog ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshan pa'i sku mtho ba'i sku gang la yod pa de ni kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal mtho ba ste rgyal mtshan mchog ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: The one who is characterized by that, whose body is high, is the supreme victory banner, the high victory banner, the Akashagarbha who holds the form of the supreme victory banner.

original: rgyu de nyid kyi phyir /🔽rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu de nyid kyi phyir / rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod 'gyur //
translated: For that very reason,🔽he is the glorious vajra jewel, the one who is well worshipped.

original: zhes bya ba la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi mdangs dang ldan pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku ni dpal rdo rje rin chen te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi mdangs dang ldan pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku ni dpal rdo rje rin chen te /
translated: The body of the noble Akashagarbha, endowed with the radiance of the host of goddesses such as those of consecration, is the glorious vajra jewel.

original: bdag gis legs par mchod par gyur cig ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyis bod pa dang bcas pas de la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis legs par mchod par gyur cig ces bya ba ni slob dpon gyis bod pa dang bcas pas de la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: May I be well-worshipped means that the master, together with the disciples, has made a request to her.

original: de yang mchod pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi lha mos legs par mchod pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang mchod pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi lha mos legs par mchod pa yin te /
translated: And that is a good worship by the goddess whose nature is a great worship.

original: bdag la de'i ngo bor gyur cig ba'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bdag la de'i ngo bor gyur cig ba'o zhes bya'o //
translated: It is said, May I have her nature.

original: de ltar rin po che'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rin po che'i rigs kyis 'jug pa'i glu bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the song of engagement of the jewel family,

original: da ni ming po gsum la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir bhurbhu wa sva: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: da ni ming po gsum la 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir bhurbhu wa sva: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: now, in order to teach the song of engagement of the three brothers, [the Bhagavān] declares, bhur bhuvaḥ svaḥ.

original: sring mo rnams kyi glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir hri h'um shr'i bhyo zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: sring mo rnams kyi glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir hri h'um shr'i bhyo zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach the song of the sisters, [the Bhagavān] declares, hrīḥ hūṃ śrī bhyoḥ.

original: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu ni phu phu zhes bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu ni phu phu zhes bya bar gsungs so //
translated: The song of the nāga maṇḍala is declared as phu phu.

original: sdig pa thams cad ces bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad las byung ba'i rims la sogs te /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad ces bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad las byung ba'i rims la sogs te /
translated: All misdeeds are all the misdeeds that arise from the plague, etc.

original: badzra dha ra aa kra ma @51b zhes bya ba ni zung shig pa'o //
analyzed: badzra dha ra aa kra ma @51b zhes bya ba ni zung shig pa'o //
translated: Vajra-dhara akrama means seize!

original: we mardha zhes bya ba ni tshir cig pa'o //
analyzed: we mardha zhes bya ba ni tshir cig pa'o //
translated: Vamardha means tear it to pieces.

original: bi ki dzi bi ki ra zhes bya ba ni de dang der dor cig pa'o //
analyzed: bi ki dzi bi ki ra zhes bya ba ni de dang der dor cig pa'o //
translated: Vikir vikira means scatter it here and there.

original: banydza zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs choms shig pa'o //🔽autsha da zhes bya ba ni slar yang mi 'byung bar mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: banydza zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs choms shig pa'o // autsha da zhes bya ba ni slar yang mi 'byung bar mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Bhanja means break its color and shape.🔽 Utsada means do not let it arise again.

original: na sha ya zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med par mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: na sha ya zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med par mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Nasaya means do not let it arise again.

original: ha na zhes bya ba ni tshogs par mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: ha na zhes bya ba ni tshogs par mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Hana means gather it together.

original: da ha zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i mes thal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: da ha zhes bya ba ni khros pa'i mes thal bar mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Dah means burn it to ashes with the fire of wrath.

original: pa tsa zhes bya ba ni 'tshed cig pa'o //
analyzed: pa tsa zhes bya ba ni 'tshed cig pa'o //
translated: Pacati means cook it.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: khros pa zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bos snyoms bar zhugs pa'i yi ge h'um tsam gyis so //
analyzed: khros pa zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bos snyoms bar zhugs pa'i yi ge h'um tsam gyis so //
translated: With the mere syllable hum of the wrathful Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas, who is absorbed in union with his consort.🔽

original: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i glu bstan nas da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i glu bstan nas da ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the song of entry into the maṇḍala of all the clans, now, in order to teach the song of entry into the concise maṇḍala,

original: de nas thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, the supreme of all . . .”

original: la lar zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: la lar zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: “In some places . . .” and so forth.

original: la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyis sku ni rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyis sku ni rnam par mdzes //
translated: “In some places, the body is beautified by the light of a thousand stainless moon maṇḍalas.”

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs la lar dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong rnams kyi zla ba'i kha dog dang 'dra ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rnam par mdzes pa ste gsal zhing mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs la lar dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong rnams kyi zla ba'i kha dog dang 'dra ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku rnam par mdzes pa ste gsal zhing mdzes pa'o //
translated: In some places, the body of glorious Vajrasattva is beautified, that is, is clear and beautiful, with a radiance like the color of the moon of a thousand stainless moon maṇḍalas.

original: la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char kar byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs chen 'bar //
analyzed: la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char kar byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs chen 'bar //
translated: “In some places, the mass of light rays of the sun rising at the time of the destruction of the world burns with a great terror.”

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi ring por mi thogs par shar ba'i nyi ma bye ba rnams kyi 'od zer tshogs gang yin pa de dang de 'dra ba 'bar ba sngon po'i ngo bo ni 'jig rten gsum sreg par nus pa dang / rdo rje tri sh'u la 'dzin pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i skus phyogs la lar rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa'i dus kyi ring por mi thogs par shar ba'i nyi ma bye ba rnams kyi 'od zer tshogs gang yin pa de dang de 'dra ba 'bar ba sngon po'i ngo bo ni 'jig rten gsum sreg par nus pa dang / rdo rje tri sh'u la 'dzin pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i skus phyogs la lar rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
translated: The light rays of the myriads of suns that rise in the not too distant future of the time of destruction are like that, and the essence of that blazing blue is able to burn the three worlds.🔽In some directions, the body of Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas, holding a vajra and a trident, is beautiful.

original: phyogs la lar blta bas chog mi shes pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i 'bar ba'i mdangs kyis mdzes pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku 'chang ba /
analyzed: phyogs la lar blta bas chog mi shes pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i 'bar ba'i mdangs kyis mdzes pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku 'chang ba /
translated: In some directions, the body of Vajrasattva, holding a wheel, is beautiful with the radiance of blazing light endowed with light rays of the nature of the body that are inexhaustible to behold.

original: zag pa med pa'i bde ba ldan pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba'i sku rdo rje sems dpa' khyod rnam par mdzes pa yin no zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde ba ldan pa bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba'i sku rdo rje sems dpa' khyod rnam par mdzes pa yin no zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: You, Vajrasattva, are beautiful, endowed with uncontaminated bliss, the body that pacifies all afflictions together with their imprints.

original: mdzes pa'i gzugs @52a * //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i gzugs @52a * //
translated: Beautiful form

original: 'dzin pas na gzugs mdzes pa 'chang ba ste 'dod pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pas na gzugs mdzes pa 'chang ba ste 'dod pa'i lha'o //
translated: Because of holding, he is the bearer of beautiful form, that is, the god of desire.

original: mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang ba de nyid mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pas te des la lar rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang ba de nyid mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pas te des la lar rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
translated: Because of bearing beautiful form, he is the bearer of supreme luster, and by that he is beautiful in some places.

original: la lar rdo rje dang padma las byung ba'i gzugs kyis nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: la lar rdo rje dang padma las byung ba'i gzugs kyis nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad bzhugs pa'o //
translated: In some places, he is like space, existing in the form of the vajra and lotus.

original: gzugs thams cad bstan nas 'gro ba'i sems can 'dul bar mdzad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs thams cad bstan nas 'gro ba'i sems can 'dul bar mdzad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Having shown all forms, he is endowed with the diligence of taming sentient beings who are to be tamed.

original: sems can de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las sems rnam par sbyang ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' khyod bzhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las sems rnam par sbyang ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' khyod bzhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you, Blessed Vajrasattva, abide for the sake of purifying the minds of those sentient beings from all afflictions and secondary afflictions.

original: bdag kyang sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pas ma lus pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa bde ba dam pa rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag sgrubs zhes bya ba slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag kyang sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pas ma lus pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa bde ba dam pa rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag sgrubs zhes bya ba slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: Since I also belong to the class of sentient beings, for the sake of attaining the highest bliss of the experts in subduing all sentient beings without exception, I will accomplish myself. This is the request of the master to the Bhagavat.

original: de yang sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa la mkhas pa ni /
analyzed: de yang sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa la mkhas pa ni /
translated: Moreover, the expertise in subduing the entire realm of sentient beings is

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te /
translated: the glorious Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: ma lus pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa de rnams kyi bde ba dam pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: ma lus pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa de rnams kyi bde ba dam pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so //
translated: The highest bliss of those experts in subduing all sentient beings without exception is the mind and mental factors that have the nature of the beginningless and endless dharmadhatu.

original: de rdzogs pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das khyod bdag la sgrubs shig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de rdzogs pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das khyod bdag la sgrubs shig ces bya'o //
translated: For the sake of perfecting that, O Bhagavat, accomplish me!

original: de ltar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi glu bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the song of the concise mandala,

original: da ni glu de nyid kyis ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa ni thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges par gzung ba'i don du slar yang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni glu de nyid kyis ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa ni thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges par gzung ba'i don du slar yang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the song of entry into this mandala of the painting, in order to ascertain the meaning of “all are passionate,” and so forth, the song of entry into the secret mandala is taught again.

original: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de yang bshad zin to //
translated: Then, the supreme secret, the sublime rite, and so forth, have been explained.

original: de ltar rigs thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rigs thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the song of entry into the mandala of all the clans,

original: da ni dus kyi nges pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dus kyi nges pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the determination of the time,

original: dus gang la glu'i mchod pa 'di lta ste /🔽gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: dus gang la glu'i mchod pa 'di lta ste / gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis //
translated: the time for this song of offering is🔽the time of the various seals, such as the story, the insignia, and the seal.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya ba gang yin pa @52b de nyid ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab bas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya ba gang yin pa @52b de nyid ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab bas te /
translated: That which is to be offered with the various seals is taught by “then,” and so forth. The word “then” is in the proper context.

original: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i skabs 'dir ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i skabs 'dir ro //
translated: In this context of the worship of various seals, there is the seal of worship.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te der mchog tu gsang ba yin la /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te der mchog tu gsang ba yin la /
translated: The supreme secret rite is the secret mandala, and there is the supreme secret in that.

original: bla ma dam pa yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba bla ma dam pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba bla ma dam pa'o //
translated: And since the excellent guru is just that, there is the supreme secret excellent guru.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: And what is that?

original: dpal rang gi dam tshig ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: dpal rang gi dam tshig ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The glorious own commitment is the glorious Vajrasattva's secret mandala.

original: de bla na med pa mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das bde chen thar pa'i grong khyer du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bla na med pa mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das bde chen thar pa'i grong khyer du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o //
translated: That is the supreme secret unsurpassed worship with the vajra song. That is stated just as it is by the Blessed One in the city of liberation of great bliss, and so forth.

original: de yang shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is called the supreme accomplishment, because it grants the accomplishment of the glorious Vajrasattva's secret mandala, which is without beginning or end.

original: glu de blangs la phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bya ba yin no //
analyzed: glu de blangs la phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bya ba yin no //
translated: Having sung that song, one should make the offering of various symbolic gestures.

original: ci byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci byas nas she na /
translated: What is done?

original: mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa yang de nyid yin la rdo rje glu'i mchod pa yang de nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa yang de nyid yin la rdo rje glu'i mchod pa yang de nyid yin pas na /
translated: The supreme reality, etc. The supreme reality is that itself, and the offering of the vajra song is that itself,

original: mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pas te /🔽aom nam mkha'i skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
analyzed: mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pas te / aom nam mkha'i skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
translated: so it is the supreme reality, the offering of the vajra song of the sublime.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'o //
translated: The supreme reality, the offering of the vajra song of the sublime, is as follows: Om, because of being born from space, etc., as taught.

original: de dang bcas pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa dang rol mo'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: de dang bcas pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni mchog gi de kho na nyid dam pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa dang rol mo'i cho ga ste /
translated: Having that, the ritual of the song and music as explained, is the supreme reality, the offering of the vajra song and the ritual of music.

original: sngar bshad pa'i tshul de nyid kyis rjes su bsgrub par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i tshul de nyid kyis rjes su bsgrub par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: By that very method explained before, having accomplished the practice, one should practice as taught.

original: de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bskor ba'i gar dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas so sor bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bskor ba'i gar dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas so sor bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should accomplish each [deity] with the dance of the maṇḍala-wheel as previously explained and with the offerings of various mudras.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: It will be explained in this way.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pas sngon du bsnyen par byas nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su sbyang la /🔽slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sngon du spyod pa byas nas shin tu brlabs pa'i skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas @53a * //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pas sngon du bsnyen par byas nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su sbyang la / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas nas slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sngon du spyod pa byas nas shin tu brlabs pa'i skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas @53a * //
translated: Having performed the preliminary service by means of the meditation on the secret maṇḍala just as it is, one should draw the secret maṇḍala and train in the rite of entering, and so forth.

original: pas yi ge h'um gi glu'i cho ga dang rol mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid glu dang bcas pas rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: pas yi ge h'um gi glu'i cho ga dang rol mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid glu dang bcas pas rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: Having completed the rite of inducting the disciples, and so forth, one should perform the preliminary practice together with a group of disciples. Then, together with a group of men and women who are very powerful, one should practice with the rite of the song of the syllable hūṃ, the rite of music, and the reality of song.

original: de nas rdo rje glu'i mchod pa dkyil 'khor bskor ba'i gar gyis byas la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje glu'i mchod pa dkyil 'khor bskor ba'i gar gyis byas la /
translated: Then, having made the offering of the vajra song with the dance of the maṇḍala-wheel,

original: bcom ldan 'das bde chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu blangs te phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu blangs te phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa bya ba yin no //
translated: The Blessed One sang the song beginning “Great bliss” and so forth, and made the offering of various seals.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: And since he is the transcendent lord and all are just that, he is all transcendent lords.

original: de rnams kyi cho ga ni shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i lha thams cad kyi gzugs thams cad ston pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi cho ga ni shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i lha thams cad kyi gzugs thams cad ston pa'o //
translated: Their ritual is the secret, unsurpassed, all-realization, all-vajra-mind, all-form of the deity.

original: rang bzhin can gyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po rnams kyi cho ga ni phyag rgya sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'dis dpe tsam du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin can gyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po rnams kyi cho ga ni phyag rgya sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'dis dpe tsam du bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is the ritual of the various great commitments, which is the ritual of the accomplishment of the seal. This is taught as just an example,

original: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dngos po 'di thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dngos po 'di thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since the maṇḍala of all the families is also common to this matter.

original: sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni //
translated: By this ritual of the various

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas so //
translated: means the offering of various seals.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin //
translated: is the gathering of Vajrasattva.

original: zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the yoga of the secret mandala of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: kun mchog sna tshogs chen po'o //
analyzed: kun mchog sna tshogs chen po'o //
translated: The supreme of all, the great variety,

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa //
translated: the lord of yoga, is well accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba la kun mchog kyang yin la dbang phyug kyang yin pas na kun mchog sna tshogs chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la kun mchog kyang yin la dbang phyug kyang yin pas na kun mchog sna tshogs chen po'o //
translated: The supreme of all and the lord is the great variety.

original: de'i rnal 'byor ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The yoga of that is the essence of the concentration of the highest yoga.

original: des ni dbang phyug ni gzugs thams cad ston par byed pas sems can gyi don te sgrub par 'gyur ro //🔽da ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pas 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i rtogs pa rgyas pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des ni dbang phyug ni gzugs thams cad ston par byed pas sems can gyi don te sgrub par 'gyur ro // da ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pas 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i rtogs pa rgyas pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: By that, the lord, who displays all forms, accomplishes the benefit of sentient beings.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meaning of the extensive realization that was just explained, he says, “thus,” and so on.
