original: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa dang / mchod pa chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal mchog dang po'i rtogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa dang / mchod pa chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal mchog dang po'i rtogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
translated: Thus, by the method just explained, the one who is devoted to the yoga of the glorious Supreme Original Being, which has the nature of the great worship, etc., and which is the extensive rite of the realization of the Supreme Original Being, should summon all, etc.

original: des sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam rgyud can no //
analyzed: des sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam rgyud can no //
translated: The extensive rite which has the various stories is the various.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gtam rgyud can gyi cho ga rgyas pa nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gtam rgyud can gyi cho ga rgyas pa nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo ste /
translated: The extensive rite which has the various stories is the supreme play of the secret,

original: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: which has the nature of the worship of the various seals.

original: de nyid @53b dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de nyid @53b dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: That itself is glorious Vajrasattva.

original: dngos grub kyi nyams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi nyams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the experience of power.

original: de lta bu de ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa dang / rjes su sgrub pa dang / so sor rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa gang gis mngon du byed pa ni bsten pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu de ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa dang / rjes su sgrub pa dang / so sor rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa gang gis mngon du byed pa ni bsten pa ste /
translated: The one who actualizes such a one, by the method just explained, through the practice, the subsequent practice, and the individual subsequent practice, is the one who is devoted.

original: de dag la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos grub kyi bde ba chen po nyid thob pa yin no zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin can gyi dngos grub kyi bde ba chen po nyid thob pa yin no zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: They attain the supreme bliss of the great bliss of the spiritual powers, which has the nature of the bliss and mental bliss of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /🔽sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mtho ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i sku mtho ba dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag gis mchog gi dngos grub kyi bde ba chen po🔽nyid nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na / sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mtho ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i sku mtho ba dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag gis mchog gi dngos grub kyi bde ba chen po nyid nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: And how is that?🔽Those who have the exalted body of the various [deities], endowed with the lofty victory banners, experience the supreme bliss of the great bliss of the supreme spiritual powers.

original: don yod ces bya ba ni don yod pa yin te /
analyzed: don yod ces bya ba ni don yod pa yin te /
translated: The lofty victory banners are the various hand implements such as the vajra of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The exalted body is endowed with those.

original: mchog gi ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: The supreme is as explained before, without beginning or end.

original: bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad kyi dri ma sbyong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad kyi dri ma sbyong bar byed pa'o //
translated: Endowed with merit means purifying the stains of all misdeeds.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: cho ga zhes bya ba ni thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: cho ga zhes bya ba ni thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The rite is the nature of summoning all, and so on.

original: mchog tu rtag pa ni shin tu thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu rtag pa ni shin tu thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: Supremely constant means utterly beginningless and endless.

original: mchog tu rtag pa de gang gis sgrub par byed pa de dag gis shin tu dam pa 'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang phyug ci bder thob ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: mchog tu rtag pa de gang gis sgrub par byed pa de dag gis shin tu dam pa 'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang phyug ci bder thob ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Those who accomplish that supreme constancy attain the supreme, desired power of sovereignty, as they please.

original: kun mchog gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: kun mchog gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The supreme secret of all means the secret mandala.

original: de nyid dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad myur du sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dngos grub thams cad myur sgrub ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad myur du sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: That itself is the swift accomplishment of all powers, which is the swift accomplishment of all powers, such as Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i grong khyer mchog tu zhugs na sgrub pa po gang gis sgrub par byed pa de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dngos grub kyi dbang phyug gi bde ba rnams thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i grong khyer mchog tu zhugs na sgrub pa po gang gis sgrub par byed pa de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dngos grub kyi dbang phyug gi bde ba rnams thob pa yin no //
translated: When entering that supreme city, those who practice attain the bliss of sovereignty of the power of beginninglessness and endlessness.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste de rnams kho nas thob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no//
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste de rnams kho nas thob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no//
translated: The word “only” means “exclusively”; they are attained by just those, not by others.

original: sgrub pa po gang la sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan dag dang sgrub pa bdun gyis kyang 'grub par ma gyur pa dang / dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa'i bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / yo byad la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang med pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi dkyil @54a * //
analyzed: sgrub pa po gang la sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan dag dang sgrub pa bdun gyis kyang 'grub par ma gyur pa dang / dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa'i bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / yo byad la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang med pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi dkyil @54a * //
translated: For the adept who has not attained success by other means, even though he has performed the rite of practice for seven days, and who is not endowed with the merit that would perfect the powers, and who is also not endowed with the perfection of requisites, etc.,

original: 'khor du zhugs kyang grub par ma gyur pa dang / bsod nams med pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i sgrub pa po gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor du zhugs kyang grub par ma gyur pa dang / bsod nams med pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i sgrub pa po gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: even though he has entered the mandala of the supreme Vajrasattva, has not attained success, and is without merit and not endowed with perfection, if the adept desires this secret mandala, he will attain the powers that he seeks.

original: de'i phyir ma zhugs kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba kyang gi sgras bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma zhugs kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba kyang gi sgras bstan to //
translated: Therefore, even without entering, he will attain success. This is indicated by the word “even.”

original: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog / snying po sogs kyis ma grub na //
analyzed: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog / snying po sogs kyis ma grub na //
translated: If the supreme Vajrasattva is not accomplished by the essence mantra, etc.,

original: zhes bya ba la gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams kyis mchog ste phul du byung ba grub par ma gyur pa dang / aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa po la gal te grub par ma gyur na gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir sgrub pa po zhugs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams kyis mchog ste phul du byung ba grub par ma gyur pa dang / aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa po la gal te grub par ma gyur na gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir sgrub pa po zhugs te /
translated: If the Blessed One Vajrasattva, the supreme, the most excellent, is not accomplished by the seals, mantras, and awarenesses, and if the one to be accomplished, the practitioner, is not accomplished by the near essence mantra “Anurāgāya hūṃ,” then the practitioner who has entered this secret maṇḍala

original: nye ba'i snying po med na yang de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po med na yang de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: will accomplish it even without the near essence mantra.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du //
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du //
translated: In the glorious Supreme Original Tantra,🔽it is said:

original: de ltar myur du grub pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar myur du grub pa yin //
translated: “Thus, it is quickly accomplished.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so forth.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i rnam pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa gang yin pa des myur du grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i rnam pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa gang yin pa des myur du grub pa ma yin te /
translated: The accomplishment of the root tantra is not quickly accomplished by the method of accomplishment explained in the glorious Supreme Original Root Tantra.

original: ji ltar dang po'i khang par lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa po ji ltar grub pa de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud la grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dang po'i khang par lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa po ji ltar grub pa de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud la grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as the glorious Vajrasattva in the center of the four goddesses in the first house is accomplished, so the glorious Supreme Original Root Tantra is not accomplished.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa yis //
translated: By accomplishing all mandalas,

original: de ltar thams cad grub pa min //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad grub pa min //
translated: all are not accomplished in that way.

original: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga gzhan dag gis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de ltar grub par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga gzhan dag gis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de ltar grub par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: By other ritual methods of accomplishing the feats of accomplishing all mandalas except for the secret mandala, the great seal and so forth are not accomplished in that way.

original: ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa mchog 'di mthong ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa mchog 'di mthong ba nyid kyis so //
translated: By merely seeing this supreme secret mandala palace.

original: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan pa dang / slob dpon la brnyas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyus spangs pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan pa dang / slob dpon la brnyas pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyus spangs pa ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
translated: Those who have not entered the mandala are abandoned due to the cause of violating the commitments, such as showing the mudra of vajra and bell, and having a nature of despising the master, etc. This is violating the commitments.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa smod pa ni sgrib pa @54b thams cad kyis smad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa smod pa ni sgrib pa @54b thams cad kyis smad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, condemned by all obscurations means condemned by the obscurations of affliction, etc.

original: bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those touched by demons, etc.,

original: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad kyis reg pa gang yin pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad kyis reg pa gang yin pa de dag kyang /
translated: are those touched by the eighteen grahas taught in the Vairocana Tantra.

original: gal te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas sgrub par byed na nges pa kho nar grol bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gal te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas sgrub par byed na nges pa kho nar grol bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: If they enter the secret mandala and practice, they will definitely be liberated.

original: / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rtag pa'o //
analyzed: / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rtag pa'o //
translated: It is permanent without beginning or end.

original: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am //
translated: Those who have not entered the mandala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gzhan du ma bsgrubs pa'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gzhan du ma bsgrubs pa'am /
translated: In this way, those who have not accomplished the maṇḍala elsewhere,

original: dkyil 'khor ma grub pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ma grub pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ste /
translated: or have not accomplished the maṇḍala, they also enter the secret maṇḍala.

original: gal te sgrub par byed na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed na myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they practice, they will quickly attain power.

original: de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: What is the reason for that?

original: bsgrub bya min 'dir cung zad med //
analyzed: bsgrub bya min 'dir cung zad med //
translated: There is nothing here that is not to be accomplished.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this way, because in this secret maṇḍala there is nothing at all that is not to be accomplished, such as the great seal, etc.

original: las ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: las ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The action is of various kinds.

original: bde ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ste bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ste bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The bliss is mundane and supramundane. There is nothing that is not to be accomplished.

original: de'i phyir grub pa'i las kyi bde ba rnams /
analyzed: de'i phyir grub pa'i las kyi bde ba rnams /
translated: Therefore, the blissful actions that are accomplished

original: rtogs pa thams cad las nye bar thob pas na bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa thams cad las nye bar thob pas na bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: should be practiced, because they are obtained from all realizations.

original: de ltar sgrub par byed pa po la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar sgrub par byed pa po la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the one who practices in this way will accomplish all the powers such as the Great Seal and so forth four times.

original: de ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This will be explained.

original: rtogs pa gzhan rnams la gang zhig phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub zla ba bzhis 'grub par 'gyur ba de nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa gzhan rnams la gang zhig phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub zla ba bzhis 'grub par 'gyur ba de nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na zla ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: For those who have other realizations, the power of the Great Seal will be accomplished in four months, and for those who have entered the secret mandala, it will be accomplished in one month.

original: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The extensive rite of the disciples' entrance and so forth is complete.

original: // / slar yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir cho ga thams cad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / slar yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir cho ga thams cad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, in order to clarify again, all the rites should be explained.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag bsrung ba dang / gnas bsrung ba dang / khrus dang ji skad bshad pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byas la /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag bsrung ba dang / gnas bsrung ba dang / khrus dang ji skad bshad pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byas la /
translated: As before, one should protect oneself, protect the place, bathe, and adorn oneself with the garments and ornaments as explained.

original: rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang bas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang bas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'am /
translated: Holding the vajra and bell, in a place that is agreeable to the mind, one should invite the Blessed Vajrasattva together with his retinue,

original: gcig pu lugs ma'am brdungs ma la sogs pa'i dngos po bzhugs @55a * //
analyzed: gcig pu lugs ma'am brdungs ma la sogs pa'i dngos po bzhugs @55a * //
translated: or alone, in the form of an image, a cast image, or the like.

original: su gsol la slar yang bdag bsrung ba byas la /
analyzed: su gsol la slar yang bdag bsrung ba byas la /
translated: Having again performed self-protection,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i mchod pa lngas yongs su bsangs la /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i mchod pa lngas yongs su bsangs la /
translated: one should purify with the five divine offerings water scented with good fragrance, completely suffused with the Vajrayakṣa mantra.

original: rdo rje me lan gsum yongs su bzlas la /
analyzed: rdo rje me lan gsum yongs su bzlas la /
translated: Having completely suffused it with the Vajra Fire mantra three times,

original: me tog la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis slar yang yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis slar yang yongs su bzlas te /
translated: one should again completely suffuse it with the awareness mantras of flowers and so forth.

original: aargha'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um lan bdun bzlas pa aargha la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas nas bzhag ste /
analyzed: aargha'i phyag rgyas yi ge h'um lan bdun bzlas pa aargha la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas nas bzhag ste /
translated: Having completely suffused the argha and so forth with the argha mudra and the syllable hūṃ repeated seven times,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i khang pa'i sgor yongs su bsang ba'i phyir bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri bzangs kyi chu lha'i khang pa'i sgor yongs su bsang ba'i phyir bzhag ste /
translated: one should place it at the door of the divine abode, completely suffused with the Vajrayakṣa mantra and scented with good fragrance, for the sake of purification.

original: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
analyzed: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
translated: Always holding the vajra and bell,

original: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
analyzed: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
translated: Summoning all, and the great worship,

original: bdag byin brlab sogs bsgrub pa yis //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab sogs bsgrub pa yis //
translated: and the practice of self-consecration, and so on,

original: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should accomplish the supreme attainment.

original: de la dang po yi ge h'um brjod cing dang po'i rdo rje bcings te sa la bzhag la /
analyzed: de la dang po yi ge h'um brjod cing dang po'i rdo rje bcings te sa la bzhag la /
translated: There, first of all, one should recite the syllable hūṃ, bind the original vajra, and place it on the ground.

original: aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ;
analyzed: aa nu ra ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ;
translated: Reciting “anu-rāgāya hūṃ,” one should complete the secret maṇḍala.

original: phun sum tshogs pa yod na me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing 'tshal te /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa yod na me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing 'tshal te /
translated: If there is abundance, one should worship with flowers and so on, and eat.

original: sngom pa gzung ba'i bar mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar byas la /
analyzed: sngom pa gzung ba'i bar mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar byas la /
translated: Having performed the concluding rite up to the taking of vows, one should bind the mudrā up to the pledge vajra-fist mudrā.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstod pa snga ma bzhin rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya bstod pa snga ma bzhin rjes su spyad la /
translated: One should perform the praise of all maṇḍala mudrās as before.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind the great mudrā of glorious Vajrasattva just as it is.

original: de nas yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis bzhugs te /
analyzed: de nas yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis bzhugs te /
translated: Then, with the mind, one should imagine that the deities equal with space are situated on the moon at one’s heart in the manner of being equal with space.

original: dang po'i rdo rjes der gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rjes der gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la /
translated: The first vajra should complete the secret mandala there.

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga rdzogs nas /
translated: Having completed the rite up to the end of the spiritual powers and vajra conduct,

original: dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga na gnas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khongs su chud par bsams la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga na gnas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi khongs su chud par bsams la /
translated: one should imagine that mandala situated at one’s heart, included within the moon mandala.

original: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas skabs su yi ge hr'i: las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma rnams rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas skabs su yi ge hr'i: las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma rnams rdzogs par byas te /
translated: In the place of all the deities in one’s body, one should imagine that the various lotuses arisen from the syllable hriḥ are complete.

original: brten pa'i lus po'i phyi rol gyi mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan gyi steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sprul te /
analyzed: brten pa'i lus po'i phyi rol gyi mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan gyi steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sprul te /
translated: In front of the outer body of the support, on a seat of a variegated lotus, one should emanate Śrī Vajrasattva and so forth, just as previously explained.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi @55b phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi @55b phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang dbang du byas nas /
translated: Having summoned and caused to enter with the karma mudras such as the vajra hook, and having bound and controlled,

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis blta bar byas la /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis blta bar byas la /
translated: one should view with one's pledge mudras.

original: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings nas /🔽dza: dpa' mchog dang po rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings nas / dza: dpa' mchog dang po rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Having bound the secret hook,🔽one should summon with the song, Ja: Supreme hero, first vajra holder,

original: zhes bya ba'i glus 'khor dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi lus la rang gi gnas su bcug la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i glus 'khor dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi lus la rang gi gnas su bcug la /
translated: and one should cause Vajrasattva with retinue to enter one's body at one's place.

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rab tu bsgrubs la /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rab tu bsgrubs la /
translated: Having accomplished with one's pledge mudras,

original: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brten pa'i lus dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku la rab tu bcug ste /
analyzed: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brten pa'i lus dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku la rab tu bcug ste /
translated: one should seal with the Dharma, action, and great seal mudras, and as before, one should cause all tathagatas to enter the body of reliance and the body of Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dang po'i yi ge rdo rjes snying ga dang / smin mtshams dang / mgrin pa dang spyi bor rang gi bdag nyid de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dang po'i yi ge rdo rjes snying ga dang / smin mtshams dang / mgrin pa dang spyi bor rang gi bdag nyid de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas nas /
translated: Having sealed with the four seals, one should bless oneself as Vajrasattva at the heart, between the eyebrows, at the throat, and at the crown, with the first letter of the mantra.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba blangs te /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba blangs te /
translated: Having stabilized with the hundred-syllable mantra, one should take the empowerment of the five buddhas with the empowerment of the crown, with the mudra of empowerment.

original: yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bdag nyid go bgos nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig rnams blangs te dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa dang / rjes su sgrub pa byas nas rang gi snying gar snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la lha dgod pa'i cho gas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar rnams rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgod par byas nas de bzhin
analyzed: yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bdag nyid go bgos nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig rnams blangs te dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa dang / rjes su sgrub pa byas nas rang gi snying gar snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la lha dgod pa'i cho gas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar rnams rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgod par byas nas de bzhin
translated: Having donned the armor of the two syllables, one should take the reality, doctrine, and pledge [empowerments], and having made the offering of the song of the three sacred commitments, and having accomplished the subsequent practice, one should complete the mandala in one’s heart, as before, and having arrayed the deities with the rite of arraying, one should array Vajrasattva and so on up to Vajraghanta with one’s own mudras.

original: du / badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum brjod cing de'i don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: du / badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum brjod cing de'i don gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: Recite the three essences beginning with vajra ātmā ko and meditate on their three meanings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor bdag yin no zhes bya ba rang nyid kyis brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid nges par byas nas lha mo thams cad kyi snying gar gnas
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor bdag yin no zhes bya ba rang nyid kyis brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid nges par byas nas lha mo thams cad kyi snying gar gnas
translated: Saying I am the maṇḍala of the great pledge of all tathāgatas, one should ascertain oneself as the nature of the secret maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um rnam par bsams te /
analyzed: pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um rnam par bsams te /
translated: In the center of the vajra in the heart of all goddesses, one should visualize the syllable hūṃ.

original: de nyid yid kyis rdo rje'i ngag gam rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag gis brjod cing /
analyzed: de nyid yid kyis rdo rje'i ngag gam rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag gis brjod cing /
translated: With that mind, one should recite the vajra speech, or the speech of the joy of the vajra, thinking, I am the vajra speech of all tathāgatas.

original: ji srid du nyin re lan cig bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya ste /🔽ji srid mngon du gyur pa bzhin du nyin re @56a * //
analyzed: ji srid du nyin re lan cig bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya ste / ji srid mngon du gyur pa bzhin du nyin re @56a * //
translated: As long as one meditates once a day, preceded by the self-consecration,

original: bsgom pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: as long as one meditates once a day, one will see the maṇḍala.

original: de nas de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should accomplish the superknowledges by the method taught in the Compendium of Principles.

original: de ltar mchog tu bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mchog tu bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In this way, one will have performed the supreme approximation.

original: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sgom pa nas brtsams la de ji srid du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par byas te ji srid mngon du mthong bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sgom pa nas brtsams la de ji srid du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par byas te ji srid mngon du mthong bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, beginning with the cultivation of the three meditative stabilizations, one should cultivate this maṇḍala until one sees it in actuality.

original: de nas de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Then, in the same way, one should accomplish the superknowledges.

original: yang na tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshul gyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshul gyis sngon du bsnyen pa byas la mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Alternatively, having performed the approximation by means of the method of the gaṇacakra, one should accomplish the superknowledges.

original: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
analyzed: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
translated: Then, in a three-storied house as previously described, one should adorn oneself with the ornaments of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas ji lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang / gzhal yas khang pa dang / gdan rnams rdzogs par byas la brla gnyis la dril bu gnyis bcings te /
analyzed: sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas ji lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang / gzhal yas khang pa dang / gdan rnams rdzogs par byas la brla gnyis la dril bu gnyis bcings te /
translated: Having performed the rite up to the taking of vows, one should complete the great yoga, the celestial mansion, and the seats, binding the two bells to the two thighs,

original: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: and sitting in the hero's cross-legged posture in the center, one should generate enthusiasm.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang bar byas la yan lag gis phyag byas la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang ; las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang bar byas la yan lag gis phyag byas la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang ; las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should invite all the Ones-Gone-Thus, make obeisance with one's limbs, and meditate on the supreme king of mandalas and the supreme king of actions.

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la yi ge h'um brjod cing de la brtson pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la yi ge h'um brjod cing de la brtson pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, binding the great seal, one should recite the syllable hūṃ and, striving at that, meditate on the secret mandala.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to draw the secret mandala of all Ones-Gone-Thus,

original: bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that one has made a request to oneself.

original: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
translated: With the words, “Great passion, great bliss,

original: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
translated: I request you, O Blessed One,

original: snying po 'di yi rtogs pas ni //
analyzed: snying po 'di yi rtogs pas ni //
translated: By the realization of this essence,

original: bde ba chen po myur sgrub byed //🔽ces bya ba'i tshig 'dis so //
analyzed: bde ba chen po myur sgrub byed // ces bya ba'i tshig 'dis so //
translated: May I quickly accomplish great bliss.”

original: de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar byas nas /
analyzed: de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar byas nas /
translated: Then, having arisen and having bowed to the feet of all the Ones-Gone-Thus,

original: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
analyzed: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
translated: one should say, “I am myself the one with a vajra,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so forth, up to

original: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: “I am the lord, the great vajra.”

original: de la dang po'i rdo rjes /
analyzed: de la dang po'i rdo rjes /
translated: There, with the first vajra,

original: h'um badzra tishtha sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i ma h'a sa ma ya mandala au da tha pa ya zhes brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bteg la /
analyzed: h'um badzra tishtha sarba ta th'a ga ta shr'i ma h'a sa ma ya mandala au da tha pa ya zhes brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bteg la /
translated: one should say, “Hum, vajra tiṣṭha sarva tathāgata śrī mahā samaya manḍala udghāṭaya,” and having lifted up the secret mandala,

original: nam @56b mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs su gsol te snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes gnas bzhir yi ge h'um dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: nam @56b mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs su gsol te snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes gnas bzhir yi ge h'um dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Having requested them to remain in the direction of space, as before, with the first vajra one should bless the four places with the syllable hūṃ and Vajrasattva, etc.

original: slar yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: slar yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Again, having formed the great seal,

original: badzra tishtha ma ta ces bya ba mig gnyis su rnam par bsams la /🔽phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin las ;
analyzed: badzra tishtha ma ta ces bya ba mig gnyis su rnam par bsams la / phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin las ;
translated: one should visualize vajra tiṣṭha mam in both eyes.

original: / kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
analyzed: / kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
translated: One should look all around🔽from the place of the seal,🔽and,

original: yi ge h'um ni brjod bya zhing //
analyzed: yi ge h'um ni brjod bya zhing //
translated: uttering the syllable hūṃ,

original: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: one should circle around in a majestic manner.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i dngos po'i dkyil 'khor bkug la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i dngos po'i dkyil 'khor bkug la /
translated: Then, as previously explained, one should summon the mandala of the secret things,

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: and having blessed them with the seal of blessing,

original: snga ma bzhin du phur bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du phur bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should drive in the daggers as before.

original: de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang / sgo bcad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ba thams cad byas la /
analyzed: de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang / sgo bcad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi srung ba thams cad byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the expulsion of obstructors, etc., and having closed the doors and protected the mandala,

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgo yongs su bsang ba'i don du bzhag la /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgo yongs su bsang ba'i don du bzhag la /
translated: The vase completely filled with the vajra-yakṣa mantra is placed for the purpose of sprinkling the door of the maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o //
translated: The ground of the maṇḍala is anointed with fragrant water completely filled with the vajra-yakṣa mantra.

original: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po rnams kyis lan bdun gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i dri'i mandala rnams lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po rnams kyis lan bdun gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i dri'i mandala rnams lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su bya'o //
translated: Then, the fragrant maṇḍalas, which are completely filled with the essence mantras of Śrī Vajrasattva and so forth, are recited seven times and should be made in all the places of all the deities.

original: mandala de rnams la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi snyid po bkod la /
analyzed: mandala de rnams la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi snyid po bkod la /
translated: In those maṇḍalas, Śrī Vajrasattva and so forth are arranged in their own places.

original: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la phyi rol du gtor ma byin la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa de'i cho gas lhag par gnas par byas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du bzhag nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
analyzed: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la phyi rol du gtor ma byin la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang / rdo rje sems dpa' rnams so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa de'i cho gas lhag par gnas par byas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du bzhag nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
translated: Having made offerings with the five offerings and given an external bali, one should consecrate the vase of victory endowed with the characteristics as explained above, which has been enchanted one hundred and eight times with each of the mantras of Vajrayakṣa, Vajra-fire, and Vajrasattva, and place it in front of Śrī Vajrasattva.🔽

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyi re re zhing yang mar la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyi re re zhing yang mar la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: Having made offerings with the five offerings, having given an external bali, having performed the consecration of the vase with the characteristics as explained, having recited Vajra-Yamari, Vajra-Agni, and Vajrasattva each 108 times, having performed the consecration ritual of that vase, having placed it in front of glorious Vajrasattva, having performed fire-offering oblations of ghee, etc., each 108 times for Vajra-Yamari, Vajra-Sattva, and Buddha-Locana,

original: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod cing phyag byas nas /
analyzed: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod cing phyag byas nas /
translated: then, having praised with the 108 names, having made offerings to the Bhagavat together with the retinue with the offering of the 12 seals, having made prostrations,

original: bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon phul la slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mchod yon phul la slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
translated: Having made an offering to the Blessed One, the disciples should be consecrated.

original: de bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, they should be consecrated.

original: slar yang @57a * //
analyzed: slar yang @57a * //
translated: Again,

original: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
translated: having made obeisance to the Blessed One, having praised with the one hundred and eight names,

original: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing phyag byas te /
analyzed: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing phyag byas te /
translated: having made offerings with an offering to the gurus, having made offerings and obeisance,

original: zab pa dang rgya chen po'i chos slob ma rnams la bstan par byas la /
analyzed: zab pa dang rgya chen po'i chos slob ma rnams la bstan par byas la /
translated: having taught the profound and extensive Dharma to the disciples,

original: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i mthar rmi lam brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i mthar rmi lam brtag par bya'o //
translated: the master together with the assembly of disciples should examine the dream at the end of the mandala base.

original: de nas skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su mal nas langs te snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: de nas skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su mal nas langs te snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Then, at the time of dawn, having risen from bed, having performed the great yoga as before,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas de bzhin du nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas de bzhin du nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: at the time of sunrise, having placed the mandala in the sky with the rite of the great mandala of Vajrasattva, one should lay out the lines.

original: de nas de bzhin du rdul tshon bkye bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du rdul tshon bkye bar bya ste /
translated: Then, having arranged the colored powders in the same way,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi lte ba la lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas bris la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi lte ba la lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas bris la /
translated: in the center of the mandala, one should draw the four goddesses in union.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris de shar phyogs su mngon par phyogs par bzhag la /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris de shar phyogs su mngon par phyogs par bzhag la /
translated: One should place the painting of glorious Vajrasattva facing east.

original: aom su ra ta stvam h'um zhes bya bzlos shing nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
analyzed: aom su ra ta stvam h'um zhes bya bzlos shing nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
translated: Reciting “Oṃ suratastvaṃ hūṃ,” one should lower it from the sky

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ras ris de la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ras ris de la dgod par bya'o //
translated: and place it in the painting of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams kyis so //
translated: One should also draw Rāgavajrā and so forth with the essence mantras taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: de la g-yas phyogs na bzhugs pa'i k'i li k'i las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas spro ba bskyed par 'gyur bar bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la g-yas phyogs na bzhugs pa'i k'i li k'i las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas spro ba bskyed par 'gyur bar bri bar bya'o //
translated: To the right of that, one should draw Kali Kali embracing Bhagavān Vajrasattva, encouraging him.

original: k'i li k'i la'i g-yas phyogs na 'dod chags rdo rje ma ste /
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i g-yas phyogs na 'dod chags rdo rje ma ste /
translated: To the right of Kali Kali is Rāgavajrā.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i gzhu blangs te /🔽phyag g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' gsor ba la brtson pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i gzhu blangs te / phyag g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' gsor ba la brtson pa'o //
translated: In her left hand she holds a bow with a vajra fist.🔽With her right hand she is ready to shoot an arrow with a single-pronged vajra head.

original: rdo rje dran ma ni phyag g-yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dran ma ni phyag g-yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste /
translated: Vajrasmrti holds a crocodile banner in her left hand.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs su 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs su 'khyud pa'o //
translated: On the left side of the Blessed One, she embraces the Blessed One with a proud hand.

original: rdo rje dran ma'i g-yon logs su rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dran ma'i g-yon logs su rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma ste /
translated: On the left side of Vajrasmrti is Vajrarati.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas bsnyems pa mdzad nas phyag g-yas pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te des bcom ldan 'das bsnun par mdzad par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas bsnyems pa mdzad nas phyag g-yas pas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te des bcom ldan 'das bsnun par mdzad par bri bar bya'o //
translated: With her left vajra fist with a vajra bell, she is proud. With her right hand she holds a flower garland and with it she strikes the Blessed One.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshams rnams su //
translated: In the directions of Vajrasattva

original: dus kyi mchod pa dgod par bya //
analyzed: dus kyi mchod pa dgod par bya //
translated: one should place the seasonal offerings.

original: rab tu dga' ma'i dga' ba dang // spyan dang @57b de bzhin dpal chen mo //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ma'i dga' ba dang // spyan dang @57b de bzhin dpal chen mo //
translated: The joy of supreme joy, the eye, and likewise the great glory,

original: me tog spos dang mar me che //
analyzed: me tog spos dang mar me che //
translated: Flowers, incense, and great lamps,

original: dri rnams steng du ka pu tas //
analyzed: dri rnams steng du ka pu tas //
translated: And scents above, with kapotas.

original: lha mo rdo rje rgyal mo rnams //
analyzed: lha mo rdo rje rgyal mo rnams //
translated: The goddesses, the vajra queens,

analyzed: badzra gha nte ho: zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis bri bar bya ste /

analyzed: spyan ma dang / glu ma dang / lcags sgrog ma rnams ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs pa'i mdog can no //

analyzed: dpal chen mo dang / gar ma dang / dril bu ma'i sku mdog ser mo'o //
translated: The goddesses Mahāśrī, Nṛtyā, and Ghaṇṭā have a yellow complexion.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala in that way,

analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te sgo dbye bar bya ste /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrahūṃkāra, one should enter as before and open the door.

original: slar yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: slar yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgoms te /

original: 'dud pa byas nas mtshan brgya rtsas bstod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dud pa byas nas mtshan brgya rtsas bstod par bya'o //
translated: Having bowed, one should praise with the one hundred names.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
translated: Then, in front of the Blessed Vajrasattva, one should sit in the bodhisattva posture.

original: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings te /

analyzed: dza mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyan 'dren pa'i glus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
translated: one should summon the Blessed One together with the retinue with the song of invocation beginning with “Jaḥ, supreme first…” and so forth.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis sgo rnams bcad la /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis sgo rnams bcad la /
translated: Having caused the Blessed One to enter the maṇḍala, one should expel obstructors with Vajrayakṣa and so forth, and having closed the doors with the two vajra fists,

original: rdo rje go chas go bkon nas yi ge h'um brjod cing @58a * //
analyzed: rdo rje go chas go bkon nas yi ge h'um brjod cing @58a * //

original: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
translated: Having offered water for the feet to the Blessed One together with the retinue,

analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /

original: de la bcom ldan 'das dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang / rab tu dga' ma dang / sgeg mo dang / lcags kyu ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //

translated: Therein, the Blessed One, Rāgavajrā, Pramuditā, Lāsya, and Ānkuśī are conferred initiation with the seal of the crown of the tathāgata Akṣobhya.

original: k'i li k'i la dang / dga' ma dang / bzhad ma dang / zhags pa ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la dang / dga' ma dang / bzhad ma dang / zhags pa ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Kilikīlā, Nandā, Hāsā, and Pāśā are conferred initiation with the seal of the crown of the tathāgata Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: rdo rje dran ma dang / spyan ma dang / glu ma dang / lcags sgrog ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dran ma dang / spyan ma dang / glu ma dang / lcags sgrog ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Vajra-Smṛti, Locanā, Gītā, and Śṛṅkhalā are empowered with the crown seal of Amitābha.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / dpal chen mo dang / gar ma dang / rdo rje dril bu ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par grub pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / dpal chen mo dang / gar ma dang / rdo rje dril bu ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa don yod par grub pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Vajra-Kāmadhenu, Mahāśriī, Nartī, and Vajra-Ghaṇṭā are empowered with the crown seal of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas mchod yon phul ba bum pa gang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de nas mchod yon phul ba bum pa gang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, having offered a welcome drink, one should make offerings to the Blessed One and his retinue with all the offerings such as the full vase, and so forth.

original: phyi rol du gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //

analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje me dang / sangs rgyas spyan rnams kyis de bzhin du sbyin sreg byas te /

original: thab khung gi dbus su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa yi ge h'um la sogs pa brjod cing me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bkod la /
analyzed: thab khung gi dbus su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa yi ge h'um la sogs pa brjod cing me tog gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bkod la /
translated: In the center of the hearth, having recited the syllables hūṃ and so forth, one should arrange the glorious Vajrasattva together with his retinue in the manner of a flower mandala.

translated: Then, having recited the syllable hūṃ, one should perform the fire sacrifice of each substance, such as ghee, one hundred and eight times.🔽Then, having recited the syllables hūṃ and so forth, one should perform the fire sacrifice seven times with each essence mantra of Rāgavajrā and so forth.

original: snying po rnams kyis bdun bdun bsreg / de nas yi ge h'um la sogs pa brjod cing me tog dag kho nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu byas te /

translated: Then, having recited the syllables hūṃ and so forth, one should perform the fire sacrifice with just flowers, having made one with the drawn mandala of the glorious Vajrasattva and so forth.

analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi gdong g-yogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas la /

analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngom pa snga ma bzhin du blangs nas /

analyzed: aom sarba yo gtsi tta au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed nas /
translated: Having generated the thought of great enlightenment with Om sarva yogicitta utpathaye,

analyzed: g-yas @58b pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs te / rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um gis bkod la 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: one should take up the first vajra with the right vajra fist.

original: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
analyzed: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho //
translated: Having arranged the syllable hum at one's heart, one should say, Surate samayas tvam hoḥ.

original: badzra siddhe ya th'a su kham zhes bya'o //
analyzed: badzra siddhe ya th'a su kham zhes bya'o //

original: de nas sgo'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chu g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis blangs pa des yi ge h'um brjod cing bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de nas sgo'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chu g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis blangs pa des yi ge h'um brjod cing bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
translated: Then, having taken up the water of the vase that is outside the door with the right vajra fist, one should confer empowerment upon oneself with that, saying the syllable hum.

analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan can gyi rdo rje shugs kyis /
translated: With the vajra impulse that has the characteristics as explained,

original: rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: one should dance with the vajra dance posture,

original: spyi bor me tog ka su ta //
analyzed: spyi bor me tog ka su ta //
translated: and with the flower of the kasuta at the crown of one's head,

original: rdo rje glu yis gar bya zhing //
analyzed: rdo rje glu yis gar bya zhing //
translated: one should dance with the vajra song,

original: grong khyer du ni rab 'jug bya //
analyzed: grong khyer du ni rab 'jug bya //
translated: and enter the city.

original: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
translated: The delightful bliss of all powers,

original: thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /
analyzed: thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /

original: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
translated: By the supreme bliss of the holy attainment,

analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu grub par mdzod // ces bya ba dang / shar gyi sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i snying po brjod cing rdo rje lcags kyu mas bdag nyid bkug par bsam par bya'o //
translated: JAH HUM BAM HO: be accomplished!🔽 And from the eastern door, one should recite the essence mantra of Vajra Hook and imagine that one is drawn in by Vajra Hook.

original: de nas lho'i sgo nas de bzhin du 'jug pa dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //🔽de nas de bzhin du nub kyi sgo nas 'jug pa dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //

translated: Then, in the same way, one should enter through the southern door and recite the essence mantra of Vajra noose.🔽Then, in the same way, one should enter through the western door and recite the essence mantra of Vajra chain.

analyzed: de nas slar yang byang gi sgo nas de bzhin du 'jug pa dang / rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, again, one should enter through the northern door in the same way and recite the essence mantra of Vajra bell.

original: slar yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, again, having entered through the eastern door in the same way, one should say this:
