analyzed: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
translated: The supreme equality of all is clear.

original: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra ni dril bu sgrogs pa yin no zhes bya bas dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra ni dril bu sgrogs pa yin no zhes bya bas dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing //
translated: The sound like this is the ringing of the bell, and so one should ring the bell.

original: de'i sgra la lhag par mos par bya pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgra la lhag par mos par bya pa yin no //
translated: One should have superior devotion to that sound.

original: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
translated: Thus one should ring the Dharma-bell.

original: zhes bya ba bstan nas /🔽dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bstan nas / dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis rlobs shig ces bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having taught that,🔽in order to teach this rite, namely,

original: de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the consecration of the great pledge seal, he declares, Then, the vow of the three great pledges.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word then is as before.

original: chen po yang de yin la dam tshig gsum yang de yin pas na dam tshig chen po gsum ste /
analyzed: chen po yang de yin la dam tshig gsum yang de yin pas na dam tshig chen po gsum ste /
translated: It is great, and it is the three pledges, and so it is the three great pledges.

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i gsang ba'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi sku'i gsang ba'o //
translated: It is the secret body of the Three Jewels.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi bsgom pa ni sdom pas te de brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi bsgom pa ni sdom pas te de brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The meditation on its nature is the vow, and that is to be expressed, is the remainder of the pledge.

original: longs spyod kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na longs spyod kun te /
analyzed: longs spyod kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na longs spyod kun te /
translated: Since they are enjoyments and all, they are all enjoyments.

original: rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin no //
translated: They are the nature of the form of all the deities of the clan.

original: de rnams longs spyod pa ni de'i rang bzhin la lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams longs spyod pa ni de'i rang bzhin la lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment of them is the imagination of their nature.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of exclusion.

original: longs spyod thams cad la longs spyod par byed par 'gyur ba kho nas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: longs spyod thams cad la longs spyod par byed par 'gyur ba kho nas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One should enjoy all enjoyments, and only those.

original: de dag gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba brjod cing rang nyid mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba brjod cing rang nyid mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: One should make offerings to the Three Jewels, and one should make offerings to oneself.

original: de dag khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality of those enjoyments?

original: bsten pa ste bsgom par bya ba rnams kyis so //🔽rang gi bdag nyid las su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsten pa ste bsgom par bya ba rnams kyis so // rang gi bdag nyid las su gyur pa'o //
translated: They are to be cultivated, that is, they are to be cultivated in meditation.

original: bdag @65a * //
analyzed: bdag @65a * //
translated: They are one’s own nature, that is, they are one’s own nature as an agent.

original: nyid ni byed par gyur pas so //
analyzed: nyid ni byed par gyur pas so //
translated: One’s own nature is one’s own nature as an agent.

original: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'o //
translated: The offering to the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha is the offering to the Three Jewels.

original: mchog ni dam pas te nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas brjod pa ni bsam zhing bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa 'dis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o ;
analyzed: mchog ni dam pas te nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas brjod pa ni bsam zhing bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi so sor rtog pa'i mchod pa 'dis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o ;
translated: The supreme is the best. One should worship oneself with this offering of discernment, which has the nature of reflection and meditation, by means of the inner expression described above.

original: / dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sngom pa 'di las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: / dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sngom pa 'di las ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the vow of the three great commitments?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The accomplishment of the yoga of the Tathagatas.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po ni rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po ni rnal 'byor te /
translated: The great seal of Vairochana and so forth, the Tathagatas, is yoga.

original: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Its accomplishment is the cause of perfection.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod pas /
translated: The yogi of the Tathagatas, who wishes to accomplish his own great seal of the Tathagatas,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la /
translated: should hold the vajra of reality just as it is,

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: and ring the bell of reality.

original: de nas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la ;
analyzed: de nas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la ;
translated: Then, having formed the great seal of one's Tathāgata,

original: gzugs gang dang gang gis sems can gdul bar 'gyur pa'i gzugs de dang de rnams kyis rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs gang dang gang gis sems can gdul bar 'gyur pa'i gzugs de dang de rnams kyis rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: one should apply oneself with whatever form one's disciples are to be converted by.

original: de nas bdag nyid kyis bya ba byas pa lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs par bsams la bzlas pa'am bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid kyis bya ba byas pa lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs par bsams la bzlas pa'am bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: Then, having contemplated the Tathāgata as if one's own work were done, one should recite or meditate.

original: thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni //
analyzed: thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni //
translated: By this method's rite

original: zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig gzung ba'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs kyi cho gas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig gzung ba'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs kyi cho gas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
translated: . The five sense objects, by the method's rite which has the nature of the reality, the Dharma, and the pledge, are Vairocana, Akṣobhya, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi.

original: don yod grub pa rigs dang bcas pa rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don yod grub pa rigs dang bcas pa rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will succeed even if one enjoys the five sense objects taught in the tantra of the hard-to-penetrate secret of Amoghasiddhi and his family.

original: kyang gi sgras ni gcig la yang ngo zhes bstan to //
analyzed: kyang gi sgras ni gcig la yang ngo zhes bstan to //
translated: The word “even” indicates that one will succeed even if one enjoys the five sense objects of a single family.

original: bza' min pa yang bza' byas na //
analyzed: bza' min pa yang bza' byas na //
translated: Having eaten what is not to be eaten,

original: zhes bya ba la ba'i bar bya bas na bza' ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ba'i bar bya bas na bza' ba ste /
translated: “What is not to be eaten” is that which is to be eaten,

original: rnal 'byor pas rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar byas la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar byas la /
translated: that is, the yogin, having filled the realm of space with the forms of the deities of his own family’s maṇḍala,

original: de'i sems can gyi khams ma lus par rang rang gi rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su byas te /
analyzed: de'i sems can gyi khams ma lus par rang rang gi rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su byas te /
translated: having made the entire realm of sentient beings the forms of the deities of his own family’s maṇḍala,

original: rang gi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: should meditate on their nature. This is the meaning.

original: bza' bar bya ba ma yin @65b pas na bza' bar mi bya ba ste /
analyzed: bza' bar bya ba ma yin @65b pas na bza' bar mi bya ba ste /
translated: “What is not to be eaten” is that which is not to be eaten,

original: rigs gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs rnams so //
analyzed: rigs gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs rnams so //
translated: that is, the forms of the deities of other families’ maṇḍalas.

original: bza' bar mi bya ba de rnams kyang bza' zhing rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: bza' bar mi bya ba de rnams kyang bza' zhing rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should also eat those things that should not be eaten, and one should meditate on oneself as having the nature of the deities of the mandala of the five families.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rtag pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste de rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rtag pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste de rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogis and yoginis will attain the eternal, i.e., beginningless and endless, accomplishment of the Tathagatas, which is characterized by Buddhahood.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum ni de yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum ni de yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The three, such as reality, etc., are the three great pledges of the utmost secret of all Tathagatas, which are those.

original: de ltar brjod nas zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar brjod nas zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bstan nas /
translated: Having thus spoken, i.e., having taught the disciples by the master,

original: snying po byin pa de dag phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la sogs pa slob tu bcug nas /
analyzed: snying po byin pa de dag phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la sogs pa slob tu bcug nas /
translated: those to whom the essence has been given, having been made to learn the binding of the great seal, etc.,

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho gas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho gas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, the master together with the assembly of disciples should accomplish the powers of the great seal, etc. , as desired, by the rite of the accomplishment of the secret mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams la snying po byin nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes tshigs su bcad pa gzhan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi slob dpon te des sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams la snying po byin nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes tshigs su bcad pa gzhan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi slob dpon te des sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then, etc. , after giving the essence, the knowledge of the four seals is in another verse. The master of the vajra holder of the Tathagata is the master of the yoga of the Tathagata. He should give the knowledge of the four seals.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni //
translated: Having worshipped with vajra worship.

original: zhes bya ba la ro dang bza' ba dang rnam par rol pa dang / glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par byas na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ro dang bza' ba dang rnam par rol pa dang / glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par byas na'o //
translated: Having made the mandala with the worship of taste, food, play, song, music, etc.

original: de nas ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: Then, how should one act?

original: ci 'dod spyod pa'i mchod pa yis //
analyzed: ci 'dod spyod pa'i mchod pa yis //
translated: With the worship of whatever is desired.

original: slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug / ces bya ba la phyi'i me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis slob ma'i tshogs thams cad mchod pa byad du gzhug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug / ces bya ba la phyi'i me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis slob ma'i tshogs thams cad mchod pa byad du gzhug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: All the disciples should be made to offer worship means that all the disciples should be made to offer worship with the external flowers, etc., and with the twelve offerings of the consorts such as Rāgavajrā.

original: longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang //🔽zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang // zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: Although one enjoys all enjoyments,🔽one does not become defiled means that one does not become defiled by the faults of the enjoyments, such as attachment, etc.

original: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu pa la'o //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu pa la'o //
translated: The word also is for the purpose of including the other enjoyments.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas she na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas she na /
translated: What kind of special quality does one have?

original: dkon mchog gsum la phul ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phul ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having offered to the Three Jewels means

original: mdzes pa'i dkon mchog gsum ni dkon mchog @66a * //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i dkon mchog gsum ni dkon mchog @66a * //
translated: the Three Jewels are rare,

original: ste ; sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ste ; sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: having the nature of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dkon mchog gzhan thams cad las phul du byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dkon mchog gzhan thams cad las phul du byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are supreme over all other jewels.

original: de las sprul pa'i longs spyod la longs spyod pa rnams ni phyi'i rin po che la sogs pa thams cad kyi rang gi bdag nyid dang / gzhan rnams 'dod pas te /
analyzed: de las sprul pa'i longs spyod la longs spyod pa rnams ni phyi'i rin po che la sogs pa thams cad kyi rang gi bdag nyid dang / gzhan rnams 'dod pas te /
translated: and others enjoy them by desire.

original: gal te mngon par 'dod na yang dag par mchod na slob dpon de ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub cing grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mngon par 'dod na yang dag par mchod na slob dpon de ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub cing grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one desires to worship the master, then the master will accomplish and attain the powers as one desires.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa bral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho gas thams cad rjes su spyad nas /🔽rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa bral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho gas thams cad rjes su spyad nas / rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la /
translated: Having performed everything as before, up to the conclusion of the rite of freedom from sin,

original: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /🔽rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
analyzed: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la / rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
translated: one should visualize the syllable bhrūṃ in one’s heart on a vajra.🔽One should sit in the vajra posture,

original: rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du blta ba skyil mo krung gi steng du yang dag par bzhag la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du blta ba skyil mo krung gi steng du yang dag par bzhag la /
translated: and having placed the upward-facing vajra fist on the crossed legs,

original: rdo rje'i dbus su bkod pa'i snying po de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbus su bkod pa'i snying po de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med pa bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on the reality of the absence of self in all phenomena, mentally reciting the essence mantra arranged in the center of the vajra.

original: dbyangs bcu drug dang bcas ba'i de nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can du rang gi sems bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs bcu drug dang bcas ba'i de nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can du rang gi sems bsam par bya'o //
translated: From that reality together with the sixteen vowels, one should imagine one’s mind in the nature of a moon disc.

original: slar yang de'i steng du snying po de nyid kyis mngon par bris la /
analyzed: slar yang de'i steng du snying po de nyid kyis mngon par bris la /
translated: Again, on top of that, one should imagine the essence mantra itself.

original: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste /🔽slar yang snying po de dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste / slar yang snying po de dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: From that together with the syllables ka and so forth, there is a second moon disc.🔽Again, from that together with the essence mantra, there is the vajra of the tathāgatas.

original: slar yang snying po de rdo rje'i dbus su rnam par bsams la rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgom zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i khams de rnams rdo rje las spros te /
analyzed: slar yang snying po de rdo rje'i dbus su rnam par bsams la rdo rje'i nga rgyal bsgom zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i khams de rnams rdo rje las spros te /
translated: Again, having imagined that essence mantra in the center of the vajra, one should meditate on the pride of the vajra, and those vajra constituents of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas emanate from the vajra.

original: de dag gis sems can gyi don bya ba la slar yang rdo rje'i yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis sems can gyi don bya ba la slar yang rdo rje'i yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
translated: With those, one should again engage in the welfare of sentient beings with a vajra mind.

original: de nas rdo rje de la aom bh'um kham zhes bya ba bzlos shing /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje de la aom bh'um kham zhes bya ba bzlos shing /
translated: Then, on that vajra, one should recite Oṃ bhrūṃ khaṃ.

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: One should visualize oneself as the nature of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha.

original: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite “Mahāsamayasattva ham.”

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog bcings nas sa ma ya ham zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog bcings nas sa ma ya ham zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having bound the supreme body of all tathāgatas, one should recite Samaya ham.

original: de nyid kyi snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su sa ma ya stvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba rang gi bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab @66b par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su sa ma ya stvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya ba rang gi bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab @66b par bya'o //
translated: At the heart, the ūrṇā, the throat, and the crown of one’s head, one should consecrate oneself with “Samayasattva adhiṣṭhāna svā maṃ.”

original: de nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyag rgya chen po /
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyag rgya chen po /
translated: Then, with the great mudra of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha,

original: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba bzlas shing bcing par bya'o //
analyzed: aom bh'u kham zhes bya ba bzlas shing bcing par bya'o //
translated: one should bind with the recitation of “Oṃ bhrūṃ khaṃ.”

original: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bskyed la /
translated: Then, on the moon at one's heart, one should generate the secret mandala of the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha, the vajra wheel seal.

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug par rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug par rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: One should perform all the rites, such as the self-admittance, up to the end of the vajra conduct for spiritual powers.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the great yoga taught in the Great Mandala of the Tathāgatas.

original: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, one should perfectly worship oneself with the twelve offerings such as the vajra weapon seal.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba sngon du bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba sngon du bya ste /
translated: Having performed the prostrations taught in the Great Mandala of the Tathāgatas,

original: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig rnams la ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgom ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig rnams la ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgom ste /
translated: one should meditate on the three samādhis of reality, Dharma, and commitment.

original: slar yang 'dus pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: slar yang 'dus pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
translated: Again, one should perform the rite of the assembly, and so forth, and

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyin re zhing de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyin re zhing de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: one should cultivate this secret mandala every day for as long as one can.

original: ji srid du nyin re zhing de bzhin du mngon du gyur pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du nyin re zhing de bzhin du mngon du gyur pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: To the extent that one cultivates it every day, to that extent one will see it as it is.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Then, having drawn the mandala of Vajrasattva just as it is,

original: de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i 'khor lo zlum po ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa bris te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i 'khor lo zlum po ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa bris te /
translated: in the center of it one should draw a round wheel with a garland of three-pointed vajras, beautified with eight pillars.

original: ras la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dkon mchog gsum bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ras la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dkon mchog gsum bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the cloth, in the center of the mandala, on a seat of a variegated lotus, one should draw the Three Jewels with characteristics as previously explained.

original: de nyid kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi ru rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje sngar bshad pa'i snying po bzhis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi ru rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje sngar bshad pa'i snying po bzhis bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the four corners of the inner maṇḍala, one should draw a vajra, a jewel, a lotus, and a crossed vajra, with the four essence mantras as previously explained.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnam bu'i mtshams bzhi po la snga ma bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rnam bu'i mtshams bzhi po la snga ma bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the four corners of the outer maṇḍala, one should draw the four beginning with the Lady of Charisma, as before.

original: sgo rnams su lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgo rnams su lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: At the gates, one should draw the four beginning with the Hook Lady, with the essence mantras as taught in the Great Maṇḍala of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i 'dus pa dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / dgug pa la @67a * //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i 'dus pa dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / dgug pa la @67a * //
translated: Then, in the manner taught in the Secret Maṇḍala of Vajrasattva, one should draw the assembly taught in the Great Maṇḍala of All Tathāgatas, the one hundred and eight names, and the summoning,

original: sogs pa'i cho ga byas la rang 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i cho ga byas la rang 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the ritual of the preliminary practices, one should perform the extensive ritual of the self-entry and the entry of the disciples, and so forth.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin ni mchog tu gsang ba'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin ni mchog tu gsang ba'o //
translated: The chapter called “The Supremely Secret Ritual” is about the nature of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha of all the tathāgatas, which is supremely secret.

original: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i rtogs pa ste /
translated: Its ritual is the realization of the practice and the practitioner.

original: de yang yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: And that is to be known as being complete.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dkon mchog gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las dkon mchog gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the maṇḍala of the secret of the Three Jewels from the commentary called The Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom, a commentary on the Śrīparamādya.

original: // / de ltar myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa la /
analyzed: // / de ltar myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa la /
translated: Having taught the maṇḍala of the Tathāgata’s painting for quickly accomplishing siddhis,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
translated: now, in order to teach the maṇḍala of the Tathāgata’s image, [the Bhagavān] says, “The maṇḍala of the Tathāgata’s image,” and so forth.

original: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa la myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa la myur du dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the secret mandala of the blazing Vajra Sun, which quickly brings about the attainment of powers for the Vajra family yogi,

original: de nas rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po mchog gi cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po mchog gi cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, the supreme rite of the great, wrathful king of wrathful ones.”

original: de nas kyi sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs kho na la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs kho na la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is immediately after the first application.

original: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'o //🔽chen po yang de yin la khro bo'i rgyal po yang de nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'o // chen po yang de yin la khro bo'i rgyal po yang de nyid yin pas na /
translated: Here, the samādhi of the first application is taught in the secret mandala of glorious Vajrasattva.🔽It is great and it is the king of wrathful ones,

original: rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po ste /
translated: thus it is the great, wrathful king of wrathful ones.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: The Bhagavān is the blazing Vajra Sun.

original: de'i mchog kyang de yin la gsang ba'i cho ga yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ste bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i ngo bor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i mchog kyang de yin la gsang ba'i cho ga yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ste bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i ngo bor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: It is the supreme of those, and it is also the secret rite, thus it is the supreme secret rite, the secret mandala that is the nature of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: yi ge h'um brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: yi ge h'um brjod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rdzogs par byas la /
translated: Reciting the syllable hūṃ, one should complete this secret mandala.

original: lha thams cad kyi snying po brjod cing rang rang gi gnas su lha thams cad kyi gzugs dgod cing drangs te /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi snying po brjod cing rang rang gi gnas su lha thams cad kyi gzugs dgod cing drangs te /
translated: Reciting the essence mantras of all the deities, one should place the forms of all the deities in their respective places, and summon them.

original: 'di ni 'dir ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second meditative stabilization here.

original: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsung pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsung pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, having gone through the gathering, one should understand the speech.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the three meditative stabilizations,

original: da ni ras la bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs @67b pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni ras la bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs @67b pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
translated: now, beginning with “one should draw the Bhagavān on cloth,” he will explain the ritual of the master’s acts and the ritual of inducting the disciples, and so on.

original: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri par bya'o //
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala according to the rite, one should draw the Blessed One, the blazing Vajrasūrya, on the center of the central maṇḍala.

original: mchog ces bya ba 'di phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba 'di phul du byung ba'o //
translated: The “supreme” is the most excellent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir gsang ba'i cho ga 'di rgya che ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mdor bsdus pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa de'i phyir mchog ste phul du byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsang ba'i cho ga 'di rgya che ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mdor bsdus pas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa de'i phyir mchog ste phul du byung ba yin no //
translated: Because this secret rite, for those who are afraid of the fear of the vast, is the completion of the attainment of all the Vajra family by means of the concise, therefore it is the supreme, the most excellent.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba de'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan gcig kho na'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs dag la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten par bri par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba de'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan gcig kho na'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs dag la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten par bri par bya'o //
translated: On the single multicolored lotus seat of that blazing Vajrasūrya, one should draw the Vajraḍākinīs standing on his right and left sides, supported by his halo of light.

original: de la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, one should draw the great seal of Vajra-Sūrya-Jvalana, as taught in the great maṇḍala.

original: de'i lha mo dang po ni dmar ba dang dkar pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lha mo dang po ni dmar ba dang dkar pa'o //
translated: His first goddess is red and white.

original: gnyis pa ni thal ba ltar dkar pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni thal ba ltar dkar pa'o //
translated: The second is white like ashes.

original: gsum pa ni dkar pa dang ljang ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni dkar pa dang ljang ba'o //
translated: The third is white and green.

original: bzhi pa ni gser ltar dri ma med pa'i sku mchog can bri bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug grub //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni gser ltar dri ma med pa'i sku mchog can bri bar bya'o // rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug grub //
translated: The fourth should be drawn with a body of supreme, stainless gold.🔽The Lord of Caṇḍa-Vajra is accomplished.

original: ces bya ba la kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma ste de grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma ste de grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The Lord of Caṇḍa-Vajra who holds the khaṭvāṅga is accomplished, i.e., perfected.

original: de nyid rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste ;
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste ;
translated: One should draw her with an upraised vajra khaṭvāṅga.

original: rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'i sku gang la mnga' ba de ni kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'i sku gang la mnga' ba de ni kha tv'am ga bsgreng ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: One who has a body with an upraised vajra khaṭvāṅga is one with an upraised khaṭvāṅga.

original: de ni thal ba ltar sku mdog dkar ba bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ni thal ba ltar sku mdog dkar ba bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su bri bar bya'o //
translated: He is white like ashes and should be painted to the right of the Blessed One.

original: de'i yang g-yas logs su dmar ba dang dkar ba'i sku mdog can mda' 'dzin pa rdo rje 'dod pa me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ming can /
analyzed: de'i yang g-yas logs su dmar ba dang dkar ba'i sku mdog can mda' 'dzin pa rdo rje 'dod pa me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ming can /
translated: To his right, one should paint Vajrarati, blazing with fire, who holds an arrow and has a body that is red and white.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gis gzhu 'dzin cing g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' bstod pa la brtson pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gis gzhu 'dzin cing g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda' bstod pa la brtson pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: With her left hand she holds a bow and with her right hand she is intent on drawing an arrow with a single-pointed vajra head.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje khyab 'jug ma ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rdo rje khyab 'jug ma ste /
translated: To the left of the Blessed One is Vajraviṣṇu.

original: sku mdog dkar ba dang ljang ba dang ; phyag g-yon gyi sor mo dbus ma'i rtse mos rdo rje 'khor lo bstod pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: sku mdog dkar ba dang ljang ba dang ; phyag g-yon gyi sor mo dbus ma'i rtse mos rdo rje 'khor lo bstod pa la brtson pa /
translated: She is white and green and with the tip of the middle finger of her left hand she is intent on drawing a vajra wheel.

original: phyag g-yas bas gden  la brten pa dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas bas gden  la brten pa dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: With her right hand she is holding a banner.

original: de'i g-yon logs su dri ma med pa'i gser gyi sku mdog can /
analyzed: de'i g-yon logs su dri ma med pa'i gser gyi sku mdog can /
translated: To her left is Vajraśrī, whose body is the color of stainless gold.

original: rdo rje dril bu'i ba dan zhes bya ba'i lha mo rdo rje dril bu @68a * //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu'i ba dan zhes bya ba'i lha mo rdo rje dril bu @68a * //
translated: The goddess called “Banner of Vajra and Bell”🔽

original: dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnyems pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnyems pas bzhugs pa /
translated: The goddess called Vajra-Ghanta-Pataka, with a vajra fist on the left, stands with pride,

original: phyag g-yas pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i ba dan 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: holding a banner with a bell in the right hand.

original: de dag thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo khrung gis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo khrung gis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: All of them sit in the sattva posture.

original: cung zad ma che ba gtsigs pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad ma che ba gtsigs pa'o //
translated: They are not very large, and they bare their fangs.

original: khro dang bcas pa'i zhal bshad pa //
analyzed: khro dang bcas pa'i zhal bshad pa //
translated: They are described as having wrathful faces,

original: rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing //
analyzed: rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing //
translated: their minds focused on their own selves,

original: sku ni zur gyis phyogs par bzhugs //
analyzed: sku ni zur gyis phyogs par bzhugs //
translated: their bodies standing obliquely.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir sprul pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir sprul pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The essence that accomplishes all the activities of emanation and so forth in this secret mandala is the syllable hūṃ.

original: nye ba'i snying po ni hi ste lha thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po ni hi ste lha thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The quintessence is hi, which is for all the deities.

original: de la ya ge h'um gis bsgrub pa ni phra mo'i cho ga gnyis pa las 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba de nyid 'dir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la ya ge h'um gis bsgrub pa ni phra mo'i cho ga gnyis pa las 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba de nyid 'dir shes par bya'o //
translated: The accomplishment by the syllable hūṃ is to be understood here as just that which will be explained later in the second minor rite of the subtle.

original: nye ba'i snying po'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir mnyam po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir mnyam po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to explain the accomplishment of the quintessence, [the Bhagavān] declares evenness, etc.

original: de la mnyam po ni dus gcig tu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dril bu la sogs pa'i rol mo brdungs shing /
analyzed: de la mnyam po ni dus gcig tu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dril bu la sogs pa'i rol mo brdungs shing /
translated: There, evenness is the simultaneous playing of the music of the bell with the vajra, etc.,

original: slob ma'i tshogs mkhas pa dang bcas pas yi ge h'um gi glu dang rol mo bya zhing zur bzhi pa'i glu'i sbyor ba nye bar mtshon pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni zur bzhi pa ste rab tu grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slob ma'i tshogs mkhas pa dang bcas pas yi ge h'um gi glu dang rol mo bya zhing zur bzhi pa'i glu'i sbyor ba nye bar mtshon pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni zur bzhi pa ste rab tu grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the singing of the song of the syllable hūṃ by the assembly of disciples together with the adept. The adept who is characterized by the application of the song of the four corners will become accomplished in the four corners.

original: de ltar yang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dngos grub kyis te /
analyzed: de ltar yang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dngos grub kyis te /
translated: Thus, by the power of the accomplishment of the vajra sun blazing like fire,

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no //
translated: this is the rite of repetition in this secret maṇḍala of the vajra sun blazing like fire.

original: gnas gang du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: gnas gang du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ras la bri bar bya ste /
translated: In whatever place the Blessed One Vajra-Sun-Blazing-Like-Fire is painted on cloth,

original: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
translated: having imagined that wheel,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i 'khor lo de ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i 'khor lo de ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: in the Blessed One Vajra-Sun-Blazing-Like-Fire, just as explained, that blazing wheel is the secret mandala.

original: de nyid dam pa ni phul du byung bas te /
analyzed: de nyid dam pa ni phul du byung bas te /
translated: That itself is supreme, because it is excellent.

original: brtags pa ni yang dag par brtags nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
analyzed: brtags pa ni yang dag par brtags nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
translated: Having imagined, having correctly imagined, having drawn the secret mandala,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the Blessed One should be painted in the center of the mandala. This is the meaning.

original: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhe na /
translated: Here, if one asks, how should one know the mandala rite just as it is?

original: mtshon cha mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mtshon cha mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The supreme weapon, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni mtshon cha dam pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni mtshon cha dam pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: The rite of the Blessed One Vajra-Being, the secret mandala rite, is the supreme weapon rite.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa'i cho ga @68b des rdo rje'i rigs dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'dir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa'i cho ga @68b des rdo rje'i rigs dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'dir shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand all the extensive rites of summoning and so forth of the Vajra Family by this rite of the sequence of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i rigs las gsungs pa rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum bo rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bshad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i rigs las gsungs pa rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum bo rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams la bshad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having practiced all the rites of self-entry and so forth taught in the Vajra Family in the manner taught in the Secret Mandala of Vajrasattva, and all the rites of inducting disciples and so forth, the vajra master should explain the three, reality and so forth, to the disciples.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word thereupon means immediately.

original: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshigs ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig rnams so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshigs ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig rnams so //
translated: Reality, Dharma, and commitment are the realities, Dharmas, and commitments.

original: de rnams kyi cho gas sbyin pa ni cho ga rab tu sbyin pas te slob ma rnams la man ngag sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi cho gas sbyin pa ni cho ga rab tu sbyin pas te slob ma rnams la man ngag sbyin pa'o //
translated: The gift of the rite is the gift of the rite of initiation to the disciples.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu chags pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu chags pa ste /
translated: The reality realm, which is characterized by the absence of beginning and end, is always attached to the compassion that is characterized by the absence of objective referents.

original: de las byung ba ste skye ba gang la yod pa de rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ste skye ba gang la yod pa de rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: The one who has arisen from that, who has been born from that, is always attached to the wrathful one who is born from the reality realm.

original: de'i rdo rje me'i phung bo ni rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje me'i phung bo ni rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba'i tshogs te /
translated: The mass of his vajra fire is the mass of the blazing vajra fire.

original: de'i rang bzhin can gyi sku ni sku rnams nyid de /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can gyi sku ni sku rnams nyid de /
translated: The body that has that nature is the bodies themselves.

original: de dag gang yin zhe na //
analyzed: de dag gang yin zhe na //
translated: What are they?

original: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ste /
translated: The vajra fire is the vajra fire of the vajra sun.

original: de'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma ni de las byung pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po thams cad phyogs bcu dang nam mkha'i khams la bzhugs pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma ni de las byung pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po thams cad phyogs bcu dang nam mkha'i khams la bzhugs pa'o ;
translated: The great yoginīs of that are all the great seal vajra families, such as the vajra sun blazing like fire, and so on, abiding in the ten directions and the realm of space.

original: /'bar ba zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: /'bar ba zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: “Blazing” means that they are unimpeded by the forms of subduing the wicked.

original: de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya ba la de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya ba la de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid shes par bya ste /
translated: “That is the vajra family” means that the reality of the vajra should be known in this way.

original: lhag par mos pa 'dis de gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa 'dis de gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that “this should be grasped by this resolute faith.”

original: de ltar de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan nas chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan nas chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, having taught that “the vajra should be grasped by this reality,” the meaning is that “the Dharma bell should be rung.”

original: de nas chos zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas chos zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Then, “Dharma” is stated.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: “All have the characteristic of space.”

original: nam mkha'i yang ni mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yang ni mtshan nyid med //
translated: “Space also has no characteristic.”

original: ces bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad @69a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad @69a * //
translated: The equality of space is the thusness of all phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: which is the nature of the absence of entities.

original: de bzhin nyid ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: The mind and mental factors that are of one taste with thusness are the application of the equality of space.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: One who has that is endowed with the application of the equality of space.

original: des thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: des thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: By that, all is the great seal, and so forth.

original: myur ba ni myur ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i yin te /
analyzed: myur ba ni myur ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i yin te /
translated: Swift is the one who accomplishes quickly.

original: de ltar dril bu sgra bsgom zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dril bu sgra bsgom zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should meditate on the sound of the bell and ring the bell.

original: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol //
translated: Thus, one should ring the Dharma bell.

original: zhes bya bas bstan nas /
analyzed: zhes bya bas bstan nas /
translated: Having taught with that,

original: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher byin gyis brlabs zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher byin gyis brlabs zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the consecration of the great seal with the pledge,

original: nam mkha' kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha' kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, the supreme of all spaces, and so forth.

original: thams cad kyang de yin la nam mkha' yang de nyid yin pas na thams cad nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de yin la nam mkha' yang de nyid yin pas na thams cad nam mkha' ste /
translated: Since everything is that and space is that, everything is space.

original: rdzas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems so //
analyzed: rdzas thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems so //
translated: The mind is clear light by nature, equal to space, the nature of the non-existence of the entities of all things.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba'o //
translated: The samadhi having the aspect of that is the yoga of everything is space supreme.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba des 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas mngon du bya zhing /
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la thams cad nam mkha'i mchog gi sbyor ba des 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba nang du brjod pa'i rnam pas mngon du bya zhing /
translated: Everything is space means that by the yoga of everything is space supreme, all things, compounded and uncompounded, are equal to space.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i chos dang / las dang dam tshig dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa ni rang gi rang bzhin du byas pa'i 'jig rten gsum yang sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i rang bzhin can za ba ni snang bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i chos dang / las dang dam tshig dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa ni rang gi rang bzhin du byas pa'i 'jig rten gsum yang sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i rang bzhin can za ba ni snang bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The three worlds, which are of the nature of the nether world, the earth, and the sky, are sealed by the vajra seals of the nature of the vajra family, such as the Vajra Sun Blazing Like Fire, and so on, of the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal, which are made into one's own nature.

original: yang gi sgras ni phyogs gcig gi dngos po shin tu za bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni phyogs gcig gi dngos po shin tu za bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The word also indicates that one should consume the entities of the single part.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
translated: The dakinis of vajra yoga are the great seals of the vajra family.

original: de dag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i nye par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar dka' ba'i nye par sbyor ba'o //
translated: Their supreme secret commitment is the difficult-to-transgress union.

original: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This explains the meaning as follows:

original: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: One should hold the vajra with the suchness mudra and ring the bell of Dharma.

original: de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas @69b kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par rnam par bsams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang
analyzed: de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas @69b kyi dngos po thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par rnam par bsams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kyi rang
translated: Then, having formed the great seal of Vajrasūrya-tejorāśi, and so on, one should contemplate all conditioned and unconditioned things as being the same as space, and imagine the entire world as having the nature of the Vajra Family, as one's own form.

original: bzhin can bdag nyid kyi gzugs su bsams te bsgom par bya'o //🔽cho ga 'di zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang / dam tshig gzung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mchog thams cad de /
analyzed: bzhin can bdag nyid kyi gzugs su bsams te bsgom par bya'o // cho ga 'di zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang chos dang / dam tshig gzung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mchog thams cad de /
translated: One should meditate.

original: ma lus pa bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ma lus pa bsgrub par bya ba ni rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: This rite is all the supreme characteristics of the commitments of reality, the Dharma, and the commitments, and should be accomplished means should be completed.

original: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni sems rtse gcig ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni sems rtse gcig ba'o //
translated: Very concentrated means one-pointed mind.

original: bsgrub par bya ba de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that which is to be accomplished?

original: kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The supreme of all and so on.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi chos dang / las dang dam tshig dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnams ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi chos dang / las dang dam tshig dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnams ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams so //
translated: The accomplishments of the Vajra Family are the great accomplishments, which are supreme among all, and the accomplishments of the Dharma, Action, and Observances of the Vajra Family, and of the Great Seal of the Vajra Family.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i las brgya la sogs pa'i rgyun ni las kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i las brgya la sogs pa'i rgyun ni las kyi tshogs so //
translated: The collection of rites is the continuous performance of the hundred rites of the Vajra Sun Blazing Fire and so forth.

original: kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams dang / las kyi tshogs ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i las kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: kun mchog dngos grub chen po rnams dang / las kyi tshogs ni kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i las kyi tshogs so //
translated: The collection of rites of the great accomplishments, which are supreme among all, is the collection of rites of the great accomplishments, which are supreme among all.

original: de yang mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said to be inexhaustible, which is to be accomplished without beginning or end.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang phyag rgya rnams kyi gong du nye bar bsdu ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang phyag rgya rnams kyi gong du nye bar bsdu ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Then, just as before, having made the offering of the fore-gathering with one's own seals by the method of the Tathagata,

original: rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
translated: one will be completely successful.

original: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This explains the meaning of this.

original: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas rdo rje nyi ma med ltar 'bar ba rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas rdo rje nyi ma med ltar 'bar ba rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: Having performed all the rites up to the final rite of extracting the sin as before, one should meditate on the blazing Vajrasūrya.

original: dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
translated: Having consecrated the pledge-being,

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should bind the great seal of Vajrasūrya.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rdzogs par byas nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang 'jug pa'i cho ga snga ma🔽bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rdzogs par byas nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang 'jug pa'i cho ga snga ma🔽bzhin du byas la /
translated: Then, having made the secret maṇḍala of Vajrasūrya in one’s heart as before, having completed the seal of the vajra wheel, one should perform the rite of one’s own entrance as before up to the final rite of the spiritual powers of the vajra conduct.

original: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lha rnams kyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rang gi lus la bcug ste /🔽phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la 'jig gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang / dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @70a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lha rnams kyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rang gi lus la bcug ste / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la 'jig gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang / dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @70a * //
translated: Having performed the great yoga of the deities taught in the great maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, the Gnosis of the Three Vajras, one should cause the body of all tathāgatas to enter one’s body.

original: pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba thams cad bzung la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
analyzed: pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba thams cad bzung la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
translated: Having sealed it with the four seals, one should be empowered by the seal of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds, and by the first vajra, and so on, as before, one should take the empowerment of self-consecration, and one should take the vajra conduct of spiritual powers.

original: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
translated: One should make perfect offerings to oneself with the twelve offering seals, such as the wrathful vajra weapon.

original: phyag bzhi dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag btsal ba byas nas /
analyzed: phyag bzhi dang rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag btsal ba byas nas /
translated: Having performed the homage taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajra-sūrya-jvalana-tejas,

original: dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should visualize the supreme royal maṇḍala of the first yoga and the supreme royal maṇḍala of the second yoga.

original: de nas bsdu ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par byas la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lcags kyus 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par byas la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i lcags kyus 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
translated: Then, having performed the dissolution and the praise with the one hundred and eight names, one should invite the Bhagavān together with the retinue into the maṇḍala with the hook taught in the great maṇḍala of Vajra-sūrya-jvalana-tejas.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par byas la /
translated: Having sealed with the four seals as before,

original: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal te /
translated: one should confer empowerment with the empowerment seal and make offerings with the twelve offering seals, and prostrate.

original: de ltar nyin re bzhin du bsgom par byas na ji srid dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar nyin re bzhin du bsgom par byas na ji srid dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates in this way every day, one will see the maṇḍala.

original: yi ge hi'am /
analyzed: yi ge hi'am /
translated: The syllable hi,

original: yi ge h'um brjod cing /🔽rdo rje dril bu sogs mnyam bcas //
analyzed: yi ge h'um brjod cing / rdo rje dril bu sogs mnyam bcas //
translated: or the syllable hūṃ,

original: rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis //
analyzed: rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis //
translated: is uttered together with the vajra and bell, and so forth.🔽The music of the solitary [buddha] is played,

original: yi ge hi yi glu rol mo //🔽bya zhing zur bzhi 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: yi ge hi yi glu rol mo // bya zhing zur bzhi 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and the song of the syllable hi is played.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of recitation.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas par byas la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas par byas la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /
translated: Then, having consecrated it as before, at sunrise, having laid out the outer maṇḍala in the manner of the great maṇḍala of Vajrasattva,

original: de nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i thig zlum po 'bar ba dang bcas pa dang / ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i thig zlum po 'bar ba dang bcas pa dang / ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should lay out the lines of the inner [maṇḍala], which is half the size of that, with a triple vajra, a circle, and flames, and endowed with eight pillars.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bris la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bris la /
translated: Then, having drawn it as before,

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas h'um hi zhes bya ba brjod cing /
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas h'um hi zhes bya ba brjod cing /
translated: in the center of the maṇḍala, in the direction of the hub, one should utter “hūṃ hi” with the union of the four goddesses.

original: bcom ldan 'das ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One should be painted on the cloth.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po bzhi pos lha mo bzhi bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i snying po bzhi pos lha mo bzhi bri bar bya'o //
translated: The four goddesses should be painted with the four essence mantras taught in the Great Mandala.

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang sgo bzhi la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs khro bo sgeg mo la sogs pa dang khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu ma @70b la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi dang sgo bzhi la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshogs khro bo sgeg mo la sogs pa dang khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu ma @70b la sogs pa bzhi bri bar bya'o
translated: In the four corners and four gates of the outer mandala, the four wrathful goddesses such as Lāsyā and the four wrathful vajra hooks and so forth should be painted as taught in the Great Mandala of the Blazing Vajra Sun.

original: // de la rdo rje ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa thams cad dang / rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: // de la rdo rje ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa thams cad dang / rang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
translated: There, with the mudras and mantras taught in the Great Mandala of the Blazing Vajra, one should perform all the mandala accomplishments, the rituals of self-entry and so forth, and the rituals of inducting disciples and so forth, according to the rituals of the Tathāgata’s Secret Mandala.🔽The ritual of vajra yoga is called

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The ritual of Vajrayoga is called the yoga of the vajra.🔽🔽

original: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de gnas pa ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de gnas pa ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The secret of the body of Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas, which is the union with the four goddesses, is the abode of the vajra yogin.

original: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i rtog pa bstan pa'o /
analyzed: de'i cho ga ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i rtog pa bstan pa'o /
translated: The rite is the teaching of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the secret Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas-mandala of the painting is complete from the commentary on the glorious Supreme Original Buddha called Arising from the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the rite of the secret Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas-mandala of the painting,

original: da ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi cho ga gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi cho ga gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the second rite of the Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas-mandala of the painting itself,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares “thereupon,” etc.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: The word “then” expresses immediate succession.

original: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid du'o //
analyzed: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid du'o //
translated: Immediately after the first yoga.

original: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid do //
