translated: Here, the samadhi of the first yoga is just as it is taught in the mandala of the glorious Vajrasattva’s painting.

original: yi ge h'um gis dkyil 'khor sprul te /
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis dkyil 'khor sprul te /
translated: Having emanated the mandala with the syllable hum,

original: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying po rnams kyis lha thams cad dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi snying po rnams kyis lha thams cad dgod par bya ste /
translated: one should arrange all the deities with their respective essence mantras in their proper places.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the second samadhi.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should understand the third, preceded by the gathering just as before.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the three samadhis,🔽now, in order to teach the four mudras, he says, “the four mudras are the great, the Dharma, the samaya, and the action mudras.”

original: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob nas bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir shin tu phra ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob nas bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir shin tu phra ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the procedure of mantra repetition and meditation after obtaining the initiation and commitments, the ritual of the extremely subtle and so on is taught.🔽

original: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach this rite, which is the repetition and meditation after having obtained the initiation and the commitments, he declares the rite of the master's actions, etc., and the rite of the disciple's entry, etc.

original: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phra ba las kyang shin tu phra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phra ba las kyang shin tu phra ba yin no //
translated: The mandala that was just explained is more subtle than subtle.

original: de bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
translated: That will be explained.

original: 'dir shin tu khro ba sgeg pa ston par byed pas na shin tu gsang ba yin no //🔽rdo rje ni rdo rje nyi ma me @71a * //
analyzed: 'dir shin tu khro ba sgeg pa ston par byed pas na shin tu gsang ba yin no // rdo rje ni rdo rje nyi ma me @71a * //
translated: Here, it is very secret because it shows the dance of the very wrathful.

original: ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra is the vajra of the blazing vajra sun.

original: de'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'i phyir chen po de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'i phyir chen po de nyid yin no //
translated: That is the great secret of the yoginis of the great yoga, the mandala that pervades all space.

original: ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Just as it is and so forth.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho gas grong khyer sum brtsegs dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas yang dag par brgyan la /🔽rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi slob dpon rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i cho gas grong khyer sum brtsegs dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pas yang dag par brgyan la / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi slob dpon rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Having adorned it with the triple city, pleasure grove, and so forth, as taught in the great secret mandala of glorious Vajrasattva,🔽one should perform the great yoga in the manner taught in the secret mandala of Vajra-holder-Vajrasūryārcis.

original: de'i rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan ma thob nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pas yang dag par bris la rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan ma thob nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pas yang dag par bris la rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
translated: Having obtained the signs, the Vajra-holder should draw the secret mandala just as it is, endowed with the yoga of the four secret goddesses, such as the blazing fire of passion of the great vajra, and so forth.

original: de'i rigs dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang / rang nyid rdo rje drag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang / de'i dbyibs dang rgyan dang ldan pas gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo rang gi spyi bor bcings la /
analyzed: de'i rigs dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang / rang nyid rdo rje drag po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang / de'i dbyibs dang rgyan dang ldan pas gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo rang gi spyi bor bcings la /
translated: He is endowed with four girls who have the same kind of ornaments, and he is endowed with the yoga of Vajra Heruka. With the shape and ornaments of that [deity], he should make a gesture of salutation with a flower, and bind the añjali gesture of salutation to his head.

original: h'um rdo rje gzhu dang mda' bcas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: h'um rdo rje gzhu dang mda' bcas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: He should recite the song of entry, Homage to Vajra bow and arrow!

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi lha'i me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi lha'i me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
translated: and so forth. The master, who is situated in the middle of the garland of the four goddesses, should take up the flower garland of his deity.

original: 'jug pa'i glu dang / rang gi lha'i snying po rjod par byed pa'i bu mo de rnams dang bcas par dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i glu dang / rang gi lha'i snying po rjod par byed pa'i bu mo de rnams dang bcas par dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Together with the girls who recite the song of entry and the essence mantra of his deity, he should enter the mandala.

original: de nas g-yon pa'i kha ni gyen du bstod //
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa'i kha ni gyen du bstod //
translated: Then, the left side is praised.

original: rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po'i sgra sgrogs mchog gi ming can gyi phyag rgyas ha ha ha ha /
analyzed: rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po'i sgra sgrogs mchog gi ming can gyi phyag rgyas ha ha ha ha /
translated: With the great laughter of the great fierce one, the mudra called Supreme Name, he should say, Ha ha ha ha,

original: aom badzra ru lu ru lu lam zhes brjod cing dga' ba chen po'i dbugs kyi rlung gis ru lu ni drug dang ldan par bar ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ru lu ru lu lam zhes brjod cing dga' ba chen po'i dbugs kyi rlung gis ru lu ni drug dang ldan par bar ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
translated: om vajra rulu rulu ham, and with the wind of great joy, he should worship the Bhagavat with the six-syllabled [mantra] and the intermediate [mantras].

original: 'di ni 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Here, thus and so forth are easy to understand.

original: de ltar bu mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi tshogs gtor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bu mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis me tog gi tshogs gtor bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus worshipped the Bhagavat together with those girls, he should scatter a bouquet of flowers with the flower-scattering mantra.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs te /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs te /
translated: Then, having taken the garland empowerment as before,

original: gdong g-yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor mthong nas 'jug @71b pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
analyzed: gdong g-yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor mthong nas 'jug @71b pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
translated: he should remove the blindfold, and having seen the mandala, he should release the entrance mudra.🔽 Having empowered him with the water empowerment, he should empower him with the mudra empowerment and so forth,

original: chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so on.

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: One should hold the ultimate Observance of the Vajra of Attainment.

original: dang po re zhig thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: dang po re zhig thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: First, one should consecrate with the Mudra of Consecration with the Diadem of Skulls.

original: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod phan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod phan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: Then, one should consecrate with the Mudra of Consecration with the Diadem of the Five Buddhas.

original: de nas thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang lhan cig pa'i gsang ba'am brdungs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can rdo rje rin po che dang cod pan gyi sngags dag gis yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi'i cod pan gyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang lhan cig pa'i gsang ba'am brdungs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can rdo rje rin po che dang cod pan gyi sngags dag gis yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi'i cod pan gyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should consecrate with the outer diadem, which is the consecration with the mantra of the Vajra Gem and the Diadem, which is the consecration of the secret, the consecration of the skull, which is the nature of the Five Tathagatas, and so forth.

original: de la gtsugs tor dang mdun dang logs gnyis dang / rgyab tu rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i thod pa rnams te de rnams kyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du bya'o //
analyzed: de la gtsugs tor dang mdun dang logs gnyis dang / rgyab tu rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i thod pa rnams te de rnams kyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du bya'o //
translated: There, the skulls are marked with five-pronged vajras on the top, front, two sides, and back. The Tathagatas should be made into diadems on those.

original: de ltar thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de ltar thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
translated: Thus, having conferred the empowerment of the garland of skulls upon oneself,🔽having completed all the rites, one should give the three pledges to oneself and the girls.

original: cho ga thams cad rdzogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang bu mo rnams la dam tshig gsum sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rdzogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang bu mo rnams la dam tshig gsum sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate this,🔽it is said:

original: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
translated: The pledge of the vajra and lotus

original: dam tshig 'di ni gsal par sbyin //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig 'di ni gsal par sbyin // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is clearly given.

original: gsang ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: Secretly, it is clear.

original: da ni rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the mudra of the vajra and lotus,🔽it is said:

original: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: There, this, etc.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du byas pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar ba byas la mthe bong gnyis rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du byas pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad phan tshun du yang dag par sbyar ba byas la mthe bong gnyis rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba'i rtse mo byas te /
translated: Having made the vajra-bound fingers touch each other, one should make the tips of the two thumbs touch each other.

original: des sor mo'i rtse mo rnams dgab par byas te /
analyzed: des sor mo'i rtse mo rnams dgab par byas te /
translated: With that, one should cover the tips of the fingers.

original: 'di rdo rje padmas te dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di rdo rje padmas te dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the vajra and lotus, the mudra of empowerment.

original: de nas h'um aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes bya ba brjod cing gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang / slar yang spyi bo dang / rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang / spyi bo'i rgyab tu dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas h'um aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes bya ba brjod cing gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang / slar yang spyi bo dang / rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang / spyi bo'i rgyab tu dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: and behind the crown.

original: 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: By this consecration alone, etc.

original: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur ba 'dis sgrub pa po dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur ba 'dis sgrub pa po dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: By this consecration of the vajra and lotus, the practitioner, by the consecration alone, is all the tathāgatas Vairochana, etc.🔽He is consecrated by them,

original: de de dag gis byin gyis brlab pa dang zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
analyzed: de de dag gis byin gyis brlab pa dang zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
translated: and is blessed by them.

original: sgrub pa po de la ji ltar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ce na /🔽shin tu gdug pa dang / drag pa dang / rab tu gtum po dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams thal bar rab tu @72a * //
analyzed: sgrub pa po de la ji ltar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ce na / shin tu gdug pa dang / drag pa dang / rab tu gtum po dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams thal bar rab tu @72a * //
translated: How do they bless the practitioner?🔽They are very fierce,🔽very cruel,🔽and very violent,

original: 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu rlog pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu rlog pa'o //
translated: and are the cause of the complete destruction of very wicked sentient beings.🔽They are the complete destruction of the wicked.

original: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas na thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas na thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: Since he is victorious over the three worlds, including Maheśvara, he is victorious over all.

original: khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya bar yang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya bar yang byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is also empowered as the great wheel-wielder of the vajra of the entire three realms.

original: de nyid kyis rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The phrase he is called Vajra and so forth is easy to understand.

original: bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur na //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur na // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Even the women are brought down.

original: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i bu mo rnams gang yin pa de dag kyang 'bebs na /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i bu mo rnams gang yin pa de dag kyang 'bebs na /
translated: If the women who have entered the maṇḍala are brought down,🔽what need is there to speak of the lord and so forth?

original: bdag nyid mnga' 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rang gi lha mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje 'bebs pas phab ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid mnga' 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rang gi lha mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje 'bebs pas phab ste /
translated: The lord and so forth are brought down by the nature of the meditation on the yoga of one's own goddess, such as the yoga of Lakṣmī, and so forth.

original: ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
translated: Taught means that they are empowered by the empowerment of the vajra and lotus of the tathāgatas.

original: de kho na nyid dang chos dang / dam tshig blangs la rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang chos dang / dam tshig blangs la rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become the master of the yogins who have taken the reality, doctrine, and vow commitments, and who hold the hand implements marked with the vajra, such as the vajra arrow, and so on.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su yang dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su yang dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will become the form of the goddesses Vajrarati, Vajranirghosa, and so on.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji ltar slob dpon gyis rang nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje drag po'i gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji ltar slob dpon gyis rang nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje drag po'i gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur te /
translated: This is explained as follows: Just as the master, having blessed himself into the form of Vajra-fierce-sun-like-a-flame, confers initiation,

original: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
translated: takes the reality, doctrine, and vow commitments, and enters the mandala,

original: khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: he becomes the universal monarch of the great power of the entire three realms.

original: de bzhin du bu mo rnams kyang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur byas nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig blangs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bu mo rnams kyang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur byas nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig blangs te /
translated: Likewise, the girls, having conferred initiation upon themselves with their own deity yoga, take up reality, the Dharma, and the commitments.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: They become goddesses such as Vajra Passion, etc.

original: da ni bu mo dang bcas pa'i slob dpon la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa 'bebs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni bu mo dang bcas pa'i slob dpon la rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa 'bebs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the descent of Vajra-Sun-Blazing-Fire, etc. upon the master together with the girls, he says, etc.

original: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgar ba la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgar ba la'o //
translated: The word “there” is for the purpose of distinguishing.

original: thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba ni shin tu dang po kho na'o //
analyzed: thog ma kho nar zhes bya ba ni shin tu dang po kho na'o //
translated: “First of all” means at the very beginning.

original: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The word “first” refers to the sequence.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po ni nyi ma dang 'dra bas na nyi ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po ni nyi ma dang 'dra bas na nyi ma'o //
translated: “Vajra-Sun-Blazing-Fire” is “sun” because it is like the sun.

original: gdug pa dang drag po rnams thal bar rab tu 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu rlog go //
analyzed: gdug pa dang drag po rnams thal bar rab tu 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thal bar rab tu rlog go //
translated: It is “destroyer of ashes” because it is the cause of the complete destruction of ashes, i.e. of the wicked and violent.

original: rdo rje nyi ma @72b me ltar 'bar ba chen po yang yin la thal bar rab tu rlog pa yang de nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma @72b me ltar 'bar ba chen po yang yin la thal bar rab tu rlog pa yang de nyid yin pas na /
translated: He is the Great Vajra Sun, blazing like a great fire, and he is the one who utterly annihilates, that is, he is the one who utterly annihilates the great fire of the sun of the vajra.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pas te de'i ming dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pas te de'i ming dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He is the one who has the name of the Great Vajra Sun, blazing like a great fire, and utterly annihilates.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: He is the nature of all the great vajra wrathful ones of all the tathagatas.

original: mchog dang po ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dang po ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: The supreme first is without beginning or end.

original: yang dag par 'bebs pa'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i rgyud la rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par 'bebs pa'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'i rgyud la rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: He is the one who descends, that is, he enters into the continuum of the practitioner.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po ste /
translated: The great compassion of all tathagatas is the great compassion of all tathagatas.

original: des thabs kyi ngo bor bskyed pa'i zhe sdang gi khro bo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis nye bar mtshon la /
analyzed: des thabs kyi ngo bor bskyed pa'i zhe sdang gi khro bo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis nye bar mtshon la /
translated: By that, he is characterized by the light rays of the blazing fire of wrathful anger generated in the nature of method.

original: mi phyed pa'i khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pas bzhugs pa ni rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas🔽pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje yang de nyid yin la rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa yang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me ltar 'bar ba'i rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pas bzhugs pa ni rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje yang de nyid yin la rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa yang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
translated: The vajra of the blazing fire of the wrathful one who holds the enemy of indivisibility is the Bhagavān Vajra Sun Blazing Like Fire, who resides together with the banner of the vajra khaṭvāṅga.🔽That is also the vajra of the blazing fire of the wrathful one who holds the enemy of the method of great compassion of all tathāgatas, and it is also the banner of the vajra khaṭvāṅga.

original: kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis kho na du 'dzin pa'i khro bo me 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis kho na du 'dzin pa'i khro bo me 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the banner of the vajra khaṭvāṅga of the wrathful one of the blazing fire of the method of great compassion of all tathāgatas.

original: nges par sbyor ba ni gtso bo nyid du nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: nges par sbyor ba ni gtso bo nyid du nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The definite application is the definite application as the principal one.

original: ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu ni ba dan gyi dril bu ste de 'dzin par mdzad pas na ba dan gyi dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu ni ba dan gyi dril bu ste de 'dzin par mdzad pas na ba dan gyi dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The bell with a banner is the bell with a banner, and he holds it, so he is the holder of the bell with a banner.

original: rdo rje snyems ma ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snyems ma ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
translated: Vajragarvi is explained just as she is.

original: de'i bdag po ni rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po'o //
translated: Her lord is the lord of Vajragarvi.

original: 'bebs pa'i khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas 'bebs pa ni shin tu khro bo'i 'bebs pa ste /
analyzed: 'bebs pa'i khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pas 'bebs pa ni shin tu khro bo'i 'bebs pa ste /
translated: The descent that is endowed with the special kind of descent is the descent of the very wrathful one.

original: bcom ldan 'das de 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The Blessed One will descend in that way.

original: de lta bu'i phyag rgya gang dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i phyag rgya gang dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
translated: With what kind of seal is he endowed?

original: sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With grace, etc.

original: sgeg pa dang khro bo ston par byed pa'i smin mtshams kyi dbral ba'i ri mo ni sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer te /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang khro bo ston par byed pa'i smin mtshams kyi dbral ba'i ri mo ni sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer te /
translated: The frown between the eyebrows that displays grace and wrath is the grace and wrath between the eyebrows.

original: de dang bcas pa'i spyan ser po ni dmar ser te /
analyzed: de dang bcas pa'i spyan ser po ni dmar ser te /
translated: The yellow eyes with that are reddish yellow.

original: 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan dmar ser gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan dmar ser gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He has eyes that are red and yellow, which cause fear by being very frightening.

original: de lta bu'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i @73a * //
analyzed: de lta bu'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i @73a * //
translated: He has such a view.

original: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par phab nas des ji ltar mdzad ce na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par phab nas des ji ltar mdzad ce na /
translated: Having been properly brought down by the Bhagavān, what does he do?🔽By this, etc.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar gyur pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis sgrub pa po'i rgyud la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas sgrub pa po la
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar gyur pa'i lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis sgrub pa po'i rgyud la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas sgrub pa po la
translated: In this way, the Bhagavān, having entered the continuum of the adept by means of this seal of the view, having entered the maṇḍala of all the powers of the great seal, etc.,

original: sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: he accomplishes the adept.🔽If he is not accomplished by the recitation of one hundred thousand in the maṇḍala, then later, by the recitation of the syllable hūṃ once, he accomplishes the passion, etc.

original: dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya'i bzlas pas ma grub na de nas dus phyi ma la yi ge h'um lan cig bzlas pas rjes su chags pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya'i bzlas pas ma grub na de nas dus phyi ma la yi ge h'um lan cig bzlas pas rjes su chags pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach this meaning,🔽he says:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The Bhagavān says, The samādhi called 'adoring all tathāgatas,' and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis yi ge h'um lan cig bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs par nus she na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis yi ge h'um lan cig bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs par nus she na /
translated: If one asks, By which samādhi, by reciting the syllable hūṃ once, can one adore all tathāgatas, summon them, cause them to enter, bind them, control them, and cause them to descend?

original: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is said, By the samādhi called 'applying all to space.'

original: yi ge h'um lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i bsgom pa thams cad nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang lhan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa
analyzed: yi ge h'um lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i bsgom pa thams cad nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang lhan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa
translated: By merely reciting the syllable hūṃ once, all meditations on Vajrābha, who is primordially unborn like the sun and fire, together with the samādhi called 'applying all to space,' merely by reciting it, all tathāgatas are adored,

original: la sogs pa'i las byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i las byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and so on, the activities are performed. This is the meaning.

original: gang zhig khams gsum pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i rdo rje'i bdud la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa rnams shin tu gdug pa dang drag po dang /
analyzed: gang zhig khams gsum pa thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i rdo rje'i bdud la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa rnams shin tu gdug pa dang drag po dang /
translated: all the tathāgatas, the teachings of the tathāgatas, the very fierce, the fierce, and the extremely fierce wicked sentient beings,

original: rab tu gtum pa'i ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang zhig sems can nye bar 'tshe ba la rab tu 'jug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma drag po rnams dang / gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag kyang sgrub pa po'i 'dod pas thal bar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab tu gtum pa'i ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang zhig sems can nye bar 'tshe ba la rab tu 'jug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma drag po rnams dang / gang zhig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag kyang sgrub pa po'i 'dod pas thal bar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur te /
translated: the fierce ḍākinīs who engage in harming sentient beings, and the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas—all of them will be reduced to ashes by the desire of the adept.

original: dmyal bar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa spyod pa ngan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi phan pa ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: dmyal bar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa spyod pa ngan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi phan pa ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: What need is there to mention the other nonbeneficial ones, such as those of bad conduct who are the cause of rebirth in hell?

original: rnal 'byor 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ci'i phyir bsgrub pa mdzad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ci'i phyir bsgrub pa mdzad pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this Blessed One accomplished by this yoga just as he is?

original: don yod ces bya ba @73b la sogs pa la gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyis don yod pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang / thog ma med pa ni bzlog par mi nus pa dang /
analyzed: don yod ces bya ba @73b la sogs pa la gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor gyis don yod pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang / thog ma med pa ni bzlog par mi nus pa dang /
translated: As for meaningful, etc., because this Blessed One, by the yoga explained just as it is, is meaningful, not fruitless, and is beginningless, not to be averted,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams nye bar sbyor ba ni sgrub pa pos mngon par sbyor ba mchog tu sgrub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams nye bar sbyor ba ni sgrub pa pos mngon par sbyor ba mchog tu sgrub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the collection of all the activities of the accomplishments explained just as they are are applied, the practitioner will accomplish the supreme.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po'i bzlas pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po'i bzlas pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach the essence mantra for accomplishing this Blessed One just as he is explained, [the Bhagavān] declares, Then, and so on.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: sna'i dbugs phra mo nyid kyis thung du'i gzugs su yongs su brtags nas sna'i dbugs kyi sbyor ba kho nas bzlas pa byas na ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sna'i dbugs phra mo nyid kyis thung du'i gzugs su yongs su brtags nas sna'i dbugs kyi sbyor ba kho nas bzlas pa byas na ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Having imagined the form of the short exhalation of breath by the subtle breath of the nose, if one performs the recitation only by the yoga of the nose, one will accomplish the powers as explained.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das dbab pa'i bsgrub pa bstan nas //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das dbab pa'i bsgrub pa bstan nas //
translated: Thus, having taught the accomplishment of the descent of the Bhagavat,

original: da ni lha mo bzhi dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lha mo bzhi dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the accomplishment of the descent of the four goddesses,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i sgom pa'i lam ston par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das yum mda' 'dzin pas te /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i sgom pa'i lam ston par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das yum mda' 'dzin pas te /
translated: The Bhagavat, who teaches the path of meditation of Vajrasūrya-jvalottāma, and so on, is the mother who holds the bow.

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo de yang phyag g-yon pas gzhu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mda' blangs te stod par mdzad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo de yang phyag g-yon pas gzhu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi mda' blangs te stod par mdzad pa /
translated: The great goddess called Mahāvajra-kāma-jvalottāma holds a bow in her left hand and takes up an arrow with the characteristics explained above in her right hand.

original: sgeg pa dang bcas shing g-yon pa'i spyan gyi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag g-yon pa'i ming can gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas nye bar mtshan pa /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas shing g-yon pa'i spyan gyi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag g-yon pa'i ming can gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas nye bar mtshan pa /
translated: Her left hand is in the gesture of looking, and she is marked with the gesture of looking.

original: g-yon pa'i spyan bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje 'dod pa me 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i spyan bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje 'dod pa me 'bar ba'o //
translated: Her left eye is the blazing fire of the desire of the Blessed Vajrī.

original: lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis de ci mdzad ci na /
analyzed: lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis de ci mdzad ci na /
translated: What does she do with this gesture of looking?

original: thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni gzigs pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas gdab pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i las bstan to //
analyzed: thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni gzigs pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas gdab pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i las bstan to //
translated: She accomplishes everything means that by merely looking, she seals everything.  And so on indicates her activity.

original: snying po gang gis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i las rnams 'dis sgrub pa mdzad ce na /
analyzed: snying po gang gis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i las rnams 'dis sgrub pa mdzad ce na /
translated: By what essence does she accomplish the activities as they have been explained?

original: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: Then, this and so on. It is explained as follows.

original: hni zhes bya ba'i phra ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i lta bas 'di las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: hni zhes bya ba'i phra ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i lta bas 'di las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: By the recitation of the subtle vajra wrath, haṃ, she accomplishes all activities from this gesture as it has been explained.

original: de ltar dang po dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan nas da ni gnyis pa dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan @74a * //
analyzed: de ltar dang po dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan nas da ni gnyis pa dbab pa'i sgrub pa bstan @74a * //
translated: As such, having explained the accomplishment of the descent, now,🔽the second is the explanation of the accomplishment of the descent.🔽

original: par bya ba'i phyir gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: par bya ba'i phyir gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having thus taught the first, the practice of descent, now, in order to teach the second, the practice of descent, he says the second, etc.

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgom pa'i lam gyi yul du byas pas don mngon du byed pa ni lha mo chen mo gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgom pa'i lam gyi yul du byas pas don mngon du byed pa ni lha mo chen mo gnyis pa ste /
translated: The second great goddess is the object of the path of meditation, which has the characteristic of the blazing fire of great vajra desire, and is the actualization of the goal.

original: k'i li k'i la'i gzugs 'dzin pa rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba ltar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i gzugs 'dzin pa rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba ltar bshad pa'o //
translated: The form of Kali Kali is explained as the blazing fire of great vajra desire.

original: de nyid dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
analyzed: de nyid dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
translated: That very commitment is the cause.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa re re mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin can gang dang gang gi phyag rgya de ni re re'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa re re mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin can gang dang gang gi phyag rgya de ni re re'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The commitment seal of each one is the nature of actualizing each one, such as Vajra Sun Blazing Fire, etc.

original: de'i ming ston pa mdzad pa'i lha mo chen mo phyag gnyis kyi dbus su rang gi 'dod pa'i lha bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba bstod nas gang gis 'khyud pa de ni dbus su bstod pa'i rang gi lhag pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: de'i ming ston pa mdzad pa'i lha mo chen mo phyag gnyis kyi dbus su rang gi 'dod pa'i lha bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba bstod nas gang gis 'khyud pa de ni dbus su bstod pa'i rang gi lhag pa'i lha'o //
translated: She who embraces him is the supreme deity of the center, praised in the center.

original: 'dzum pa ni cung zad bzhad pa dang bcas shing 'dzum pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzum pa ni cung zad bzhad pa dang bcas shing 'dzum pa ste /
translated: Smiling is having a slight smile, a slight smile.

original: cung zad phye ba'i spyan gang la yod pa de ni spyan 'dzum pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad phye ba'i spyan gang la yod pa de ni spyan 'dzum pa'o //
translated: She who has eyes slightly open is one with smiling eyes.

original: lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das yum so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das yum so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: With this mudra of looking, the Blessed One, the mother of all accomplishments such as Vajrasūrya-jvalana-tejas, has the nature of the vajra kali kala pledge seal.

original: yi ge h'um 'bum bzlas pas 'di'i sbyor ba ma grub na yi ge h'um lan cig tu sgrub pa pos brjod cing yid kyis sam mngon du bsgrub par bya la tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa bya zhing //
analyzed: yi ge h'um 'bum bzlas pas 'di'i sbyor ba ma grub na yi ge h'um lan cig tu sgrub pa pos brjod cing yid kyis sam mngon du bsgrub par bya la tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa bya zhing //
translated: If the practice is not accomplished by reciting the syllable hūṃ one hundred thousand times, then the adept should recite the syllable hūṃ once, and mentally or actually perform the embrace, the kiss, and so forth.

original: tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya 'dis rgyas btab pa tsam gyis bsam pa'i dbang gis bsgrub bya rgyas btab pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig par mdzad pa dang / bsgrub bya thams cad gsad pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis gsod par mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya 'dis rgyas btab pa tsam gyis bsam pa'i dbang gis bsgrub bya rgyas btab pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig par mdzad pa dang / bsgrub bya thams cad gsad pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis gsod par mdzad pa dang /
translated: By the mere sealing with the tactile sensation of the embrace, the kiss, and so forth, the adept is sealed by the power of imagination, and by the power of the imagination of killing all the ḍākinīs and so forth, he kills them.

original: 'chi ba bslang ba'i bsam pas 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i las brgya sgrub par mdzad pas na dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs rnams la nye bar sbyor ba dang / yi ge h'um lan cig tu bzlas pas mchog tu sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba bslang ba'i bsam pas 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i las brgya sgrub par mdzad pas na dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs rnams la nye bar sbyor ba dang / yi ge h'um lan cig tu bzlas pas mchog tu sgrub pa'o //
translated: and by the thought of raising up death, all deaths are raised up; and by accomplishing the hundred deeds of the Noble Vajra Sun Blazing Like Fire, one is connected to the assembly of all powers, and by reciting the syllable hūṃ once, one accomplishes the supreme.

original: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Then, beginning with “this,” and so on, is easy to understand.

original: da ni gsum pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni gsum pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the third, [the Bhagavān] declares, the third, and so on.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar bsgom pa'i lam gyi @74b rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum ma lus par thal bar mdzad par nus pa bskyed pa ni /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar bsgom pa'i lam gyi @74b rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum ma lus par thal bar mdzad par nus pa bskyed pa ni /
translated: The third great vajra, blazing with the fire of passion, is the great goddess who is able to generate the power to reduce the entire three realms to ashes, having the nature of the path of meditation of the blazing fire of passion of the great vajra, as previously explained.

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rab tu 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo gsum pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rab tu 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo gsum pa ste /
translated: The third great goddess is called the great vajra, blazing with the fire of passion, reducing to ashes.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the blazing vajra sun.

original: de yang rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He holds the vajra and the banner of the khaṭvāṅga.

original: khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa ni sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa ste /🔽des smin ma'i dbus su khro ba ston par byed pa'i dpral ba'i ri mo ni khro gnyar te /
analyzed: khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa ni sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa ste / des smin ma'i dbus su khro ba ston par byed pa'i dpral ba'i ri mo ni khro gnyar te /
translated: Smiling with a wrathful and passionate expression is the passionate smile.🔽The frown between the eyebrows that displays wrath with that is the wrathful frown.

original: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i smin ma'i khro gnyer de las khro ba'i spyan ni khro bo'i lta ba ste /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i smin ma'i khro gnyer de las khro ba'i spyan ni khro bo'i lta ba ste /
translated: The wrathful gaze is the wrathful eye that is the wrathful frown between the passionate smile’s eyebrows.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
translated: The Blessed Lady is just like that,

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar bas thal bar rab tu 'jug par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar bas thal bar rab tu 'jug par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: who is indicated by that, blazing with the fire of great vajra passion, and is thoroughly engaged in the ashes.🔽Oṃ vajra ru lu ru lu hūṃ.

original: aom badzra ru lu ru lu hni zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas rang gi dngos grub gsol ba yin no //
analyzed: aom badzra ru lu ru lu hni zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas rang gi dngos grub gsol ba yin no //
translated: Reciting this one hundred thousand times in the maṇḍala, one requests one’s spiritual power.

original: sgrub pa ma grub na lan cig bzlas pas yid kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa ma grub na lan cig bzlas pas yid kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: If one does not succeed in the practice, by repeating it once, one accomplishes all the desired mental actions.

original: chen po yang yin la rdo rje 'dod pa yang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje 'dod pa chen po yin pas te /
analyzed: chen po yang yin la rdo rje 'dod pa yang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje 'dod pa chen po yin pas te /
translated: And since it is great and also the vajra desire, it is the great vajra desire.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub chen po'i sems kyi sgom pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub chen po'i sems kyi sgom pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the meditation of the great mind of enlightenment, which has the nature of the path of meditation, such as the vajra sun blazing fire.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa'i rang bzhin can ni me 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa'i rang bzhin can ni me 'bar ba'o //
translated: Blazing fire is the nature of burning the fuel of afflictions.

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa yang de yin la me 'bar ba yang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa yang de yin la me 'bar ba yang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'o //
translated: And since it is the great vajra desire and also the blazing fire, it is the great vajra desire blazing fire.

original: des thal bar rab tu rlog pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi khams dang sems las byung ba rnams mi snang bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: des thal bar rab tu rlog pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi khams dang sems las byung ba rnams mi snang bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: It completely incinerates to ashes, making the realms of sentient beings in the three realms and their mental factors invisible.

original: sreg pa'i bskal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir sreg pa gang yin pa des shi ba'i sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar ston pa ni
analyzed: sreg pa'i bskal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir sreg pa gang yin pa des shi ba'i sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar ston pa ni
translated: Also, by the nature of the fire age, it is the fire that purifies the realm of afflicted sentient beings.

original: slong ba ste nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo 'dis gang gis bsgrub par 'gyur ba de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: slong ba ste nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo 'dis gang gis bsgrub par 'gyur ba de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bzhi pa ste /
translated: By this, the nature of the wisdom of practice, whatever is accomplished, it has the characteristic of the fourth,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rab tu rlog pa 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba slong bar mdzad @75a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rab tu rlog pa 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba slong bar mdzad @75a * //
translated: the Bhagavatī Vajrarāga, who puts out the blazing fire of death with the ashes of fear, and raises up the dead.

original: pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo'o //
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo'o //
translated: This is the great goddess called “the one who raises up the dead.”

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis snyems par mdzad nas phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dril bu rang gi spyi bor bskyod par mdzad cing khro ba dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan ma la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis snyems par mdzad nas phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dril bu rang gi spyi bor bskyod par mdzad cing khro ba dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan ma la dbab pa'o //
translated: With his left hand in a vajra fist, he is arrogant. With his right hand he brandishes a vajra and a bell above his head. With his eyes wide open, he is wrathful and playful. He descends upon the yoginīs.

original: de nyid la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Since he perfects the great seal and so forth in them, he is the one who accomplishes everything.

original: de bzhin du shnee zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas ma grub na lan cig bzlas pas khu tshur dang thal lcag la sogs pa dang / bzhad gad dang / rdeg pa dang / phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shnee zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgya bzlas pas ma grub na lan cig bzlas pas khu tshur dang thal lcag la sogs pa dang / bzhad gad dang / rdeg pa dang / phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa dang /
translated: Similarly, with regard to śaṇaiḥ, if one does not succeed by repeating one hundred thousand times in the maṇḍala, then by repeating once, he causes all deaths to be cured by a mere fist, a mere slap, a mere laugh, a mere blow, or a mere seal.

original: bsam pa tsam gyis las thams cad kyi tshogs sgrub par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa tsam gyis las thams cad kyi tshogs sgrub par mdzad pa'o //
translated: By merely thinking of him, he accomplishes the accumulation of all karma.

original: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i me'i lha mo bzhi po gtso bor gyur pa rnams so //
analyzed: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i me'i lha mo bzhi po gtso bor gyur pa rnams so //
translated: The and so on includes the four goddesses of the vajra desire fire.

original: mtha' yas mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: Endless supreme means without beginning or end.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ni /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ni /
translated: Equal to the realm of phenomena

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: means equal to the realm of phenomena without beginning or end.

original: mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o //
translated: Unequalled means incomparable.

original: nam mkha'i khams bzhin du tshad med pas na nam mkha'i khams bzhin du grangs med pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams bzhin du tshad med pas na nam mkha'i khams bzhin du grangs med pa ste /
translated: Like the realm of space, they are immeasurable, so they are as numerous as the realm of space.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba las byung bas na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba las byung bas na /
translated: The meaning is that they are equal to the atoms in all world systems.🔽Since they arise from the vajra sun blazing like fire,

original: rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba'o //
translated: they arise from the vajra sun.

original: nam mkha' yang de yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na nam mkha' thams cad de phyogs bcu na gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' yang de yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na nam mkha' thams cad de phyogs bcu na gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: Since it is space and it is everything, it is all space. It is the nature of the separation of everything that exists in the ten directions, and it is well known just as it is.

original: nam mkha' thams cad bzhin du lha mo thams cad la gnas skabs ster ba'i phyir nam mkha' thams cad gnas skabs ster ba dkyil 'khor 'di yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad bzhin du lha mo thams cad la gnas skabs ster ba'i phyir nam mkha' thams cad gnas skabs ster ba dkyil 'khor 'di yin no //
translated: Since it grants the occasion to all goddesses, like all space, this mandala grants the occasion of all space.

original: nam mkha' thams cad gnas skabs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la rab tu zhugs pa ni legs par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad gnas skabs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la rab tu zhugs pa ni legs par zhugs pa'o //
translated: One who has entered well into this secret mandala of the occasion of all space has entered well.

original: kun nas 'bebs pa ni dkyil 'khor du sgom pa la mngon par chags pa'i rgyud la rab tu zhugs pa'o //🔽rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni gtso mo ste /
analyzed: kun nas 'bebs pa ni dkyil 'khor du sgom pa la mngon par chags pa'i rgyud la rab tu zhugs pa'o // rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ni gtso mo ste /
translated: One who has descended completely is one who has entered into the continuum that is attached to the meditation of the mandala.🔽The lord of the yoga of the supreme vajra is the chief one.

original: rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: The lord of the yoga of the supreme vajra is the chief one.

original: @75b du ma ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: @75b du ma ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The one with many is endowed with a variety of forms.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i dus phyis dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor la dbang thob pa nyid dang / mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug des /🔽rnal 'byor mas te lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa'i bu mo de rnams rang gi g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i logs dag la zla ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni zla
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i dus phyis dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor la dbang thob pa nyid dang / mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug des / rnal 'byor mas te lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa'i bu mo de rnams rang gi g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i logs dag la zla ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni zla
translated: Then, after the time of cultivating the yoga, the one who has attained power in the yoga of the blazing sun-like vajra, and the lord of yoga who has attained the sign,

original: ba phyed pa'i dbyibs can gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: ba phyed pa'i dbyibs can gyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya'o //
translated: that yogi, endowed with the yoga of the four goddesses, should arrange those girls who have entered just as they are on his right and left sides, in the form of the crescent moon mandala, in the form of the mandala of the wind mandala.

original: de nas ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ji ltar zhe na /
translated: Then, how?

original: bkod nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bkod nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having arranged, etc.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor ma de rnams bkod dang ldan par byas la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig thams cad mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub mchog ste sgrub pa ni rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor ma de rnams bkod dang ldan par byas la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig thams cad mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub mchog ste sgrub pa ni rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: Having thus arranged those yoginis, one should accomplish the supreme attainment of the secret mandala of the Bhagavat, which is the supreme of all realities, dharmas, and commitments.

original: byed par gyur pa gang gis she na /
analyzed: byed par gyur pa gang gis she na /
translated: By what means?

original: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
analyzed: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
translated: By summoning all, by great worship,

original: bdag byin brlab sogs sgrub pa yis //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab sogs sgrub pa yis //
translated: by self-consecration, and so forth, by accomplishment.

original: zhes bya ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rnams kyis so //
translated: By those having the characteristics as just explained.

original: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor de brtag pa dang sgrub par byas nas phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje blang la slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor de brtag pa dang sgrub par byas nas phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje blang la slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having thus imagined the mandala in the manner just explained, and having examined and accomplished it, one should then take up the vajra of the Bhagavat and admit all the disciples.

original: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngag nye bar dgod pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngag nye bar dgod pa la'o //
translated: The word “there” is for introducing the topic.

original: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: re zhig gi sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The word “first” is in reference to the sequence.

original: gal te dkyil 'khor 'di tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bri bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te dkyil 'khor 'di tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bri bar gyur na /
translated: If one is to draw this mandala in the manner of the mandala of the assembly,

original: de'i tshe bud med rnams gzhug ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe bud med rnams gzhug ste /
translated: then one should admit the women.

original: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig gi mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig gsum byin gyis brlabs nas rang gi logs gnyis su sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig gi mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig gsum byin gyis brlabs nas rang gi logs gnyis su sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Having made them endowed with the yoga of the four goddesses such as the blazing fire of the desire of the vajra, and so forth, and having consecrated the three pledges characterized by reality, dharma, and pledge, one should place them on the two sides, having previously performed the familiarization.

original: skyes ba rnams kyang sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa /
analyzed: skyes ba rnams kyang sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa /
translated: Also, the men, having previously performed the familiarization, endowed with the yoga of the blazing vajra sun,

original: dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus su bkod pa de'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams lha mo bzhi'i phreng ba'i dbus su bkod pa de'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: consecrated by the three pledges, should be placed in the middle of the garland of the four goddesses. One should cause them to take up the yoga of the accomplishment of that.

original: rdo rje chen po'i @76a * //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i @76a * //
translated: The great vajra

original: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i dam tshig dang sngom pa dag kyang len du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i dam tshig dang sngom pa dag kyang len du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should also cause them to take up the commitments and vows of the great king of wrathful deities.

original: bu mo dang khye'u ni byis pa'i blo'i rang bzhin can rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
analyzed: bu mo dang khye'u ni byis pa'i blo'i rang bzhin can rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
translated: One should cause the girls and boys, who are of the nature of childish intellect, to enter the mandala.

original: tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon rang nyid kyis yang drag par bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs dang bcas pa'i slob dpon rang nyid kyis yang drag par bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: The master himself, together with the assembly, should protect them with wrathful [rites].

original: dus gzhan du de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du sgrub pa la nges par sbyar par bya'o //🔽de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi chog rgyas par bstan nas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dus gzhan du de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du sgrub pa la nges par sbyar par bya'o // de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi chog rgyas par bstan nas slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: At another time, one should definitely engage them in the practice as before.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive ritual action of the master, [the Bhagavān] declares the following in order to teach the extensive ritual action of inducting the disciples and so forth.

original: byang chub sems ni bla na med par bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla na med par bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: Then, having generated the unsurpassed mind of enlightenment, as stated, it is easy to understand.

original: mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni srog chags dang srog chags ma thams cad kyis dbye bar mi nus pas na mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni srog chags dang srog chags ma thams cad kyis dbye bar mi nus pas na mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Inseparable means inseparable because all living beings and non-living beings are unable to separate it.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas so sor rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas so sor rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is discerning, since it has the nature of realizing the thatness of all things.

original: 'dod chags la sogs ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / phyi rol gyi lha chen po la sogs pa ni gdug pa rnams te /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs ba'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / phyi rol gyi lha chen po la sogs pa ni gdug pa rnams te /
translated: The afflictions and secondary afflictions such as passion, and the external demons such as the great gods, are all evil.

original: de dag gnod pas na gdug pa thams cad gnod ba ste de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de dag gnod pas na gdug pa thams cad gnod ba ste de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The spirit of enlightenment is like that, since it is the antidote to all evil.

original: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kun te de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas kun dngos so //
analyzed: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kun te de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas kun dngos so //
translated: The spirit of enlightenment is the reality of all the buddhas, since it is the perfection of generosity, the perfection of wisdom, and the perfection of effort.

original: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bar ba'i rdo rje byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems ni smos pa byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bar ba'i rdo rje byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems ni smos pa byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The spirit of enlightenment is the spirit of the blazing vajra, the characteristic of enlightenment.

original: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa ste de nyid yin no //
analyzed: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa ste de nyid yin no //
translated: It is firm, since it is indivisible.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su gdul bya rnams kyis yongs su brtag pa de nyid mtshon cha ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su gdul bya rnams kyis yongs su brtag pa de nyid mtshon cha ste /
translated: That very five-pronged vajra, imagined by those to be tamed, is the weapon.

original: de rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i don du kun du bzang po'i lag tu phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: de rgyal pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i don du kun du bzang po'i lag tu phyin pa yin no //
translated: That weapon was given into the hands of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra for the sake of the great bliss vajra maṇḍala and so forth of the victors, the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa ni bka' ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa ni bka' ste /
translated: The teaching of all the tathāgatas is the word.

original: de'i dngos grub ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
translated: Its spiritual power is the spiritual power of Śrī Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de'i don du mtshon cha de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de'i lag tu phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i don du mtshon cha de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de'i lag tu phyin pa yin no //
translated: For that purpose, that weapon was given into the hands of all the tathāgatas.

original: rdo rjes nye bar mtshan pa'i phyag gang la mnga' ba de ni phyag na rdo rje ste byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang @76b po'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes nye bar mtshan pa'i phyag gang la mnga' ba de ni phyag na rdo rje ste byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang @76b po'o //
translated: He who has a hand marked with a vajra is Vajrapāṇi, the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de ltar sgeg pa dang khro bo'i gzugs can rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang ba bstan nas da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar sgeg pa dang khro bo'i gzugs can rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang ba bstan nas da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, having taught Vajradhara with a form of playfulness and wrath, now, in order to teach the uncommon wrathful vajra,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Then,” etc.

original: rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: rtag tu chags pa las byung ba'i khro bo ni bshad zin to //
translated: The wrath that arises from constant passion has already been explained.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khro bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khro bor 'gyur ro //
translated: Vajrasattva, holding the vajra and bell, becomes wrathful.

original: ci'i phyir zhi na gdul bya'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drag po la sogs pa gdug pa dang / drag po rnams ni khro bos gdul bar 'gyur bas te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhi na gdul bya'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drag po la sogs pa gdug pa dang / drag po rnams ni khro bos gdul bar 'gyur bas te /
translated: Why? “For the sake of those to be tamed,” means that the fierce ones such as Rudra, the fierce ones, are tamed by wrath.

original: de'i phyir khro bos gdul ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rdo rje sems dba' nyid khro bor 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khro bos gdul ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rdo rje sems dba' nyid khro bor 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, for the sake of that cause of taming by wrath, Vajrasattva himself becomes wrathful,

original: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by the power of afflictions.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur zhe na /
translated: What kind of special wrath does he become?

original: rdo rje ltar 'bar ba ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje ltar 'bar ba ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: The blazing like a vajra is as follows.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste /
translated: The word “ni” is for the purpose of restriction.

original: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nyid de gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba nyid de gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the wrathful Vajra-Sun-Blazing, and not anything else.

original: rdo rje ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems te /
translated: The vajra is the mind characterized by great enlightenment.

original: de'i 'bar ba ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad la rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sngon po 'bar ba'i ngo bo sems dpa'i ste 'od kyi 'khor lo dmar po 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bar ba ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad la rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sngon po 'bar ba'i ngo bo sems dpa'i ste 'od kyi 'khor lo dmar po 'bar ba'o //
translated: Its blazing is the nature of the blazing blue vajra of body, speech, and mind, which always abides in the entire realm of space.

original: de nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ste /
translated: That very thing is the vajra-sun-blazing,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa can bsregs nas /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa can bsregs nas /
translated: having burned the defiled,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mdzad pas na nyi ma dang mtshungs pas nyi ma'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mdzad pas na nyi ma dang mtshungs pas nyi ma'o //
translated: and having made the buddha-nature in the buddha-field, it is the sun, being similar to the sun.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'jigs pa las kyang 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog tu 'jigs pa ni nga yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'jigs pa las kyang 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog tu 'jigs pa ni nga yin no //
translated: For that very reason, “I am the supreme fear of fear, even of the terrible.”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, the Lord having taught the vajra-grasp of reality,

original: da ni lha mo rnams kyi gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni lha mo rnams kyi gsungs pa yin te /
translated: now, it is the goddesses who speak.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'o //
translated: The vajra-sun blazing like fire is as explained.

original: de las byung ba ni skyes pas te de'i 'od kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni skyes pas te de'i 'od kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Arisen from that is born, arisen from the circle of its light, is the meaning.

original: grib ma zhes bya ba ni de dang rjes su mthun zhing mtshungs pas te de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa ni skyed par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: grib ma zhes bya ba ni de dang rjes su mthun zhing mtshungs pas te de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa ni skyed par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The shadow is similar to that, equal to that, and the Tathagatas generate that emanation.

original: las de lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /🔽ma lus bdud sogs gdug pa yi //
analyzed: las de lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na / ma lus bdud sogs gdug pa yi //
translated: What is the action of one who has such?🔽The blood of all the wicked

original: khrag gsol bar ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: khrag gsol bar ni nus pa'o //
translated: demons and so forth is drunk.

original: zhes bya ba la lus pa med pa'i bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pa rnams kyi khrag gsol pa'i @77a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la lus pa med pa'i bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pa rnams kyi khrag gsol pa'i @77a * //
translated: The blood of all the wicked demons and so forth is drunk,

original: nus pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: together with the power.

original: shin tu nyal du bcug pa ni shin tu gsod pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu nyal du bcug pa ni shin tu gsod pa'o //
