translated: Very sleeping is very killing.

original: des dag pa ni dag par gyur pas te rjes su brtse bas ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: des dag pa ni dag par gyur pas te rjes su brtse bas ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: By that, purified means that it becomes purified, not by subsequent compassion.

original: mi'i khrag sngags kyi stobs kyis dgug pa 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni khrag chen po'o //
analyzed: mi'i khrag sngags kyi stobs kyis dgug pa 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni khrag chen po'o //
translated: The great blood is that which is accomplished by the power of mantra to summon human blood.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: slar yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
translated: Again, its meaning should be explained.

original: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: As before, having performed the great yoga by the yoga of Vajra-fierce-fire,

original: lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis nye bar 'dug la dkyil 'khor thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig tu lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis nye bar 'dug la dkyil 'khor thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
translated: together with the girls endowed with the yoga of the four goddesses, having sat in union with the four goddesses, having completed all the maṇḍalas just as they are,

original: ji srid mtshan ma thog par 'gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid mtshan ma thog par 'gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate for as long as the signs arise.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / lha lhag par gnas par byas la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang / lha lhag par gnas par byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the consecration of the disciple just as before, and the consecration of the deity,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor la thig btab nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du bris la de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla pa phyed pa'i dbyibs can de'i steng du 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor la thig btab nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du bris la de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla pa phyed pa'i dbyibs can de'i steng du 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes
translated: On top of that, one should draw the blazing wheel beautified with eight pillars,

original: pa ste / lcags kyi phye mas 'bar bar bris la /
analyzed: pa ste / lcags kyi phye mas 'bar bar bris la /
translated: drawn with blazing iron powder.

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar padma'i ras ris kyis bkab pa'i gdan la /
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar padma'i ras ris kyis bkab pa'i gdan la /
translated: In the center of the inner maṇḍala, on a seat covered with a lotus cloth,

original: lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu slob dpon gyis 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bu mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu slob dpon gyis 'dug par bya'o //
translated: the master should sit together with four girls who are endowed with the yoga of one’s deity, with the yoga of the complete gathering of the four goddesses.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi po la khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi po la khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the four directions of the outer maṇḍala, one should place the yoginīs of the wrathful ladies, such as the flirtatious lady, and so on.

original: sgo bzhi po la khro mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi'am /
analyzed: sgo bzhi po la khro mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi'am /
translated: At the four doors, one should place the four yoginīs, such as the wrathful lady Vajra Hook, and so on.

original: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams dgod par bya'o //
translated: The disciples who are endowed with that yoga should be installed.

original: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas tshogs yod na tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtags te /
analyzed: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas tshogs yod na tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtags te /
translated: Thus, having performed the preliminary service, if there is an assembly, one should examine the assembly wheel.

original: go cha thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: go cha thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should practice all the armor.

original: rang 'jug pa'i dus dang / slob la gzhug pa'i dus su rang gi slob dpon nam de'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan dbus su dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang 'jug pa'i dus dang / slob la gzhug pa'i dus su rang gi slob dpon nam de'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan dbus su dgod par bya'o //
translated: At the time of one's own entry and at the time of inducting the disciples, one's own master or another endowed with those qualities should be installed in the center.

original: gang la tshogs med na de'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das @77b snying po 'dis ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang la tshogs med na de'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das @77b snying po 'dis ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
translated: If there is no assembly, in the center of the mandala, in the center of the four-fold garland of goddesses, the Bhagavān should be painted on the canvas with this essence:

original: h'um zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Hum is the seed syllable of Amoghasiddhi.

original: rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'i snying po ni hni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'i snying po ni hni zhes bya'o //
translated: The essence of the blazing fire of great vajra desire is ha ni.

original: gnyis pa ni h'um zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni h'um zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The second is huṃ.

original: gsum pa ni aom badzra ru lu lu lam hni zhes bya ba'o /
analyzed: gsum pa ni aom badzra ru lu lu lam hni zhes bya ba'o /
translated: The third is oṃ vajra rulu lu lu ha ni.

original: bzhi pa ni shne zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni shne zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The fourth is śa ni.

original: khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i snying po rnams kyis dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i snying po rnams kyis dgod par bya'o //
translated: The goddesses such as the wrathful goddess of charm and so forth are to be arranged with the essence mantras explained above.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phyi la bsdu par byas nas mtshan brgyas bstod nas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phyi la bsdu par byas nas mtshan brgyas bstod nas /
translated: Then, having gathered outside the four doors of the mandala, praise with the one hundred names.

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug ste bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug ste bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: Then, with the mudra and mantra for summoning from the Great Sun-like Blazing-fire Mandala, invite the Bhagavān with his retinue into the mandala, and perform the expulsion of obstructors and so forth.

original: yi ge h'um gis mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis mchod yon phul te /
translated: Then, offer the welcome water with the syllable hūṃ.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, accomplish with the pledge seals.

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la rgyas btab ste thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la rgyas btab ste thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
translated: Confer empowerment with the mudra of the supreme body of the Tathagata.

original: mchod yon bu la ba sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: mchod yon bu la ba sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis mchod pa bya'o //
translated: Offer water for welcoming, and so forth, and all the branches of offerings.

original: de la re zhig padma'i snod du khrag chen dang ga bur dang tsandan dmar po yi ge h'um gis mngon par bsngags ba /
analyzed: de la re zhig padma'i snod du khrag chen dang ga bur dang tsandan dmar po yi ge h'um gis mngon par bsngags ba /
translated: In this regard, in a lotus vessel, with the syllable hum, consecrate great blood, camphor, and red sandalwood.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi yal ga bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du bzhag ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi yal ga bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du bzhag ste /
translated: With the Bhagavat's pledge seal, hold a vajra flower branch in front of the Bhagavat himself.

original: bum pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Offer the vases and the filled vases.

original: de nas mchod ba thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod ba thams cad bya'o //
translated: Then, perform all the offerings.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan zhing /
translated: Then, with the yoga of the Bhagavat, endowed with great yoga,

original: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang / sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i bu mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas gar las byung ba'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo me tog dang bcas pa spyi bor bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang / sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i bu mo bzhi dang lhan cig tu phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas gar las byung ba'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo me tog dang bcas pa spyi bor bcings te /
translated: endowed with the yoga of the four goddesses such as Vajra Passion, and together with the four girls who have performed the prior approximation, having first made the four prostrations, bind the añjali gesture of prostration arisen from dance together with flowers above the head.

original: de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
analyzed: de bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
translated: Similarly, take up the flower garland.🔽With the vajra gait, the vajra bow and arrow, I pay homage to you.

original: rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje mda' gzhu can khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje mda' gzhu can khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i glu brjod cing 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Recite the song of engaging and enter.

original: bu mo bzhi pos kyang rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis @78a * //
analyzed: bu mo bzhi pos kyang rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis @78a * //
translated: The four girls also make the pledge seal of their deity with both hands

original: kyis 'ching zhing me tog phreng ba blangs te 'jug pa'i glu dang / rang gi lha'i snying po bzla zhing 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: kyis 'ching zhing me tog phreng ba blangs te 'jug pa'i glu dang / rang gi lha'i snying po bzla zhing 'jug par bya'o //
translated: and having taken up the flower garland, one should enter with the song of entry, and one should enter reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity.

original: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar sa thams cad rjes su sbyangs nas /
analyzed: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar sa thams cad rjes su sbyangs nas /
translated: Then, having purified all the disciples in the maṇḍala of the painting of Śrī Vajrasattva with the vajra conduct of the siddhis,

original: me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis bu mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig rnams bzung la /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis bu mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig rnams bzung la /
translated: having made perfect offerings to oneself with the twelve offerings of the mudrā goddesses beginning with the flower, together with the four girls, having taken up the realities, the Dharma, and the pledges,

original: snying po dang / phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas blangs te /
analyzed: snying po dang / phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas blangs te /
translated: having taken up the knowledge of the essence and the four seals from the Bhagavat,

original: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bos rjes su gnang ba dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa mnos la /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bos rjes su gnang ba dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa mnos la /
translated: having received the authorization, encouragement, and prophecy with the five verses,

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
translated: one should perform the yoga of Vajrasūrya-jvalana.

original: bu mo bzhi yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas blangs te /
analyzed: bu mo bzhi yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas blangs te /
translated: The four girls also take up the oblation with their deity yoga.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis zla ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor dang lhan cig tu bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis zla ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor dang lhan cig tu bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala, one should enter oneself together with the maṇḍala of the crescent moon, through the yoga of union with the four goddesses.

original: de nas thams cad dgug dang mchod pa dang / bdag byin gyis brlab pa sogs bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: de nas thams cad dgug dang mchod pa dang / bdag byin gyis brlab pa sogs bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Then, having completed the practice of the self-consecration and so forth, the summoning of all, and the worship,

original: nyin re'i sbyor bas yi ge h'um gi bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
analyzed: nyin re'i sbyor bas yi ge h'um gi bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
translated: one should perform the recitation of the syllable hūṃ one hundred thousand times with daily practice.

original: bu mo rnams kyis kyang rang gi lha mo rnams kyi ba bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
analyzed: bu mo rnams kyis kyang rang gi lha mo rnams kyi ba bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
translated: The girls also should perform the recitation of their respective goddesses one hundred thousand times.

original: de nas khrag chen ga bur bcas /
analyzed: de nas khrag chen ga bur bcas /
translated: Then, one should mix together the great blood, camphor,

original: tsandan dmar po dang bcas pa rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i padma'i snod na gnas par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: tsandan dmar po dang bcas pa rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i padma'i snod na gnas par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: red sandalwood, and the blazing vajra, as explained, in a lotus vessel.

original: srin lag dang mthe bong gi rtse mos blangs te bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: srin lag dang mthe bong gi rtse mos blangs te bza' bar bya'o //
translated: Taking it with the tips of the ring finger and thumb, one should eat it.

original: bu mo de rnams kyis rang gi lha'i snying pos bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: bu mo de rnams kyis rang gi lha'i snying pos bza' bar bya'o //
translated: Those girls should eat it with their own deity’s essence mantra.

original: de nas thams cad mkha' spyod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas thams cad mkha' spyod du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then all of them will become sky-farers.

original: rnal 'byor ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug dang / bu mo rnams ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug dang / bu mo rnams ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin becomes the lord of vajra yogins, and the girls become yoginīs with the form of the great vajra fire of passion and so forth.

original: de nas 'bar ba'i sbyor ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas 'bar ba'i sbyor ba 'di yin te /
translated: Then this is the blazing yoga:

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i dbus su yi ge ha las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i dbus su yi ge ha las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: In the center of a lotus petal, from the syllable hūṃ, a wind maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du thig le dang bcas pa'i yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du me stag 'phro zhing 'bar ba'i yi ge h'um rnams bar bsams @78b la ;
analyzed: de'i steng du thig le dang bcas pa'i yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du me stag 'phro zhing 'bar ba'i yi ge h'um rnams bar bsams @78b la ;
translated: On top of that, from the syllable raṃ with a drop, a fire maṇḍala. On top of that, imagine the syllable hūṃ, blazing and radiating sparks.

original: rdzas de des rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa rnams par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas de des rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa rnams par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on that substance being completely consumed by that fire.

original: gang zhig la rab tu 'bar ba'i nus pa med de bza' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig la rab tu 'bar ba'i nus pa med de bza' bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not eat that which does not have the power of blazing.

original: 'o na kyang rjes su bsgrub pa dang / so sor rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas mtshan ma ma lus par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'o na kyang rjes su bsgrub pa dang / so sor rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas mtshan ma ma lus par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: However, one should accomplish all the signs with the yoga of the assembly of the practice and the individual practice.

original: de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin 'dun par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin 'dun par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, at sunrise, one will attain the desired power just as one wishes.

original: gal te slob ma rnams gzhug par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te slob ma rnams gzhug par 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to induct the disciples,

original: de'i tshe bu mo rnams med par 'jug pa gnyis pas 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe bu mo rnams med par 'jug pa gnyis pas 'jug par bya ste /
translated: then, in the absence of the girls, one should induct them with the second induction.

original: cho ga thams cad kyang rjes su spyad la rdo rje bzung ste ba zhin du nyi ma me lngar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i chogs phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: cho ga thams cad kyang rjes su spyad la rdo rje bzung ste ba zhin du nyi ma me lngar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i chogs phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
translated: One should also perform all the rites, and having taken up the vajra, one should have them perform four prostrations with the rite of entering into the maṇḍala of the blazing sun and five fires.

original: de nas byang chub chen por sems bskyed du gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas byang chub chen por sems bskyed du gzhug go //
translated: Then, one should have them generate the mind of awakening.

original: de nas de rnams rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gzugs su byas la yang dag par mchod de /🔽gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de rnams rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i gzugs su byas la yang dag par mchod de / gar las byung ba'i me tog dang bcas pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, having made them into the form of Vajra-sun-like-a-burning-fire, one should make a perfect offering.🔽Then, having made them bind the añjali gesture of homage together with the flower arisen from the dance,

original: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug nas gzhug ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug nas gzhug ste /
translated: one should cause them to enter by means of that very [gesture].

original: thams cad byas la rdo rje la sogs pa gsum po de rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad byas la rdo rje la sogs pa gsum po de rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having made them all enter, one should give them the three, the vajra and so forth.

original: rtag tu 'dod chags las byung khrod //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod chags las byung khrod //
translated: In the midst of those arisen from passion,

original: rdo rje sems pa'i gdul bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje sems pa'i gdul bya'i phyir //
translated: for the sake of the disciples of Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar //
translated: the vajra sun like a burning fire

original: mchog tu rab 'jigs 'di yin no //
analyzed: mchog tu rab 'jigs 'di yin no //
translated: is the most frightening of all.

original: zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid 'dis gsang ba lnga'i bshad pa byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor la la'o //🔽rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid 'dis gsang ba lnga'i bshad pa byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya ba ni rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor la la'o // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni //
translated: Having explained the five secrets by means of this reality, the giving of the vajra is for the yogi/nī of the vajra sun like a burning fire.🔽The vajra yoginīs

original: rdo rje nyi ma 'bar 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma 'bar 'byung ba'i //
translated: are the vajra sun arisen from the burning

original: grib ma 'di dag bdud la sogs //
analyzed: grib ma 'di dag bdud la sogs //
translated: These shadows are demons and so forth,

original: gdug pa ma lus khrag za nus //
analyzed: gdug pa ma lus khrag za nus //
translated: able to drink the blood of all the wicked.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul //
translated: The Tathagatas emanate them.

original: zhes pa'i de kho na nyid 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i de kho na nyid 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: With this reality, one should give.

original: rdo rje kha tv'am ga nges par sbyor ba'i ba dan dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bu chos 'dis dgrol bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kha tv'am ga nges par sbyor ba'i ba dan dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bu chos 'dis dgrol bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o //
translated: With this Dharma, one should explain: The vajra khaṭvāṅga, together with the banner, the vajra and bell, are to be released.

original: de la chos ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la chos ni 'di yin te /
translated: The Dharma is as follows:

original: shin tu ma rungs drag po dang // bdag po grogs bo bu rnams dang // shin tu nyal du bcug nas brtag / rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs //
analyzed: shin tu ma rungs drag po dang // bdag po grogs bo bu rnams dang // shin tu nyal du bcug nas brtag / rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs //
translated: Having put to sleep the very wicked, the violent, the masters, the friends, and the children, one should examine. The supreme vajra is said to be held.

original: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges @79a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges @79a * //
translated: This is the banner of the vajra khaṭvāṅga, which is the supreme secret, the reality of the descent of the bindu.

original: par sbyar ba'i ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu ni thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / thams cad lhung bar byed pa dang / slong bar byed pa'o //🔽dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //

analyzed: sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyi la mo krung gis bzhugs pa /

translated: The pledge seal of the second goddess is to hold the pledge seal of Kilikīla as taught in the great maṇḍala of the wrathful one, the Vajra of Ecstasy.

analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rang rang gi snying bo kho na'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o //

original: de'i rjes la chog thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la chog thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should perform all the rites.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the Sri Paramādya called Prajñāpāramitā-udaya,

original: // / de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bstan nas re zhig bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rang rang gi snying pos dgod par bya ste 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o //

translated: The word then expresses immediacy, meaning immediately after the previous samādhi.

translated: On all sides of him means on all sides of that Lokeśvara, one should draw Krodhanā and so forth in the four directions. One who has the form and hand implements of Rudra and so forth is having the form and hand implements of Rudra and so forth.

original: padma dang bcas par bzhugs pas na padma dang bcas pa ste padma rigs kyi lha mo rnams padma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma dang bcas par bzhugs pas na padma dang bcas pa ste padma rigs kyi lha mo rnams padma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: One who abides together with a lotus is together with a lotus, and the goddesses of the lotus family should be drawn together with lotuses.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: It will be explained like this:

original: h'um padma tsandi shva ra h'um phat ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sku mdog dang dbyibs dang ldan pa'i don yod zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: h'um padma tsandi shva ra h'um phat ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sku mdog dang dbyibs dang ldan pa'i don yod zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug bri bar bya ste /
translated: Hūṃ padma candīśvara hūṃ phaṭ - by this essence mantra, one should draw Amoghapāśa Lokeśvara, endowed with the color and shape as explained,

original: de ni padma gcig la bzhugs //
analyzed: de ni padma gcig la bzhugs //
translated: abiding on a single lotus.

original: de yi 'od kyis 'khor lor brten //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyis 'khor lor brten //
translated: His light supports the wheel,

original: drag mo sogs gzugs phyag mtshan ldan //
analyzed: drag mo sogs gzugs phyag mtshan ldan //
translated: having the form and hand implements of Rudra and so forth.

original: khro gnyer ma sogs bri bar bya //
analyzed: khro gnyer ma sogs bri bar bya //
translated: and Padminī, and Bhṛkuṭī.

original: de la g-yas logs su padma khyab 'jug ma ste phyag g-yas padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: de la g-yas logs su padma khyab 'jug ma ste phyag g-yas padma 'dzin pa /
translated: To the right of him is Padminī, holding a lotus in her right hand,

original: g-yon pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
translated: and a discus in her left.

original: de nyid kyi g-yas logs su khro gnyer ma ste phyag g-yas pas padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi g-yas logs su khro gnyer ma ste phyag g-yas pas padma 'dzin pa /
translated: To the right of her is Bhṛkuṭī, holding a lotus in her right hand,

original: g-yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o //
translated: and a trident in her left.

original: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su gos dkar mo ste phyag g-yon pas phreng ba 'dzin pa /🔽phyag g-yas pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su gos dkar mo ste phyag g-yon pas phreng ba 'dzin pa / phyag g-yas pas padma 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Again, to the left of the Lord is Pāṇḍaravāsinī, holding a rosary in her left hand,🔽and a lotus in her right.

original: de nyid kyi g-yon logs su padma la chags pa ste padma mda' gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi g-yon logs su padma la chags pa ste padma mda' gzhu 'dzin pa ste /
translated: To the left of her is Padmadhyāśayā, holding a lotus bow and arrow.

original: hr'i: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bri par bya'o //
analyzed: hr'i: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bri par bya'o //
translated: One should write the essence mantra of her, which is hriḥ.

original: gnas gang du ras ris 'di bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du ras ris 'di bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: Where should this painting be made?

original: 'khor lo de ni brtan gnas su //
analyzed: 'khor lo de ni brtan gnas su //
translated: In a firm place,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de brtags te bri bar byas nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de brtags te bri bar byas nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus imagined the maṇḍala of the Lotus family, one should draw the secret maṇḍala.

original: dam pa ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: dam pa ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: The “best” is the most excellent.

original: ras ris 'di ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ras ris 'di ni dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
translated: This painting should be drawn in the center of the central maṇḍala.

original: de nas padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i chogs phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su bri ba'o //
analyzed: de nas padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i chogs phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su bri ba'o //
translated: Then, the Lotus Maidens and so forth are drawn in the outer maṇḍala’s quarters, with the ritual taught in the Maṇḍala of Subjugating the World.

original: sgo ba ni la ni lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje @81a * //
analyzed: sgo ba ni la ni lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o // rdo rje @81a * //
translated: The gatekeepers are drawn, such as the Hook Lady and so forth.

original: sems dpa'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni mtshon cha mchog gi go cha ste go cha de thams cad ni rang gi cho ga rgyas pa dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa byas pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni mtshon cha mchog gi go cha ste go cha de thams cad ni rang gi cho ga rgyas pa dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa byas pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The ritual of the painting of Vajrasattva is the supreme weapon armor. Having performed the extensive ritual of that armor, the extensive ritual of the disciples’ entrance and so forth, one should give the reality, doctrine, and pledge.

original: de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa ste de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so sor gzigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa ste de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so sor gzigs pa yin no //
translated: The reality is the ultimate, and the Bhagavat Buddha is Avalokita, who is seen individually by the Tathagatas.

original: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur bas na de nyid dbang phyug go //
analyzed: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur bas na de nyid dbang phyug go //
translated: He is the Lord because he is not subject to the power of the other, i.e., the afflicted, together with their residues.🔽Therefore, the ultimate Avalokita is the Lord, and not the Bodhisattva who is on the lower stages.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na don dam pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na don dam pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The word “dance” is supplied.🔽What is the special quality? It is the means of conversion.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams 'dis 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can rnams 'dis 'dul ba ste /
translated: The sentient beings are converted by this.

original: 'dul ba yang de yin la thabs kyang de nyid yin pas na 'dul ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: 'dul ba yang de yin la thabs kyang de nyid yin pas na 'dul ba'i thabs so //
translated: It is the means of conversion because it is both the conversion and the means.

original: de gang yin zhe na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i rol pas gar ni rol pa'i gar te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gar mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i rol pas gar ni rol pa'i gar te 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gar mdzad pa yin no //
translated: What is that? The dance is the dance of the sport of the Lord of the World, the Blessed Buddha, who is free from the stains of passion, etc., and who takes on the form of the Lord of the World.

original: mchog kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas na rol pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas na rol pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: And since it is supreme and also a vajra, it is the vajra of sport.

original: gang zhig de kho na nyid de ni mchog gi rdo rje ste nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig de kho na nyid de ni mchog gi rdo rje ste nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: That reality is the supreme vajra, which has the meaning of the wisdom that definitely brings forth.

original: 'dis padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas padma rdo rje blang par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas padma rdo rje blang par bya'o //
translated: By this, the practitioner of the lotus family should take the lotus vajra.

original: de ltar de kho na nyid kyis padma blangs te /
analyzed: de ltar de kho na nyid kyis padma blangs te /
translated: Thus, having taken the lotus with reality,

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol par bya //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol par bya //
translated: one should ring the Dharma bell.

original: zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of this, it is said:

original: ji ltar padma dmar po ni //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po ni //
translated: Just as a red lotus,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs te ji ltar padma rang gi rang bzhin gyi kha dog dmar pos dmar bas te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'dod chags kyi skyon rnams dang / sna tshogs pa'i gnas kyi nyes pa rnams 'dam dang chu la sogs pa'i skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i khams gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba dril
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs te ji ltar padma rang gi rang bzhin gyi kha dog dmar pos dmar bas te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i 'dod chags kyi skyon rnams dang / sna tshogs pa'i gnas kyi nyes pa rnams 'dam dang chu la sogs pa'i skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i khams gsum pa yin no zhes bya ba dril
translated: As such, just as a lotus is not soiled by the faults of the stains of the mud, water, and so on, in the same way, ultimately, the element is free from the stains of the concepts of apprehended and apprehender.

original: bu'i sgra dkrol ba bskyed cing /
analyzed: bu'i sgra dkrol ba bskyed cing /
translated: The sound of the bell is explained.

original: chos bdag med pa la chags par byed pas dmar ba dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa la chags pa'i @81b byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa la chags par byed pas dmar ba dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa la chags pa'i @81b byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: Since it is red due to being attached to the selflessness of phenomena, it is to be meditated on as a bodhisattva who is attached to accomplishing the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'dis 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa la chags pa dang sems can smin pa dang grol ba'i chags pa la chags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' padma ltar srid pa'i skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'o//
analyzed: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa la chags pa dang sems can smin pa dang grol ba'i chags pa la chags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' padma ltar srid pa'i skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'o//
translated: The bodhisattva who is attached to the passion of the selflessness of phenomena and who is attached to the passion of maturing and liberating sentient beings is not soiled by the faults of existence, like a lotus.

original: da ni / dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: da ni / dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the meaning of the passage beginning🔽“Having consecrated with the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
translated: recite the essence mantra,”

original: zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: cho ga gang dang gang dag gis //
analyzed: cho ga gang dang gang dag gis //
translated: By whatever rites🔽and by whatever natures of rites,🔽sentient beings are disciplined by the realm of sentient beings,

original: zhes bya ba la gang dang gang gi rang bzhin gyi cho gas 'gro bas sems cang yi khams 'dul bar gyur pa de dang des spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gang dang gang gi rang bzhin gyi cho gas 'gro bas sems cang yi khams 'dul bar gyur pa de dang des spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: by that one should practice.

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa ni padma thams cad dag pa'i mchog gi rnal 'byor te de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa ni padma thams cad dag pa'i mchog gi rnal 'byor te de'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The discernment that “all phenomena are pure by nature” is the yoga of the supreme purity of all lotuses. Its nature is that very nature.

original: gzugs de nyid kyis sku'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir 'gro ba sbyangs te 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i sgom pa rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs de nyid kyis sku'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir 'gro ba sbyangs te 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i sgom pa rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One Avalokiteśvara, whose nature is the seal of the body of that very form, here purifies and trains beings, and causes them to be established in the practice.

original: rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang yin la /
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang yin la /
translated: The pledge of all vajra Dharma: all are vajra Dharma, and the pledge of those is the meditation just explained.

original: rdo rje chos kyang yin pas na thams cad kyi rdo rje chos te padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyang yin pas na thams cad kyi rdo rje chos te padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: All are vajra Dharma, and the deities of the lotus family have the nature of the secret of the body of all vajra Dharma.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sgom pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sgom pa'o //
translated: The pledge of those is the meditation just explained.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir sgom pa ni 'dis padma'i rigs thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir sgom pa ni 'dis padma'i rigs thams cad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that is so, this meditation is taught for the practitioners of all the lotus family, by the consecration of their own deity’s great seal.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du padma gar gyi mchod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du padma gar gyi mchod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, as before, with the offering of dance of the lotus, etc.

original: de ltar slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par rjes su spyad nas glu dang rol mo'i cho gas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la dkyil 'khor pa'i gar gyis mchod pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod la rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //🔽dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ras ris kyi @82a * //
analyzed: de ltar slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par rjes su spyad nas glu dang rol mo'i cho gas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la dkyil 'khor pa'i gar gyis mchod pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod la rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o // dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher 'grel pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ras ris kyi @82a * //
translated: Thus, having performed the extensive ritual of inducting the disciple, etc., one should worship the mandala with the ritual of song and music, with the offering of dance of the mandala deities, and with the seal of worship of various kinds, and one should perform all the rituals taught in the Vajrasattva painting mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the mandala of the painting of Vinayaka, from the commentary on the glorious Supreme Original Buddha called “The Arising of the Perfection of Wisdom.”

original: // / de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas da ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i don du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas da ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i don du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus taught the secret maṇḍala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, now, in order to teach for the sake of Ārya Ākāśagarbha,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni 'das ma thag pa la ste dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin 'das ma thag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni 'das ma thag pa la ste dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin 'das ma thag pa kho na'o //
translated: the Blessed One spoke the “procedure for accomplishing all aims of Ākāśagarbha.” The word “then” refers to the immediately preceding [topics], namely, the first union and the samādhi of the supreme king of maṇḍalas and the supreme king of activities.

original: de la dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa kho na'o //
translated: There, the samādhi of the first union is taught only in the maṇḍala of the painting of Śrī Vajrasattva.

original: de nas ji lte ba bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor sprul te /
analyzed: de nas ji lte ba bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor sprul te /
translated: Then, just as it is, the maṇḍala of the painting of the Blessed One is emanated by the yoga of Ārya Ākāśagarbha.

original: rang gi snying po rnams kyis gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya ste 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis so //
analyzed: rang gi snying po rnams kyis gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya ste 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis so //
translated: One should arrange the essences in their respective places. This is the second meditative stabilization.

original: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par byas te /
analyzed: de nas 'dus pa sngon du 'gro bas gsum pa shes par byas te /
translated: Then, having performed the preliminary gathering, one should understand the third.

original: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i cho ga rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la ;
analyzed: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i cho ga rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa gsungs te / rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la ;
translated: Having obtained the initiation and the commitments, one should perform the repetition and meditation. In order to teach the ritual of the master's ritual actions, such as inducting the disciples, it is said:🔽Having drawn the outer mandala like the Secret Vajrasattva Mandala,🔽in the center of that, with a size of half of that, one should draw a sun mandala. On top of that, one should draw a jewel mandala in the shape of an eight-faceted gem. Having drawn the inner mandala in that way, one should draw the Bhagavat

original: de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i steng du cha brgyad pa'i nor bu'i dbyibs can gyi rin po che'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig gi sa la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam
analyzed: de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i steng du cha brgyad pa'i nor bu'i dbyibs can gyi rin po che'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig gi sa la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam
translated: Ākāśagarbha in the center of the inner mandala.

original: mkha'i snying po sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen pos sna tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bee d'urya sngon po dang mtshungs pa /
analyzed: mkha'i snying po sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen pos sna tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bee d'urya sngon po dang mtshungs pa /
translated: Ākāśagarbha is to be drawn on a variegated lotus seat in the mudra of the great seal as previously explained, sitting in the sattva posture, and is the color of blue beryl.

original: aom sarba badzr'a dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi bhur bh'u ba sva: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarba badzr'a dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi bhur bh'u ba sva: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: He is to be drawn with the essence mantra, “Oṃ, all vajra lords, consecrate me, bhur bhuvaḥ svāḥ.”

original: de yi padma gcig la bzhugs //
analyzed: de yi padma gcig la bzhugs //
translated: “Seated on one of his lotuses,

original: de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten //
analyzed: de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten //
translated: supported by a halo of light,

original: dbang bskur ba dang gtor ma nyid //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang gtor ma nyid //
translated: consecration and bali offerings,

original: rgyal mtshan mchog ma mchod chen mo //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan mchog ma mchod chen mo //
translated: the supreme victory banner, great worship.”

original: zhes bya ba 'di bri bar bya ste de la de'i g-yas logs su lha mo gter ma /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di bri bar bya ste de la de'i g-yas logs su lha mo gter ma /
translated: This is to be drawn. To his right is the goddess Nidhāna,

original: ma h'a badzra ni dha ne h'um zhes bya ba snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a badzra ni dha ne h'um zhes bya ba snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: drawn with the essence mantra, “Mahāvajra nidhane hūṃ.”

original: de'i yang g-yas logs su lha mo @82b dbang bskur ma /
analyzed: de'i yang g-yas logs su lha mo @82b dbang bskur ma /
translated: To her right is the goddess Abhishikā,

original: badzra aa bhi shi ka dzam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: badzra aa bhi shi ka dzam zhes bya'o //
translated: “Vajra abhiṣiñca jaḥ.”

original: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rgyal mtshan thogs mchog ma ste /
analyzed: slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rgyal mtshan thogs mchog ma ste /
translated: Again, to the left of the Lord is Dhvaja-agra-dharika,

original: aom badzra ma ni dhva dz'a gra ke yu re bam zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis so //
analyzed: aom badzra ma ni dhva dz'a gra ke yu re bam zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis so //
translated: with the essence mantra Om Vajra-dhvaja-agra-keyure Bham.

original: de'i yang g-yon logs su mchod chen ma ste /
analyzed: de'i yang g-yon logs su mchod chen ma ste /
translated: To her left is Maha-puchim,

original: ma h'a badzra ma h'a he he ho zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a badzra ma h'a he he ho zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: with the essence mantra Mahamahe-he-ho.

original: dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Empowerment is held by Ratnamukuuta.

original: gter gyi lha mo ni gter gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gter gyi lha mo ni gter gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Treasure Goddess holds a treasure vase.

original: rgyal mtshan mchog ma ni rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan mchog ma ni rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Dhvaja-agra holds a jewel victory banner.

original: mchod chen ma ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang gdu bu dang / rna cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rin po che dang / na bza' la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i snod 'dzin ma'o //
analyzed: mchod chen ma ni dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang gdu bu dang / rna cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / rin po che dang / na bza' la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i rin po che'i snod 'dzin ma'o //
translated: Maha-puchim holds a jewel vessel filled with all ornaments such as nets, half-nets, bracelets, earrings, armlets, jewels, and garments.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams la rin po che'i sgreg mo la sogs pa dang / sgo rnams la sngar bshad pa'i snying po rnams kyis lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams la rin po che'i sgreg mo la sogs pa dang / sgo rnams la sngar bshad pa'i snying po rnams kyis lcags kyu ma la sogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the corners of the outer maṇḍala, one should draw the jeweled canopy, and so forth, and at the gates, one should draw the hook, and so forth, with the essence mantras explained above.

original: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas rang gi cho ga thams cad dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas rang gi cho ga thams cad dang / slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, having performed all the rites of oneself, and all the rites of inducting the disciples, and so forth, according to the rite of the maṇḍala of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: slob ma rnams la rdo rje rin po che de kho na nyid sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la rdo rje rin po che de kho na nyid sbyin par bya'o //
translated: one should give the disciples the vajra-jewel suchness.🔽The suchness of that is as follows: “This sun,” and so forth.

original: de la de kho na nyid ni 'di yin te nyi ma 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de kho na nyid ni 'di yin te nyi ma 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: That which was previously taught is the noble Ākāśagarbha, who fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kho na 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad la 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag mtshan rdo rje rin po
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kho na 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad la 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag mtshan rdo rje rin po
translated: The meaning is that the Tathagata himself, in the form of the noble Akashagarbha, remains in order to fulfill the wishes of all sentient beings for as long as cyclic existence lasts.

original: ches bstan pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ches bstan pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The vajra jewel, the insignia of the jewel lineage, is shown.

original: da ni chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the ringing of the Dharma bell, he declares all wishes, etc.

original: bsam pa grub pa yang de yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na bsam pa grub pa thams cad de /
analyzed: bsam pa grub pa yang de yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na bsam pa grub pa thams cad de /
translated: It is the fulfillment of wishes and it is all, thus it is the fulfillment of all wishes.

original: nor bu'i rigs dang tha mi dad pa'i dngos grub thams cad do //
analyzed: nor bu'i rigs dang tha mi dad pa'i dngos grub thams cad do //
translated: It is all powers not different from the jewel lineage.

original: de rnams kyi nang na nor gyi @83a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang na nor gyi @83a * //
translated: Among them, wealth is the best.

original: bsam ba grub pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ste ser sna'i dri ma bsal bas gnyis su med pa nyid kyi phyir nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsam ba grub pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ste ser sna'i dri ma bsal bas gnyis su med pa nyid kyi phyir nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That which is accomplished by the thought is the supreme, because of the non-duality which is the removal of the stain of avarice. This is the meaning of the statement, “the success of the jewel family.”

original: de zhes bya ba nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub de yang 'dod pa rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub de yang 'dod pa rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par ste /
translated: And that success of the jewel family is to be accomplished for the sake of the accomplishment of desire.

original: byang chub chen po'i sems rdzogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i sems rdzogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement, “for the sake of the perfection of the thought of enlightenment.”

original: de ci'i phyir 'dod pas rab tu grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir 'dod pas rab tu grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it to be accomplished for the sake of the accomplishment of desire?

original: 'dod las thar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dod las thar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Because of the liberation from desire, etc.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub chen po'i sems mngon du bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi 'dod pa las thogs dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi thar pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub chen po'i sems mngon du bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi 'dod pa las thogs dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi thar pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the liberation from desire which has the nature of the manifestation of the thought of enlightenment, one manifests the liberation of the plane of reality which is without beginning or end.

original: gang zhig thar pa de nyid ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba rang gi ngo bo ma spangs pa'i rang bzhin yin no //🔽da ni / dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: gang zhig thar pa de nyid ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba rang gi ngo bo ma spangs pa'i rang bzhin yin no // da ni / dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: That very liberation is the nature of not abandoning the essence of uncontaminated bliss and mental satisfaction.

original: byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the so-called consecration with the pledge,

original: dman min rnams kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de la dman ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa sgom pa'i rang bzhin te mdo sde pa la rab tu grags pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dman min rnams kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de la dman ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa sgom pa'i rang bzhin te mdo sde pa la rab tu grags pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: he says, “the non-inferior ones, etc.” There, the inferior ones are of the nature of meditation on impermanence, suffering, emptiness, selflessness, and so forth, which is well known to the Sautrāntikas.

original: dman ma yin pa ni dman min te yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i rang bzhin can rnams te /
analyzed: dman ma yin pa ni dman min te yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i rang bzhin can rnams te /
translated: The non-inferior ones are the non-inferior ones, those of the nature of meditation on correct application.

original: de'i dngos bo las byung ba'i bde ba rnams ni 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams te rdo rje theg pa lam mos pa'i bde ba la rab tu grags pa nyid kyis de rnams 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir man ngag dang sgom pa dag gis rnal 'byor pa
analyzed: de'i dngos bo las byung ba'i bde ba rnams ni 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams te rdo rje theg pa lam mos pa'i bde ba la rab tu grags pa nyid kyis de rnams 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir man ngag dang sgom pa dag gis rnal 'byor pa
translated: The pleasures that arise from those things are the pleasures of all desires, which are well known as the pleasures of faith in the Vajra Vehicle path.

original: rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The yogis should give those to themselves and others by means of the instructions and meditations, in order to abandon desire.

original: de rnam pa gang dag la sbyin par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de rnam pa gang dag la sbyin par bya zhe na /
translated: To whom should they give them?🔽To themselves and others, etc.

original: bdag nyid dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag nyid la sgom pa'i dus dang gzhan rnams la sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la nor bu'i rigs grub nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bdag nyid la sgom pa'i dus dang gzhan rnams la sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la nor bu'i rigs grub nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: To themselves at the time of meditation and to others, the entire realm of sentient beings, in order to accomplish all wishes.

original: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas des 'jig rten gyi khams thams
analyzed: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas des 'jig rten gyi khams thams
translated: This is what is being said: The yogin of the jewel family should bind the great seal of his deity and, having completed the mandala of the jewel family equal to the atoms of all world-realms, he should meditate on the purification of the realm of sentient beings equal to the atoms of all world-realms.

original: cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sems @83b can gyi khams yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sems @83b can gyi khams yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgom pas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du rdzogs par byas la /
translated: Having completed the nature of the jewel family,

original: bya ba byas pa ltar de'i rang bzhin can du de dag nyid rnam par bsams te bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba byas pa ltar de'i rang bzhin can du de dag nyid rnam par bsams te bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he should meditate, imagining them to have that nature, as if the action had been performed.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba de ni de lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba de ni de lta bu'o //
translated: Thus means in that way.

original: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang bas te nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang bas te nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Since it is supreme and secret, it is supremely secret, which is the secret mandala of the jewel family.

original: de'i tshul ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de'i tshul ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: The method is the rite of the object of attainment and the means of attainment, as it has been explained.

original: mchog ni nam mkha'i snying po ste de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i rgyud 'das ma thag tu de ltar bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: mchog ni nam mkha'i snying po ste de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i rgyud 'das ma thag tu de ltar bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: The supreme is Akashagarbha, and his extensive rite is the object of attainment and the means of attainment, as it has been explained in the immediately preceding Tantra.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul gyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul gyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The Blessed One has taught the extensive rite of the method, not others. This is the remainder of the sentence.

original: ci'i don du zhe na mchog 'di zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshul 'di mchog yin pas na de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na mchog 'di zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir tshul 'di mchog yin pas na de'i phyir ro //
translated: For what purpose? For the sake of this supreme, because this method is supreme, therefore.

original: 'di nyid kyang ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyang ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is this so?

original: de ni zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir sgrub pa po de nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i dngos grub kyi tshul 'di nyid kyis khyad par du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la gang gi phyir sgrub pa po de nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i dngos grub kyi tshul 'di nyid kyis khyad par du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that practitioner, by means of this very method of the supreme attainment of the Jewel Family, will attain distinction.

original: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad de rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Since they are all concepts, they are all concepts, which are the nature of the secret mandala of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga ni slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga ni slob dpon gyi las dang slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
translated: Their means of accomplishment is the extensive ritual of the master's actions and the initiation of the disciple and so forth.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes pa las nor bu'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes pa las nor bu'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the explanation of the cloth mandala of the jewel family from the commentary on the Shriparamādya called the Perfection of Wisdom Origin.

original: // / de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bstan nas da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya thabs kyi rang bzhin can rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob ba yin no zhes pa'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir de
analyzed: // / de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bstan nas da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya thabs kyi rang bzhin can rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob ba yin no zhes pa'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir de
translated: Having taught the root tantra of the Continuation of the Tantra of All Rituals and the teaching of the ritual methods of all ritual actions, now, in order to teach the meaning of “one will attain the powers of all ritual actions by means of the yoga of self-consecration, which is the nature of the method seal,”

original: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
analyzed: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
translated: then, etc., is stated. The word then indicates the proper time,

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya'i skabs su bab pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dngos grub chen po yang de @84a * //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgya'i skabs su bab pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to // dngos grub chen po yang de @84a * //
translated: the time of the yoga of self-consecration, etc., is the meaning of the statement “the proper time.”

original: nyid yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dngos grub chen po thams cad de /
analyzed: nyid yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dngos grub chen po thams cad de /
translated: That is the great power, and it is also all, thus it is the great power of all.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams thob ba'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams thob ba'o //
translated: It is the attainment of the great seal, etc., of glorious Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de rnams sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcing ba dang rnal 'byor sgom pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcing ba dang rnal 'byor sgom pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The practice of those is the binding of the great seal and so forth, the cultivation of yoga, the consecration of oneself, and so forth.

original: des mchog ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs rnams kyi dam pa'o //
analyzed: des mchog ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs rnams kyi dam pa'o //
translated: The supreme of those is the best of the mundane and supramundane methods.

original: dngos grub thams cad kyis mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang ldan pas na bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad kyis mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang ldan pas na bde ba chen po'o //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Vajrasattva has the characteristics explained just above.

original: nam mkha'i khams thams cad la rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya chen po gang la mnga' ba de ni phyag rgya che'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams thams cad la rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag rgya chen po gang la mnga' ba de ni phyag rgya che'o //
translated: The great seal is that which has the great seal, whose nature is the vajra of body, speech, and mind, which always abides in all the realms of space.

analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang // chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rtog pa thams cad de mchog tu gyur pa de rnams kyi dngos grub ni de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob pa'i don gyis na /
translated: The great seal of glorious Vajrasattva and so on, the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal are all conceptual, and their powers are attained by yogins and yoginis in the nature of those.

original: rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to accomplish the supreme of all concepts,

original: rnams la'o // srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa la sogs pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la rab tu zhugs pa ni sdig pa thams cad byed pa'o //🔽sdig pa thams cad byed pa de rnams nye bar spyod pa'i mun pas bsgribs pas mun pa la gnas pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong ba la sogs pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ba la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams
analyzed: rnams la'o // srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa la sogs pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la rab tu zhugs pa ni sdig pa thams cad byed pa'o // sdig pa thams cad byed pa de rnams nye bar spyod pa'i mun pas bsgribs pas mun pa la gnas pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong ba la sogs pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ba la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams
translated: to those who are engaged in the ten unwholesome paths of action such as killing, stealing, and so on.🔽Those who commit all sins, obscured by the darkness of their conduct, do not see their own reflections, like a mirror-surface in darkness.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi don mdzad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi don mdzad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great beings such as Śrī Vajrasattva do not perform the deeds that have the nature of the great seal and so on.

original: lhag par mos pa'i mig dang bral bas na mi mthong ba ni long ba'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa'i mig dang bral bas na mi mthong ba ni long ba'o //
translated: Lacking the eye of faith, they do not see. Blind,

original: mi mthong ba'i long ba de rnams dang bar byed bas na bsod nams te dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @84b ba'i sgom pa dang byams pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthong ba'i long ba de rnams dang bar byed bas na bsod nams te dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @84b ba'i sgom pa dang byams pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa'o //
translated: those who are blind with not seeing, are purified by the meditation on Śrī Vajrasattva and so on, and the meditation on love and so on.

original: yang dang yang du rnam par sbyong zhing nges par legs par sbyong bar byed pas na bsod nams so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dang yang du rnam par sbyong zhing nges par legs par sbyong bar byed pas na bsod nams so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Merit is that which purifies again and again, and purifies well.

original: bsod nams ma yin pa ni bsod nams min pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa ni bsod nams min pa ste /
translated: Non-merit is demerit.

original: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu'o //
translated: The ten unwholesome courses of action are demerit.

original: de rnams nyid bar mtshams med par bzhugs pas na tshogs te grong khyer gyi chu'i tshogs bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams nyid bar mtshams med par bzhugs pas na tshogs te grong khyer gyi chu'i tshogs bzhin no //
translated: They are a heap because they exist without interval, like a heap of city water.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who has that is endowed with a heap of demerit.

original: bsod nams ma yin pa'i chogs dang ldan pa de rnams la rtag tu dus thams cad du /
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa'i chogs dang ldan pa de rnams la rtag tu dus thams cad du /
translated: Those who are endowed with a heap of demerit, always at all times,

original: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog / mthong ba thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog / mthong ba thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa //
translated: see the supreme heroes Vajrasattva and so forth, as the cause of the method.

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang de rnams yin la sems dpa' mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa'i mchog ster rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang de rnams yin la sems dpa' mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa'i mchog ster rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can no //
translated: The bestowal of the supreme spirit of Vajrasattva, etc. , is the bestowal of the supreme spirit of the five clan deities, who are the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas.

original: de rnams mthong ba ni gdul bya rnams kyis dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams mthong ba ni gdul bya rnams kyis dmigs pa'o //
translated: The seeing of them is the perception of the disciples.

original: de'i thabs kyi rgyu yin pas mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i thabs kyi rgyu yin pas mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu'o //
translated: Since it is the cause of the means of seeing them, it is the cause of the means of seeing.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' mchog rnams mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' mchog rnams mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu'o //
translated: It is the cause of the means of seeing the supreme spirits of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /
translated: The supreme spirit of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: is the cause of the means of seeing.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' mchog ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' mchog ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa ste /
translated: The supreme spirits of Vajrasattva, etc. , are as previously explained.

original: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje ste de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje ste de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra of their body, speech, and mind is the vajra; that itself is the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de nyid kyis bcing ba ni phyag rgya bcing ba'o//
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de nyid kyis bcing ba ni phyag rgya bcing ba'o//
translated: The binding of those vajras of body, speech, and mind is the binding of the seals.

original: dam tshig kyang de yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na dam tshig mchog ste phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig kyang de yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na dam tshig mchog ste phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
